119a4(mdo sde): mchis pas// 'dod chags bral ba 'dzum mi mdzad// thugs rje thugs kyis lung ston te/ the tsom rnams par bsal bar mdzod// ji ltar khyod kyi zhal
119a5(mdo sde): nas su// 'od zer byung nas slar le ga ste// 'od ni 'jig rten mgon po'i/ dbu'i rtsug tu nub gyur pa// glog ris bzhin du na mkha' la// dge ba dpag
119a6(mdo sde): med bkra bgyid pa// rnam par 'dren pa de dag gis// thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod ston to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka'
119a7(mdo sde): stsal pa// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtsom pa med 'di bskal pa gnyis na// lhas mngon par bstod pa'i bskal pa la dga' ba chen
119a8(mdo sde): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su 'od chen po zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur te// rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa
119b1(mdo sde): skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa
119b2(mdo sde): 'od chen po che'i tshad ni bskal pa gcig thub par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa bcu gnyis thub par 'gyur ro// kun
119b3(mdo sde): dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi longs spyod dang // kun spyod pa ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang /
119b4(mdo sde): kun spyod pa yang de dang 'dra'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtsom pa med la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi
119b5(mdo sde): bu khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa ni khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/
119b6(mdo sde): btsun pa rab 'byor 'di la su zhig sangs rgyas su 'gyur shes sam/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho bos ni gang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'i chos de yang
119b7(mdo sde): dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // smras pa btsun pa rab 'byor gal te/ gang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'i chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ khyod sangs rgyasu
119b8(mdo sde): 'gyur bar lung bstan to zhes bya ba de mi bstang ngam/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung ma
120a1(mdo sde): bstan tam/ smras pa btsun pa rab 'byor don yongs su mkhyen pa bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so//
120a2(mdo sde): de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i don yongs su mkhyen pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub tu smon pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis lung mi stan to// byang
120a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' gang byang chub tu mi smon pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis lung bstan to// de bas na don yongs su mkhyen pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ni/ sems
120a4(mdo sde): can rnams kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir/ 'di skad du sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes gsungs na/ khyod ci zhig la ltos nas 'di skad sangs rgyas su 'gyur zhes smra smras pa/
120a5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi snyad 'di ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad do// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'phags pa rnams la 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis gdags su
120a6(mdo sde): med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'phags pa tha snyad 'dogs pa ni bden pa'o/ 'jig rten tha snyad 'dogs pa ni log pa'o// btsun pa rab 'byor de bas na/ 'jig rten tha snyad
120a7(mdo sde): log pa/ 'phags pa rnams la brjod par mi 'os so// btsun pa rab 'byor 'jig rten gyi khams srung bar bya ba yin te/ don dam pas dngangs su 'ong zhes de la 'phags
120a8(mdo sde): pa rnams snying rje chen pos bden pa yang dag pa btang nas byis pa rnams log par tha snyad 'dogs kyi/ 'phags pa rnams la ma yin te/ 'phags pa rnams ni bden pa yang
120b1(mdo sde): dag pa la dga'o zhes 'phags pa rnams la bden pa brjod do/ 'phags pa rnams kyis bden pa gang zhe na/ btsun pa rab 'byor shin tu mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa na/ 'phag
120b2(mdo sde): ba rnams kyi bden pa'o// chos thams cad ni byang chub kyi rang bzhin te/ 'di ni 'phags pa rnams kyi bden pa'o// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu bsdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /
120b3(mdo sde): kun 'byung 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / 'gog pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / lam gyi bden pa dang / bden pa bzhi med dam/ byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras
120b4(mdo sde): ba/ btsun pa rab 'byor sdug bsngal 'dus byas ma yin nam/ smras pa de de bzhin te/ sdug bsngal ni 'dus byas so// byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/ bcu
120b5(mdo sde): pa rab 'byor/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dus byas thams cad brdzun pa slu ba'i chos so// zhes ma gsungs sam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de lta'o// byang chub sems dpa' rtsom
120b6(mdo sde): pa med kyis smras pa/ gal te sdug bsngal ni 'dus byas te/ de brdzun pa yin na// khyod 'di ltar ci zhig las sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'o// snyam du sems ste/
120b7(mdo sde): rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu sdug bsngal ni 'dus byas te/ brdzun pa'o// sdug bsngal yongasu shes pa ni bden pa'o// smras pa/ gal te sdug bsngal ni 'dus bya
120b8(mdo sde): brdzun pa slu ba'i chos can te/ yang dag pa ma yin na de yongs su shes pa yang bden par rung ngam/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de lta'o// byang chub sems dpa'
121a1(mdo sde): rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor khyod kyi sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa 'phags pa'i bden par ga la 'gyur/ rab 'byor
121a2(mdo sde): kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'gog pa ni 'dus ma byas ma yin na/ de ci'i phyir 'phags pa'i bden par mi 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/
121a3(mdo sde): btsun pa rab 'byor/ ci 'gog pa de nyid 'gog pa'i bden pa 'am/ 'on te chos 'ga' zhig 'gags pa lags sam/ ci zhig 'phags pas 'gog pa'i bden par yid
121a4(mdo sde): ches/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu sdug bsngal 'gog pas 'gog pa'i bden pa zhes brjod do// byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/ gnas
121a5(mdo sde): brtan rab 'byor gyis sngar sdug bsngal ni 'dus byas te/ brdzun pa slu ba'i chos so zhes ma smras sam/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu smras so// byang chub
121a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor chos gang brdzun pa yang dag pa ma yin pa de la ni 'gog pa med na/ khyod kyi sdug bsngal de 'gog pa
121a7(mdo sde): ga la 'gyur/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan rab 'byor kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtsom pa med la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs
121a8(mdo sde): kyi bu khyod kyi spobs pa la bdag rjes su yid rang ngo // sems can thams cad kyis kyang khyod kyi spobs pa thob par gyur cig/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
121b1(mdo sde): rnams kyi bden pa ni gang / bden pa mngon par rtogs pa ni gang / byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor chos thams cad ni bden bI/
121b2(mdo sde): tshul dang 'gal ba ma yin no// de bas chos thams cad mngon par rtogs pa ni bden pa mngon par rtogs pa'o// btsun pa rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rten cing 'brel
121b3(mdo sde): bar 'byung ba ste/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mngon par rtogs pa ni bden pa mngon par rtogs pa'o// chos thams cad ni stong pa ste/ stong pa nyid khong du chud pa ni
121b4(mdo sde): bden pa'o// stong pa nyid mngon par rtogs pa ni bden pa mngon par rtogs pa'o// chos thams cad ni ma skyes pa ste/ mi skye ba khong du chud pa ni bden pa'o// mi skye
121b5(mdo sde): ba mngon par rtogs pa ni bden pa mngon par rtogs pa'o// btsun pa rab 'byor gang du bden pa mngon par rtogs pa de la chos gang yang sgrub pa'am/ spang ba med do//
121b6(mdo sde): btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bden pa mngon par rtogs pa ni chos gang yang mngon par mi rtog ste/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub
121b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyi bden pa mngon par rtogs pa'o// btsun pa rab 'byor bden pa bden pa zhes bya ba 'di ni 'gyur ba med pa'i chos kyi tshig bla dgas so//
121b8(mdo sde): btsun pa rab 'byor ji tsam du rtogs pa de tsam du log pa ste/ rtog pa dang bral ba ni tha dad pa'o// btsun pa rab 'byor gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas
122a1(mdo sde): su 'gyur ro// zhes lung bstan pas khyod rnyed pa legs par rnyed do zhes smras pa ni/ btsun pa rab 'byor gang dag rnyed pa legs
122a2(mdo sde): bar rnyed pa de dag la ni lung mi ston to// gang dag rnyed pa legs par ma rnyed cing rnyed pa med pa dag la ni lung ston to// gang dag rnyed pas dga' bar mi sems
122a3(mdo sde): shing ma rnyed pas so shi bar mi 'gyur ba de dag lung ston to// gang dag 'khor ba las kyang mi g.yo la/ mya ngan las 'das pa yang thob par 'gyur ba de dag la/
122a4(mdo sde): lung ston to// gang dag so so'i skye bo'i tshogs las kyang mi g.yo la/ nges par gyur pa yang thob par gyur pa de dag la lung ston to// gang dag lung stan pa
122a5(mdo sde): thos na dga' bar mi sems pa de dag lung ston to// rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis khong du chud pa 'di zab po// smras pa/ btsun pa rab
122a6(mdo sde): 'byor gang dag rtog pas khong du chud pa mthong ba de dag gi khong du chud pa zab po/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ khong du chud pa 'di blta' dka'o// smras pa/
122a7(mdo sde): btsun pa rab 'byor lta 'dod pa rnams kyis so// rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ khong du chud pa 'di rtogs par dka'o// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor
122a8(mdo sde): mi brtson pa rnams kyis so// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu tshul 'di las su 'jug par 'gyur/ smras pa/ gang dag sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkun
122b1(mdo sde): byas par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ma skyed pa ma yin pa dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba la bsnyen bkur byas pa rnams kyi rna lam du chos kyi rnam grangs
122b2(mdo sde): 'di grag par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu ji ltar na sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur byas pa yin/ smras pa/ gang sgrub pa sten
122b3(mdo sde): ba'o// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu sgrub pa la gnas pa ji ltar rig par bya/ smras pa/ gang sems can rnams la log par mi sgrub pa'o// smras pa/
122b4(mdo sde): sems can rnams la log par mi sgrub pa ji lta bu/ smras pa/ ga byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po mi 'dor ba'o// rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ byang chub
122b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' byams pa chen po gang / smras pa/ gang lus dang / srog dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la byin yang lan du phan 'dogs pa la mi re ba'o//
122b6(mdo sde): smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snyid/ rje chen po gang / smras pa/ gang thog ma kho nar sems can rnams byang chub par 'dod kyis bdag ni/
122b7(mdo sde): ma yin no// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na srog chags bdun khri drug stong ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed do/ gang po dge
122b8(mdo sde): slong nyis brgya ni len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol lo// yang de'i tshe na lha'i bu bzang sems shes bya ba 'khor de nyid du
123a1(mdo sde): 'dus par gyur nas 'dugs pa des/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i sangs
123a2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi byang chub kyi rtsa ba'i rten gyi byang chub gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi rtsa ba'i rten kyi gnas ni/ bsam
123a3(mdo sde): pa phun sum tshogs pa'i sems bskyed pa'o// lha'i bu bzang sems kyis gsol ba/ de ltar byang chub du sems bskyed pa'i spyod yul gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
123a4(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ gang sbyin pa yang spyod yul ba/ rnam par smin pa la re ba med pa la yang / mngon du phyogs pa yin/ tshul khrims ma nyams pa yang spyod yul la/
123a5(mdo sde): rnam par mi rtog pa'i tshul khrims la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ bzod pa yang spyod la mi gnyis pa'i chos la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ brtson 'grus kyang spyod
123a6(mdo sde): yul la sdom pa med pa la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ bsam gtan yang spyod yul ba la shin tu snyoms par zhugs pa'i chos thams cad la yang mngon du phyogs pa
123a7(mdo sde): yin/ shes rab kyang spyod yul la spros pa med pa la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ thos pa yongs su tshol ba yang spyod yul la/ brjod du med pa la yang mngon du phyogs
123a8(mdo sde): ba yin/ zhi gnas kyang spyod yul la shin tu zhi ba dang / rab tu zhi ba la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ lhag mthong yang spyod yul la chos thams cad bstan du med//
123b1(mdo sde): ba la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa yang spyod yul la dran pa med cing yid la byed pa la mngon du phyogs pa yin/ yang dag par spong ba yang /
123b2(mdo sde): spyod yul la mngon par 'du mi byed pa la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ rdzun 'phrul gyi rkang pa yang spyod yul la smon pa thams cad yang dag par chad pa la yang mngon du
123b3(mdo sde): phyogs pa yin/ dbang po yang spyod yul la dbang po las 'das pa'i chos rnams la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ stobs kyang spyod yul la dbyer med pa'i chos la
123b4(mdo sde): yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag kyang spyod yul la/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ lam yang spong yul la/ lam ngan par
123b5(mdo sde): zhugs pa'i sems can yongs su bskyab pa la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba yang spyod yul la/ pha rol dang tshu rol la mi chags pa
123b6(mdo sde): la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ 'khor ba yang spyod yul la mya ngan las 'das pa la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa yang spyod yul la mngon
123b7(mdo sde): par 'du byed pa la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ skye ba yang spyod yul la ma skyes pa dang ma byung ba la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ phung po yang spyod yul la nyon
123b8(mdo sde): mongs pa la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ khams kyang spyod yul la dbyer med pa la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ skye mched kyang spyod yul la 'phags pa'i skye ba
124a1(mdo sde): mched la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ chos nyan pa yang spyod yul la nges par sems pa la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ chos ston//
124a2(mdo sde): ba yang spyod yul la brjod du med pa la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ gzugs kyi sku rnam par sgrub pa yang spyod yul la chos kyi sku la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/
124a3(mdo sde): chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba yul la 'jug pa med pa dang / ldog pa med pa la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ nyan thos kyang spyod yul la sangs rgyas kyi chos
124a4(mdo sde): rnams la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyang spyod yul la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul la yang mngon du phyogs pa yin te/
124a5(mdo sde): lha'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul zhes bya'o// lha'i bu bzang sems kyis gsol pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i cho ga gang lags/ bcom ldan
124a6(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bdag bde ba la mi lta ba dang / sems can gzhan bde ba la bkod pa dang / 'khor ba na gnas shing tshul khrims dang thos pa dang
124a7(mdo sde): bag yod pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas shing snying rje chen po las phyogs ldog pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa lag mthil du 'ongs kyang / thob par mi
124a8(mdo sde): byed pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ 'khor ba nyid rjes su 'brang ba dang / sems can thams cad rjes su bsrungs pa dang / sems
124b1(mdo sde): can thams cad la dad pa mtshungs pa dang / sems can thams cad mtshungs par dang bar byed pa dang / sems can thams cad la bsam pa mtshungs pa dang / dge
124b2(mdo sde): ba'i rang bzhin can dang / zang zing med par chos ston pa dang / rung ba la tshod shes pa dang / dben pa la mngon par dga' zhing tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang /
124b3(mdo sde): skye bo mang po'i nang na gnas shing chos yang dag par ston pa la snyom las med pa dang / grong dang grong khyer du zhugs nas byams pa la mngon par phyogs pa dang / rnyed
124b4(mdo sde): pa dang / bkur sti la mngon par mi dga' ba dang / 'jig rten pa'i 'du 'dzi las 'byol ba dang / rig pa dang bcas shing snyan pa dang / 'jam por smra ba dang /
124b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dang / chos dang dge 'dun rnams la dngos po thams cad kyis phyag 'tshal ba dang / gsong por smra ba dang / khro gnyer med pa dang / rtag tu gzhan gyi don
124b6(mdo sde): la dga' ba dang / thams cad du sems chags pa med pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad la mngon par mi dga' ba dang / 'phags pa'i skye bo dang /
124b7(mdo sde): 'grogs pa dang 'phags pa ma yin pa'i skye bo rnam par spong ba dang / sangs rgyas la bdag nyid tsam du langs par sems pa dang / chos la srog tsam du gces par 'dzin
124b8(mdo sde): pa dang / sgrub pa la yan lag gi dam pa mgo tsam du gces par sems pa dang / chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang \u0f7f/ na ba'i ched kyi sman
125a1(mdo sde): dang / yo byad ngan ngon gyis chog par sems pa dang / slob dpon dang / mkhan po rnams la ston pa tsam du 'phangs par sems shing / srog
125a2(mdo sde): gi phyir yang yongs su gtong ba dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton la brtson pa dang / nam gyi cha stod dang / nam gyi cha smad la mi nyal bar rnal 'byor la brtson pa dang /
125a3(mdo sde): bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa mngon du byed pa dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams tshul bzhin so sor rtog pa dang / shes rab kyis
125a4(mdo sde): rab tu rtogs par byed pa dang / sems la rnyog pa med pa dang / bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang / nang du so sor rtog pa dang / phyi rol tu mi rgyug pa dang / lus
125a5(mdo sde): yongs su gtong ba dang / khro ba rnams par spong ba dang / gti mug rnam par 'jom pa dang / shes rab 'bar bar byed pa dang / so sor thar pa sdom pa dang /
125a6(mdo sde): 'dul ba las phyir mi 'da' ba dang / thams cad du sems cad shes dang / thams cad du shes bzhin dang ldan pa dang / sems byin ci ma log pa dang / sems
125a7(mdo sde): dri ma med cing 'od gsel ba dang / rtog tu pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la rab tu brtson pa dang / brtson pa mi 'dor ba dang / rtag tu dge ba gang yin tshol zhing ji ltar
125a8(mdo sde): thos pa'i chos rnams chung mi gzon pa dang / gzhan dag la yang yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang / sems zang zing med pa dang / rtag tu dbang po bsdams pa
125b1(mdo sde): rtag tu sems mnyam par bzhag pa dang / mya ngan 'das pa la gzhol ba dang / 'khor ba mi gtong ba dang / rnyed pa dang ma rnyed pa dang / grags pa dang ma grags pa dang /
125b2(mdo sde): bstod pa dang smang ba dang / bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyis mi skul ba dang / thams cad du chod shes pa dang / thams cad dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / sbyin pas
125b3(mdo sde): longs spyod chen po dang / tshul khrims kyi lha dang mir skye ba dang / bzod pas mdzes pa dang / brtson 'grus kyis nyon mongs pa yongs su 'dor ba dang / bsam
125b4(mdo sde): gtan rnams kyis sems las su rung ba dang / shes rab kyis 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams rab tu rtogs pa dang / sdu ba'i dngos po
125b5(mdo sde): rnams kyis kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / tshangs pa'i gnas rnams kyis dul ba dang bden pa dang / gtong ba dang nye bar zhi ba dang / shes rab kyi byin gyis rlabs
125b6(mdo sde): rnams kyis sems shin tu dul ba dang / bsam gtan rnams kyis yid du 'ong ba dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis zab pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis
125b7(mdo sde): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa dang / stong pa nyid sgom pas/ lta ba dang bral ba dang / mtshan ma med pa sgom pas rnam par mi rtog pa dang / smon
125b8(mdo sde): pa med pa sgom pas yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pas theg pa chen po rtogs par khong du chud pa dang / thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pas thams
126a1(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa nyid shes la gtong pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu po rnams kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su sko
126a2(mdo sde): ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su tshol bas yon tan thams cad skye ba'i sgo dang / slob dpon dang / mkhan po dang / bla ma la sri zhu byed pas sangs rgyas thams
126a3(mdo sde): cad mnyes par byed pa dang / rang gi lus dang sems yongs su shes pas thams cad shes pa nyid dang / nga rgyal med pas gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / sems can tham
126a4(mdo sde): cad la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal bas spyi gtsug ltar mi mthong ba dang / cho ma cho dgu byin pas mtshan yongs su rdzogs pa dang / sems can thams cad dang mthun par
126a5(mdo sde): 'jug pas/ dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs pa dang / theg pa chen po yang dag par rab tu ston pas cang shes pa'i sa dang / byang chub kyi sems yang dag par
126a6(mdo sde): rab tu ston pas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa dang / stong pa nyid rab tu ston pas bag chags yang dag par 'jom pa dang / chos byin pas so so yang dag par rig pa thob
126a7(mdo sde): pa dang / dran pa rab tu byin pas gzugs thob pa dang / chos khong du chud pas spobs pa thob pa dang / spobs pa nye bar sgrub pas/ phyad par lung ston pa dang / nyam chung
126a8(mdo sde): ba rnams la bzod pas sred med kyi bu'i lus thob pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams la bzod pas mthong ma thag tu sems can thams cad dang bas 'gyur ba dang /
126b1(mdo sde): gzhan dag gi gnod sems rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pas mngon par shes pa myur ba dang / ting nge
126b2(mdo sde): 'dzin rab tu byin pas/ mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa dang / spyod lam yang dag par rab tu byin pas kun tu mdzes pa dang / dge bo'i bshes gnyen la
126b3(mdo sde): sbyor bas sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / 'grogs pa dang / 'dod pa yongs su gtong bas 'jig rten
126b4(mdo sde): thams cad yid ches pa dang / khro ba yongs su 'dor bas 'jig rten thams cad dga' ba dang / phrag dog yongs su 'dor bas rnyed pa thams cad kyi mchog dang / grags
126b5(mdo sde): pa'i mchog dang / gnas byin pas 'jig rten thams cad ston pa dang / rnyed pa dang bkar sti dang / chags su bcad pa rab te byin pas chos la rab tu dga' ba dang
126b6(mdo sde): grags pa'i sgra dang / gsong por smra bas ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sman par spo bas tshangs pa'i smra ba dang / 'jam por smra bas bya ka la bying ka'i sgra skad dang/
126b7(mdo sde): khong khro ba med pa'i sems kyis 'jig rten thams cad du grags pa dang / sems can thams cad la mi slu bas dbang gcig pur 'gyur ba dang / lhung ba mi
126b8(mdo sde): gleng bas mngal gyi gnas las yang dag par 'da' ba dang / srog gcod pa spong bas tshe dpag tu med pa dang / rkun po yongs su spong bas mdzod khri'i mdzod
127a1(mdo sde): dang / sdug pa'i dngos po yongs su gtong bas lag na rin po che dang / byang chub tu yong su sngo bas long spyod mi bzad pa dang /
127a2(mdo sde): 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa yongs su spong bas skyes bu chen po dang / brdzun du smra ba yongs su spong bas ngag gi gsang ba thob pa dang / phra ma yongs su
127a3(mdo sde): spong bas 'jig rten thams cad kyi ston pa dang / ngag rtsub po yongs su spong bas/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis stod pa'i snod pa dang / tshigs kyal pa mi smra bas
127a4(mdo sde): g.yog mi byed pa dang / brnab sems yongs su spong bas gter chen po rnyed pa dang / gnod sems yongs su spong bas stegs su gyur pa dang / log par lta ba
127a5(mdo sde): yongs su spong bas 'jig rten thams cad ston pa dang / chos brgya mtsho chen po la sbyor bas stobs bcu nyid dang / sbyin pa thams cad kyi rnam par smin pa la mi re bas
127a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos phyir mi log pa thob pa dang / kun tu 'dzin pa thams cad yongs su gtong bas mi 'jigs pa thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu ngas skal pa 'am bskal pa/
127a7(mdo sde): las lhag par byang chub sems dpa'i cho ga stan kyang mthar phyin par mi 'gyur ro// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi cho ga tshad med de/ 'di ni byang chub sems
127a8(mdo sde): dpa'i cho ga zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar na cho ga dang spyod yul phun sum tshogs pa yin no// de ltar cho ga dang spyod yul phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sem
127b1(mdo sde): dpa' ni/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rnyed par dka' ba'i 'du shes can ma yin no/ lha'i bu bzang sems kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang
127b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' shes bzhin dang ldan pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu gang byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu ting nge 'dzin mi
127b3(mdo sde): 'dor la/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang gis kyang mi skye ba dang / ting nge 'dzin las log nas gang du sems can gyi don byed pa der skye ba ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang
127b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' shes bzhin dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// lha'i bu bzang sems kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dben pa
127b5(mdo sde): zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gang thams cad de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang chos kyi
127b6(mdo sde): dbyings su mthong ba de/ skye bo mang po'i nang du song yang dben par shes par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dben pa zhes bya'o// gang
127b7(mdo sde): gnyis la blo mi 'jug pa de ni shin tu dben pa zhes bya'o// lha'i bu bzang sems kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mnyam
127b8(mdo sde): par gzhag pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' yid kyis smon lam thams cad dang bral zhing chos gang
128a1(mdo sde): yang bzung bar 'am/ spang bar yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la/ de gang dang gang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang / de ste
128a2(mdo sde): kha dang yang dag pa ma yin par mthong ba ste/ lha'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par bzhag pa zhes bya'o// lha'i bu bzang sems kyis gsol pa/
128a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thams cad du 'gro ba zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sa gang bdag
128a4(mdo sde): dang sems can thams cad stong pa nyid du mnyam par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba'o// lha'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thams cad du 'gro ba zhes bya'o// lha'i
128a5(mdo sde): bu bzang sems kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dul ba zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang rnams par
128a6(mdo sde): rtogs pa rnams kyis mi 'phrogs pa'o// lha'i bu bzang sems kyis gsol pa/ ji ltar na zhi ba zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang kun
128a7(mdo sde): nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur/ rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba zhi pa zhes bya'o// lha'i bu bzang sems kyis gsol pa/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis
128a8(mdo sde): gsungs pa'i don bdag gi'i tshal ba ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub ni rang gi kha na las pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' ni ji lta ji ltar kun nas nyon mong
128b1(mdo sde): pa yongs su spong ba de lta de ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su 'dzin to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni gang nas kyang blang ba ma lags/ gang
128b2(mdo sde): du yang bkur ba ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la ye shes rnams par dag pa ni byang chub ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bzod pa'i rjes su zhugs pa
128b3(mdo sde): ni byang chub kyi spyod pa'o// gang 'di ltar shes pa de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gang dag mnyam pa nyid 'di la zhugs pa de dang / de dag bcom ldan
128b4(mdo sde): 'das sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa lags so// gang dag chos mnyam pa nyid 'di la bsten pa de dang / de dag ni tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa lags so//
128b5(mdo sde): gang dag tshogs nyam pa nyid 'di la bzod pa de dang de dag ni bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa lags so// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa dang / sems pa dang /
128b6(mdo sde): sgom pa la brtson pa de dang de dag ni brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa lags so// / gang dag chos mnyam pa nyid 'di la nges par rtog pa de dang de dag ni bsam gtan
128b7(mdo sde): pa lags so// gang dag chos mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa de dang de dag ni shes rab dang ldan pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gang dad pa
128b8(mdo sde): rnyed pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo // de dag gis chos mngon sum du bgyis so// bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bdud btul lo// bcom ldan 'das gang
129a1(mdo sde): @dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu ston pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang
129a2(mdo sde): dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khong du chud pa de dag chos rtogs pa lags so// de nas bcom 'das kyis lha'i bu bzang sems la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ bzang
129a3(mdo sde): sems legaso legs so// de de bzhin no// ji ltar smras pa de bzhin te/ bzang sems gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
129a4(mdo sde): rnams kyi byang chub de ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las rab tu ston to// gang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa de thams cad kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las
129a5(mdo sde): bshad do/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par 'gyur ba dag ni rnyed pa chen po 'byor bar 'gyur ro// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang dag
129a6(mdo sde): gi lag tu song ba de dag ni chos kyi gter chen po thob par 'gyur ro/ gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su 'dzin pa de dang de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas yid brtan
129a7(mdo sde): pa'o// de dang de dag ni gsang ba 'dzin pa'o// de dang de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bla na med pa'i mchod pas mchod par byed pa'o// de dag ni dam pa'i chos yongs su
129a8(mdo sde): 'dzin pa'o/ gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos shing thos nas kyang mos pa de dang de dag ni/ lha'i bu nga la lan du phan 'dogs pa'o// lha'i bu de dag ni phyogs thams
129b1(mdo sde): du mun pa med par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor thams cad la bka' stsal pa/ khyed las su dag phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
129b2(mdo sde): yang dag par rab tu ston par spro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su
129b3(mdo sde): thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni slad mi 'dus na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par rab tu bshad par
129b4(mdo sde): spro'o// bcom ldan 'das rtsom pa mang pos ni dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par mi nus so// bdag ni sems 'dzin pa ma mchis shing / sems can thams cad la sems
129b5(mdo sde): snyoms pa ste/ zang zing ma mchis pa'i sems dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa thams cad la re ba ma mchis pas/ chos zab mo la bzod pa 'di yang /
129b6(mdo sde): dag par bshad par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rnyed pa dang bkur sti la gnas pas ni/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par mi nus so// bcom
129b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das sems can gang dag bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang / 'chang ba dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / klog
129b8(mdo sde): pa dang / bris te gleg bam du bgyis nas 'chang bar 'gyur te de dag ni/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyi byin gyis rlabs su rig par bgyi'o//
130a1(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// sems de 'dra bas dam pa'i
130a2(mdo sde): chos yongs su bzung bar nus so// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsol pa/ bcom ldani 'das gang snying rje chen po dang ma bral ba des dam pa'i
130a3(mdo sde): chos yongs su 'dzin par nus so// bdag ni snying rje chen po la dmigs nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad par bgyi'o// byang chub sems dpa' byams pas gsol pa/
130a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das byams pa'i sems kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par nus so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gnod sems mang ba la dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis
130a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag ni byams pa'i sems kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad par bgyi'o// byang chub sems dpa' mthong dga' gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
130a6(mdo sde): dpa' gang sems can rnams kyis mthong na/ ngoms par mi 'gyur ba des dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par nus te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni/ sems can thams cad
130a7(mdo sde): la khong khro ba ma mchis pa'i/ sems kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su bzung bar bgyi'o// byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
130a8(mdo sde): dpa' gang / sems can rnams kyi don tu/ sdug bsngal thams cad la spro ba dang / gang yang sems can sangs rgyas nyid yang dag par sgrub par 'tshal zhing sems can thams cad
130b1(mdo sde): bsgral nas/ slad kyis bdag rgal bar 'tshal ba de chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi don du/ sangs rgyas nyid yang
130b2(mdo sde): dag par sgrub par 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das pa dag ni sems can thams cad bsgral nas/ slad gyis bdag 'tshal bar/ sgral bar bgyi ba dang / sgrol ba po dang / bsgral
130b3(mdo sde): ba yang mi dmigs par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das ni de lta bu'i sems dang ldan pas/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bgyi'o// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gsol pa/ brtsa
130b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das gang 'di ltar bdag gis dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ngo / snyam pa 'di ni 'jig rten gyi phyin ci log go/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' ni/ re shig bdag
130b5(mdo sde): nyid dul bar bgyi/ bdag nyid zhi bar bgyi'o/ de bdag nyid dul zhing zhi la nye bar zhi nas/ chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar nus so// bcom ldan 'das
130b6(mdo sde): bdag ni bdag nyid dul zhing zhi la nye bar zhin chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i
130b7(mdo sde): chos yongs su 'dzin pa de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa dag 'di ltar khyed cag sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir dam pa'i chos yongs
130b8(mdo sde): su bzung bar spro ba ni/ legs so legs so// 'di ni khyed dang 'tsham mo// dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi// yang dag phul gyi
131a1(mdo sde): chos so// byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar brtson par bya'o// rigs kyi bu dag chos yang dag par brjod pa dang /
131a2(mdo sde): rab tu ldan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung ba dang blags pa dang / kun chub par byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med
131a3(mdo sde): pa'i sku ni chos kyi sku'o// chos kyi sku ni sangs rgyas kyi sku'o zhes sangs rgyas la snang ba chen po thob par 'gyur ro// chos thams cad ni ma byas pa 'dus ma byas pa'o zhes chos
131a4(mdo sde): la snang ba chen po thob par 'gyur ro// nga'i bya ba med pa dang yongs su 'dzin pa med pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi slob ma'i dge 'dun no// zhes dge 'dun la snang ba chen po
131a5(mdo sde): thob par 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i rtsa ba'o zhes byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa rnams la snang ba thob par 'gyur ro// nges pa'i tshig
131a6(mdo sde): thams cad ni skye ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid do zhes spobs pa'i snang ba thob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dge chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni klu'i rgyal po rgya che gnas dang / brgya byin gyi
131a7(mdo sde): gnas dang / klu'i gnas ma dros pa'i gnas su spyod par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu 'dzam bu gling du spyod par 'gyur te/ sems can gang dag sangs rgyas kyis yongs su gzung
131a8(mdo sde): ba dang / byang chub sems dpas yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ba drang ba/ g.yo med pa nges pa/ chos zab mo la mos pa de dag gi lag tu 'gro bar 'gyur ro// bcom
131b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rnam par gnon dang / byang chub sems
131b2(mdo sde): dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
131b3(mdo sde): mngon par stod do// / 'phags pa chos yang dag par sdud pa stong phrag brgya pa'i mdo las/ rtsom pa med kyi le'u ste/ bcu gnyis pa rdzogs s+ho//
131b4(mdo sde): rgya gar gyi mkhan po shi gar pa dang / bi dza ya shi la dang / shi len dra po 'di dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis kyang
131b5(mdo sde): bac+doMs nas gtan la phab pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ a r+ya ra na me g+ha na mA ma ha ya na su ta/ bod skad du/ 'phags
131b6(mdo sde): pa dkon sprin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
131b7(mdo sde): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul ga ya na ga ya mgo' ri la dge slong bdun khri nyi stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu
131b8(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag zad pa nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam/
132a1(mdo sde): par grol ba cang shes pa/ glang po chen po bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid pa kun tu sbyor ba yongasu
132a2(mdo sde): zad pa yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pa/ chos kyi rgyal po'i
132a3(mdo sde): sras/ sems rnyed pa dang / bkur sti thams cad dang bral ba legs par rab tu byung ba legs par bsnyen pa rdzogs pa/ brnog pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ mya ngan las 'das bI/
132a4(mdo sde): lam la gnas pa sha stag ste/ gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa ni 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'o// byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong gi byang chub sems
132a5(mdo sde): dpa'i tshogs chen po dang yang thabs cig ste/ thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon du phyogs pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la
132a6(mdo sde): gzhol ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'bab pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bab pa/ chags pa med pa'i gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i
132a7(mdo sde): nge 'dzin pa shin tu gnas pa/ mngon par shes pa chen pos rnam par rol pa lam gyi rgyun ma chang pa sgrib pa dang chod pa dang / kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral ba/ byams
132a8(mdo sde): pa chen po dang / snying rje chen pos phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab par byed pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par 'gro ba la mkhas pa stong pa nyid spyod yul
132b1(mdo sde): kha mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa/ smon lam la gnas pa thams cad dang bral ba/ sems can thams cad la phan par brtson pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad la mkhas pa/
132b2(mdo sde): ye shes mtha' yas pa sems na mkha' dang mtshungs pa/ sems rgya mtsho ltar zab pa/ sems ri bo ltar mi sgul ba/ sems pad ma ltar ma gos pa/ sems rin po che ltar shi
132b3(mdo sde): tu yongs su dag pa/ sems gser ltar shin tu yongs su byang ba rnams 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che tog dang / lag na rin po che dang /
132b4(mdo sde): lag na phyag rgya rin po che dang rin po che'i cod pan dang / gtsug na rin po che dang rin po che brtsegs pa dang / rin po che 'byung gnas dang / rin po che'i rtse mo dang rin po che'i rgyal
132b5(mdo sde): mtshan dang / rdo rje snying po dang / gser gyi snying po dang / rin po che'i snying po dang / dpal gyi snying po dang / dge ba'i snying po dang / dge ba dri ma med pa'i snying po dang / de bzhin
132b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i snying po dang / ye shes snying po dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi snying po dang / pad ma'i snying po dang / rnam par grol ba'i zla ba dang /
132b7(mdo sde): kun tu zla ba dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen po thob dang / kun tu bzang po dang / kun nas mig dang / pad ma'i mig dang / dri ma med pa'i mig dang /
132b8(mdo sde): yangs pa'i mig dang / kun tu spyod lam dang / kun tu mdzes dang / kun tu spyod pa'i blo gros dang / ye shes kyi blo gros dang / chos kyi blo gros dang / rgyal ba'i blo gros
133a1(mdo sde): @dang / bla ma'i blo gros dang / rdo rje'i blo gros dang / khyad par gyi blo gros dang / seng ge rnam par rol pa dang / sgra chen po dbyangs kyi rgyal po dang /
133a2(mdo sde): seng ge'i sgra sgrog dang / sgra dbyangs brjod pa zab mo sgrog dang / gos pa med pa dang / dri ma kun bral dang / zla ba'i 'od dang / nyi ma'i 'od dang / ye shes kyi dpal dang / bzang /
133a3(mdo sde): po'i dpal dang / zla ba'i dpal dang / pad ma'i dpal dang / rin po che'i dpal dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / bzang skyong la stsogs pa skyes bu dam pa bcu drug
133a4(mdo sde): dang / byams pa la stsogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i
133a5(mdo sde): du rnams dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / lha'i bu rab 'thab bral la sogs pa 'thab bral gyi lha'i bu rnams dang /
133a6(mdo sde): lha'i bu yongs su dga' ldan la sogs pa dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / 'phrul dga' la sogs pa 'phrul dga'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / lha'i bu dbang byed
133a7(mdo sde): la sogs pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / deb dpon la sogs pa dkar po'i phyogs kyi bdud kyi bu rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po la sogs pa tshangs pa'i
133a8(mdo sde): ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag zangs ris dang /
133b1(mdo sde): stobs ris dag / sgra gcan dag / de dag la sogs pa lha ma yin pargya stong phrag dus dang / klu'i rgyal po ma rdos pa dag/ ga'i n+dan dang / rgya ma dang / mtha' lus da /
133b2(mdo sde): nor rgyas kyi bu dang / de dag la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po brgya stong du ma dang / dpal gyi gzi brjid la sogs pa/ klu'i rgyal po'i khye'u brgya stong du ma dang / klu'i bu mo mang ba
133b3(mdo sde): rnams dang / de ma yin pa gzhan lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po brgya stong dang yang thab
133b4(mdo sde): gcig go// yang de'i tshe ga ya na ga ya'i mgo'i ri'i dpag tshad bzhi kho ra khor yug du skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyi rdul phra rab tsam yang gang lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /
133b5(mdo sde): dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dag gis ma gang bar gyur pa'i sa phyogs sam/ bar
133b6(mdo sde): snang gi phyogs de med do// 'khor de lta bu 'dus shing 'khod pa'i dbus na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri 'phang du dpag tshad gcig/ kho ra khor yug du dpag/
133b7(mdo sde): tshad phyed pa la lha'i ras bcos ma brgya stong du ma ni bting / rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas ni bla rer bris/ dar gyi lda ldi brgya stong du ma ni spangs/ me tog
133b8(mdo sde): sil mas ni gtor ba zhig bshams te/ seng ge'i khri de'i kho ra khor yug gi sa'i phyogs de ngos rdo rje la yid du 'ong zhing lag mthil ltar mnyam pa dang / chag chag/
134a1(mdo sde): / legs par btab pa dang / phyag dar legs par byas pa dang / dri rab tu zhim zhing lha'i me tog brgya stong du mas gtor bar gyur to// bcon
134a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi yongs su longs spyad pa'i phyir phyogs de na/ gser gyi pad ma shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam 'dab ma brgya stong du ma yod pa/ chu ba ni bai dUr+ya/ snying po ni an
134a3(mdo sde): d+ha rI la/ ze ba ni rdo rje snying po ste/ dri rab tu zhim zhing yid du 'ong ba reg na bde bar gyur dag skyes par gyur to// seng ge'i khri de'i grwa bzhi ha cang yang mi ring / ha cang ya
134a4(mdo sde): mi nye ba nas rin po che'i shing srid du dpag tshad byed dang gnyis/ sboms su rgyang grangs gsum gyis 'khor ba/ bzhi skyes so// seng ge'i khri legs par bshams pa de la
134a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das blo ni rab tu rnam par dag/ chos kyi 'khor lo na rab tu bskor/ bdud dang phyir rgol ba ni bcom/ 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis ni ma gos la/ mi
134a6(mdo sde): bsnyengs shing mi mdzes te/ seng ge ltar bag tsha ba med pa mtsho dang 'dra bar gdang ste/ rnyog pa med cing shin tu rnam par dang ba/ rgya mtsho chen po ltar zab cing gting dpag rka
134a7(mdo sde): la rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa/ ri rab ltar mngon par 'phags pa/ nyi ma ltar rab tu lhan pa/ zla ba ltar rab tu sim pa/ klu chen po ltar chos kyi tshar pa mngon par
134a8(mdo sde): 'bebs pa/ tshangs pa chen po ltar 'jig rten kun las mngon par 'phags pa slob ma shin tu dul ba mtha' yas pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor mnga' ba/ brgya byin dang / tshangs
134b1(mdo sde): pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas zhal du bltas shing mkhengs mdud par bzhugs te/ 'khor tshogs pa de na lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o//
134b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de ltar lham me lhan ne lhang nge ba'i dbu'i gtsug gi gtsug tor gyi gseb nas 'od gzar kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'od gzer gyi 'khor brgya stong phrag du
134b3(mdo sde): ma yod pa byung ste/ de byung nas phyogs bcu thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad snang bar byas te phyir 'ongs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
134b4(mdo sde): lan gsum bskor te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas zhags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo phye ba 'am/ btsums par yang mi mngon no// 'di lta ste dper
134b5(mdo sde): na/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od na mkha'i khams thams cad kyi gseb du zhugs kyang / na mkha'i khams kyi gseb phye ba'am btsums par mi mngon pa de bzhin du/ de'i tshe/
134b6(mdo sde): na 'od gzer de dag zhugs kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo bye ba 'am btsums par mi mngon no// 'di lta ste dper na/ bye ma'i phung po la mar ram/ babru mar
134b7(mdo sde): ram/ chu zhugs na mi mngon pa de bzhin du/ de'i tshe na 'od gzer de dag zhugs kyang bye ba 'am btsums pa de dag mi mngon no// de dag shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing
134b8(mdo sde): 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed gcig 'das pa na/ pad ma can zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
135a1(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang / rkang par ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bran/
135a2(mdo sde): med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das pad ma'i spyan zhes bya ba de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la 'di lta ste theg pa gcig
135a3(mdo sde): brtsams nas chos ston te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dag dang nyan thos kyi theg pa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i ming yang med/ sangs
135a4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing de na rdzus te skyes pa ma gtogs par bud med dang mngal na gnas te 'byung zhing skye ba'i sgra yang mi grag go// 'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can de dag
135a5(mdo sde): thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sha stag go// 'jig rten gyi khams de na bza' ba dang / btung
135a6(mdo sde): ba dang / zas kyi bya ba yang mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang bsam gtan gyi dga' ba'i zas can dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dga' ba'i zas can
135a7(mdo sde): dang / chos kyi dga' ba'i zas can no// de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid kyi 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams de khyab cing dri ma med par gyur pa ma gtogs par 'jig rten gyi
135a8(mdo sde): khams de na/ nyi ma dang zla ba dang gza' dang skar ma rnams kyis 'od kyang mi shes so// 'jig rten gyi khams de lag 'thil bzhin du mnyam par gyur pa las 'jig rten
135b1(mdo sde): gyi khams de na/ rtsa dang shing dang bong ba dang / rtsig pa dang / ri la sogs pa yang mi snang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams de 'dra ba de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang/
135b2(mdo sde): chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sol ba zhes bya ba de'i ming thos pa tsam gyis sems can gyi sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ba zhig gnas te/ de 'od des reg
135b3(mdo sde): ste/ bskul nas rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i spun de ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhab
135b4(mdo sde): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ pad ma'i snying po la phyogs gcig du 'dug go/ de ma yin pa byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag kyang 'od des reg ste/ bskul ba
135b5(mdo sde): dang / rang rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i spyan ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la
135b6(mdo sde): mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ pad ma'i snying po la so so ci rigs par 'khyod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa tha ma
135b7(mdo sde): cad rnam par sel ba stan las langs nas bla gros phrag pa gcig tu bzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang pad mi'i snying po la 'dug nas/ bcom ldan
135b8(mdo sde): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i spyan ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'ang/
136a1(mdo sde): @lta bu'i 'od bzang po tshad ma mchis pa rnam par dag pa yid du mchi ba lus dang sems shin tu dga' bar bgyid pa byung ba 'di su'i lags shes
136a2(mdo sde): de skad gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i spyan des byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel po la 'di skad ces bka'
136a3(mdo sde): stsal to// rigs kyi bu nub phyogs na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig 'das pa na/ mi 'jed ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/
136a4(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang rkang par ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i
136a5(mdo sde): kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba de'i mtshan thos pa tsam gyis/ sems can rnam
136a6(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba zhig bzhugs te/ des 'od bzang po dri ma med pa rnam par dag pa yid du 'ong ba lus dang
136a7(mdo sde): sems shin tu dga' bar byed pa 'di byung ngo / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad mi'i spyan de la/ byang chub sems dpa'
136a8(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan thos pa tsam gyis sems
136b1(mdo sde): can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
136b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i spun des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
136b3(mdo sde): to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa des sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ 'di ltar sems can su gang dag gis bdag mngon par rdzogs par sangs
136b4(mdo sde): rgyas pa'i ming thos pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par shog cig ces smon lam btab po/ byang chub sems
136b5(mdo sde): dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ sems can de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan de mi thos
136b6(mdo sde): sam/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu thos so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du/ phyir mi ldog pa ma lags/ bcom
136b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad ni phyir mi ldog pa yang yin la/ phyir mi ldog pa yang ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci
136b8(mdo sde): ltar gang lta bur de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog pa yang lags la/ phyir mi ldog pa yang ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin
137a1(mdo sde): @gshegs pa'i mtshan thos pas/ sems can de dag phyir mi ldog pa'i sa bon skyes pa mthong nas/ sems can de dag phyir mi ldog par lung /
137a2(mdo sde): bstan to// mtshan thos pa kho nas de ma thag du de dag phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba yang ma yin te/ de bas na rigs kyi bu don de nyid rab tu grub par bya ba'i phyir khyod la
137a3(mdo sde): dpe bshad do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ shing la la'i sa bon gyi rnam pa zhig yod de/ sa bon de la sa bon de nye bar thams cad la med la/ myu gu skye ba nas
137a4(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i bar du rkyen rnams yod na rigs kyi bu sa bon de la ci skad ces bya/ gsol pa/ gang bcom ldan 'das nyes pa thams cad dang bral bas na/ de ni yongs
137a5(mdo sde): su rdzogs pa zhes bgyi'o// bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan thos pa dang ldan pa'i phyir mi ldog pa'i sa bon yod pa'i
137a6(mdo sde): sems can rnams ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa yin no// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de
137a7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i spyan de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
137a8(mdo sde): ldan 'das bdag mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams de blta ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
137b1(mdo sde): rgyas shag kya thub pa de la yang phyag 'tshal ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / btsun par bgyi ba dang / ri mor bgyi ba dang / bkur sti bgyi ba dang / mchod pa
137b2(mdo sde): bgyi ba'i slad du mchi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i spyan des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
137b3(mdo sde): sgrib pa thams cad rnams par sel ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de'i dus la bab par shes na khyod song shig/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
137b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa pad ma'i sman de la/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang mi mjed kyi
137b5(mdo sde): bdag po'i khams de blta ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shig kya thub pa de la yang phyag 'tshal
137b6(mdo sde): ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / btsun par bgyi ba dang / ri mor bgyi ba dang / bkur bsti bgyi ba dang / mchod par bgyi ba'i slad du mchi'o// de skad
137b7(mdo sde): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das pad ma'i spyan gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag de'i dus la bab par
137b8(mdo sde): shes na khyod dengs shig/ 'jig rten gyi khams der bag yod par gnas par gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can
138a1(mdo sde): gang de dag ni rab tu 'dod chags mang ba zhe sdang mang ba/ gti mug mang ba/ dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa/ bram zer mi 'dzin pa dang
138a2(mdo sde): par mi 'dzin pa dang / mar mi 'dzin pa/ chos ma yin pa 'dod pa ba rung ba/ gtum pa zhes gcod pa/ mu cor smra ba/ pho thog can yengs pa/ rkam pa/ le lo
138a3(mdo sde): can tshul khrims 'chal ba/ sdig pa'i chos can/ phrag dog dang ser snas yongs su dkris pa/ nyon mongs pa du mas nye bar nyon mongs par gyur pa rnams te/
138a4(mdo sde): sems can de 'dra ba de dag gis nang na de bzhin gshegs pa de chos ston to/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang 'dra ba'i sems
138a5(mdo sde): tsan rnams kyi nang na chos ston pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dka' ba mdzad pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no// rigs kyi
138a6(mdo sde): ba dag de de bzhin te/ gang 'di 'dra ba'i sems can rnams kyi nang na chos ston pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dka' ba mdzad pa yin no/ rigs kyi bu gang
138a7(mdo sde): dag de lta bur kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ dge ba'i sems gcig tsam skyed pa'i sems can de dag kyang dka' ba byed pa yin no//
138a8(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang yongs su dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems yongs su dag pa lta ci mtshar gyi te/ gang dag de ltar kun nyon mongs par gyur pa'i
138b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams de na se gol gtogs pa srid du yang dad pa rnyed pa dang / se gol gtogs pa srid du yang sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / chos la skabs
138b2(mdo sde): su 'gro ba dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / se gol gtogs pa srid du yang tshul khrims yang dag par bzung ste spyod pa 'di ni ches ngo mtshar to// de ba
138b3(mdo sde): kyang gang dag se grol gtogs pa srid du yang 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa'i sems yang dag par bzung ste gnas pa 'di ni ches ngo mtshar to// de bas kyang
138b4(mdo sde): gang dag se gol gtogs pa srid du yang snying rje'i sems nye bar bzhag ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa 'di ni ches ngo
138b5(mdo sde): mtshar to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to// de nas sgrib pa thams cad rnam
138b6(mdo sde): bar sel ba la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das de las 'di
138b7(mdo sde): lta bu 'thun pa'i rjes su bstan pa 'di mnyan pas bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ rang rang gi gnas nas dong ngo // dong nas bcom
138b8(mdo sde): ldan 'das shag kya thub pa la mchod pa'i phyir/ la las ni rin po che'i shing me tog dang bcas pa 'bras bu dang bcas pa chu dang zheng du ldan pa rnams mngon
139a1(mdo sde): par sprul/ la las ni bai dUr+ya'i shing rnams/ la las ni shil gyi shing rnams/ la las ni dpag bsams kyi shing rnams/ la las ni/
139a2(mdo sde): gser gyi shing rnams/ la las ni me tog gi shing rnams/ la las ni 'bras bu'i shing rnams/ la las ni gos kyi sprin rnams/ la las ni rgyan gyi sprin rnam/
139a3(mdo sde): la las ni spos kyi sprin rnams/ la las ni phreng ba'i sprin rnams/ la las ni phye ma'i sprin rnams/ la las ni gdugs kyi sprin rnams/ la las ni rgyal mtshan
139a4(mdo sde): gyi sprin rnams/ la las ni sil snyan gyi sprin rnams mngon par sprul to// mngon par sprul nas gcig tu 'dus te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
139a5(mdo sde): po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / lhan cig tu mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ga la ba der dong ngo / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams
139a6(mdo sde): cad rnam par sel bas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// kye ma'o grogs po dag mi 'jed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems
139a7(mdo sde): can rnams sdug bsngal lo// de bas na gang gis sems can de dag thams cad bde ba mchog gis bstabs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bya
139a8(mdo sde): ba legs par mngon par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' de kun gyis legs so zhes smras nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel
139b1(mdo sde): ba'i ltar mnyan no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas/ ci lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas pas//
139b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sol ba'i lus las 'od dang dri ma med pa rna bar dag pa yid du 'ong ba/ lus dang sems shin tu dga' bar
139b3(mdo sde): byed pa byang ste/ 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyab cing snang bar gyur pa dang / gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
139b4(mdo sde): rten gyi khams 'di'i sems can dmyal ba pa'i lus su gnas pa dang / dad 'gro'i skye gnas pa'i lus la gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i lus
139b5(mdo sde): su gnas pa de dag 'od des reg nas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dang bral te/ bde zhing khro ba dang / gnod sems dang yang bral te/ phan tshun du pha mar 'du shes
139b6(mdo sde): par gyur pa dang / gang yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams na mun nag gang du nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu
139b7(mdo sde): 'phrul che ba 'di ltar mthu che ba/ 'di ltar dbang che bar grags pa 'di dag gis kyang lham me lhan ne lgang nge ma gyur pa de dag kyang 'od des khyab nas snang
139b8(mdo sde): khar gyur te/ gang der skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang gcig gis gcig mthong ba dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i gang 'khor
140a1(mdo sde): yug gi ri rnams dang / ri gtang gzung dang / rig tang bzung chen po rnams dang / de ma yin pa'i ri nag po gzhan de dag kyang 'od des khyab
140a2(mdo sde): ste snang bar gyur pa dang / blar ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten man chad/ 'og ni mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po man chad/ de'i bar du gang 'od des
140a3(mdo sde): snang bar ma byas pa'i sa phyogs de gang yang med pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bya ba mngon par byas so// de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan
140a4(mdo sde): dag gis kyang ci lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bya ba mngon par byas pas/ zas 'dod pa'i sems can rnams ni zas thob/ btung ba 'dod pa rnams ni btung ba/
140a5(mdo sde): gos 'dod pa rnams ni gos/ gzhon pa 'dod pa rnams ni gzhon pa/ nor 'dod pa rnams nor thob/ long ba rnams ni mig thob/ 'on pa rnams ni sgra thos/ sgren mo
140a6(mdo sde): rnams ni gos can du gyur/ myos pa rnams ni dran pa thob/ sdug bsngal ba rnams ni bde bar gyur/ sbrum ma rnams ni bde bar btsas pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul
140a7(mdo sde): mngon par byas so// de nas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' dag thams cad yul ga la dang ga la mgo'i ri ga la ba der nye ba
140a8(mdo sde): dang / skyes bu dam pa de dag nye bar gyur ma thag du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che'i dra bas khebs par kun tu snang ngo // steng gi
140b1(mdo sde): snang las kyang lha'i pad ma'i char mngon par rab tu bab po// lha'i me tog gi sprin rnams dang / lha'i shing tog gi sprin rnams dang / lha'i phreng ba'i sprin rnams dang /
140b2(mdo sde): lha'i spos kyi sprin rnams dang / lha'i gos kyi sprin rnams dang / lha'i phye ma'i sprin rnams dang / lha'i chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi sprin
140b3(mdo sde): char mngon par rab tu bab po// de dag mngon par rab tu bab pas sems can gang la reg pa de thams cad rab tu dga' bar gyur/ yul ga la dang ga ya mgo'i
140b4(mdo sde): ri la shing tha mal pa dang / sa phyogs tha mal pa gang yod pa de dag thams cad kyang med par snang ngo // sa phyogs de dag na rin po che'i shing rnams dang / dpag
140b5(mdo sde): bsam gyi shing rnams dang / me tog gi shing rnams dang / 'bras bu'i shing rnams dang / tsan den gyi shing rnams dang / a ga ru'i shing rnams dang / kun tu snang ste/
140b6(mdo sde): de dag kun tu bzang por 'dug par gyur to// bar snang na lha'i sil snyen dag sgra 'byin cing sil snyan de dag las 'di lta bu'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang
140b7(mdo sde): byung ngo // lum pa'i tshal rab mchog tu gang skyes pa// mnyam med gzhan yang nyon mongs dbang mi 'gyur// nam mkha' mtshungs mnyam de la phyag 'tshal/
140b8(mdo sde): du/ ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags// byang chub mchog sus byang chub shing rab drung / bdud kyi sde stobs bcom nas sangs rgyas pa// dri med
141a1(mdo sde): gzi ldan de la phyag 'tshal du// ro bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags// chos tshul 'di dag sgyu ma smig rgyu dang // chu zla 'dra/
141a2(mdo sde): bar gang gis rtogs gyur pa// bsod nams shing rab de la phyag 'tshal du// ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag lcags// chos rnams sna tshogs 'ja'
141a3(mdo sde): dang 'dra ba dang // gar la lta 'drar gang gis rab rtogs pa/ mi g.yo bsod nams gter la phyag 'tshal du// ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhag sa/
141a4(mdo sde): gang gis bskal pa brgya phrag mang por ni// thugs rje thugs kyis tshogs kun rdzogs mdzad pa// dri med zla zhal de la phyag 'tshal du// ri bo mchog rab 'di/
141a5(mdo sde): kha bdag cag lhags// byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya mang dang // lha'i tshogs kyis de bzhin gang mchod pa// gti mug mun bral de la phyag 'tshal du//
141a6(mdo sde): ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags/ gang gis mchog gi chos rab gter brnyes shing / thugs rje nyid kyis 'jig rten dag la btang // mnyam med phan
141a7(mdo sde): mdzad de la phyag 'tshal du// ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags/ gang zhig thugs zhi rtag par byams pa'i yid// pad ma chus ltar nyon mongs ma gos pa/
141a8(mdo sde): yon tan mchog rab mnga' la phyag 'tshal du// ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags/ mtshan gyi me tog rgyas pa yongs su dag pa'i sku// dpe byad bzang po'i
141b1(mdo sde): / 'bru chags 'gro ba'i 'tsho ba gang / yal ga mtha' yas rin chen shing la phyag 'tshal du// bdag cag thams cad lhan cig mchod pa thogs te lhags/ tshigs su
141b2(mdo sde): bcad pa 'di dag byung ma thag du/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa me'u dgal gyi bu chen po stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga
141b3(mdo sde): sa gtsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbar ba btad nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sngon ma thos
141b4(mdo sde): sngon ma mthong ba'i snga ltas gda' ba 'di dag su'i las/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan me'u dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces
141b5(mdo sde): bka' stsal to// me'u dgal gyi bu shar phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na// 'jig rten gyi khams/
141b6(mdo sde): ba da ma can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mi'i sman zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs so//
141b7(mdo sde): 'tshe'o gzhes so// chos kyang ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrub pa thams cad rnam par sel
141b8(mdo sde): ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs pa dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gang skyes bu dam pa de nyid
142a1(mdo sde): dang lhan gcig du mi 'jed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ongs pa de dag gi snga ltas 'di yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
142a2(mdo sde): bka' stsal ma thag du/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas bskor cing
142a3(mdo sde): mdun du bdar te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos bcom ldan 'das ka la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhab
142a4(mdo sde): mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs
142a5(mdo sde): su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par stod do// grags chen shes rab chen po pa/ thub chen dpa' ba chen po pa// srid pa mya ngan rgal ba po// nyon mongs rgal la phyag
142a6(mdo sde): 'tshal lo// thams cad du yang thal le ste// kun nas rab tu lhan ner bzhugs/ kun nas rnam par grol ba po// phyag 'tshal mi mtshungs mtshungs med la// rab
142a7(mdo sde): tu mi skul ri bo ba bzhin// gting tshod langs pa rgya mtsho 'dra/ mu stegs kun na mi bskyod pa/ chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na/
142a8(mdo sde): bzod nas zhi zhing ma skyes pa// rang bzhin mya ngan 'das pa yi// chos rnams mgon po khyod kyis bstan// la la la ni lam yang stan// la la yang dag nyid
142b1(mdo sde): kha bkod/ la kha yang dag mya ngan 'das// la la byang chub lung yang bstan// bag la nyal dang bsam pa mkhyen/ khyod kyis mi mkhyen ci yang med/ de phyir 'dul ba'i/
142b2(mdo sde): bya ba rnams/ gzigs pas khyod kyi bka' 'grub bo// byang chub snying por zhugs pa na// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // dri ma sna tshogs gzhan rnams kyang //
142b3(mdo sde): khyod kyi ye shes me yis bsregs// rgal nas sems can rnams grol zhing / grol nas skye dgu grol mdzad cing / srid pa'i mya ngan 'khyams pa yi// 'jig rten tshol
142b4(mdo sde): ba khyod legs so// srid pa'i btson rar sems can dag/ yun ring mi shes gnyid log rnams/ sad par mdzad pa mgon po khyod/ gnyen gyur khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
142b5(mdo sde): khyod kyi sras mchog 'di dag kyang // thams cad byang chub slad du zhugs// dam pa'i chos ni nyan mtshal na// 'dren pas de dag bstan du gsol// de nas bcom
142b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon bstod nas// bcom ldan 'das
142b7(mdo sde): kyis gnang ste/ pad ma'i snying po la phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas pad mi'i snyi
142b8(mdo sde): po la so sor ci rigs par 'khyod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba stan las langs te// bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/
143a1(mdo sde): pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga pad ma'i snying po la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das/
143a2(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du// bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshes/
143a3(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa tham
143a4(mdo sde): cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// skyes bu dam pa khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rtag tu skabs phyes/ de bzhin gshegs pa la khyod/
143a5(mdo sde): ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / dris pa de dang / de nyid du lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye ba dang //
143a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
143a7(mdo sde): dpa' chen po sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ ci ltar na tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ ci ltar na bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams
143a8(mdo sde): lags/ ci ltar na brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ ci ltar na bsam gtan phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ ci ltar na shes rab phun sum
143b1(mdo sde): / tshogs pa rnams lags/ ci ltar na thabs mkhas pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ ci ltar na smon lam phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ ci ltar na stobs phun/
143b2(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ ci ltar na ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sa dang mtshungs pa rnams lag/
143b3(mdo sde): ci ltar na chu dang mtshungs pa rnams lags/ ci ltar na me dang mtshungs pa rnams lags/ ci ltar na rlung mar dang mtshungs pa rnams lags/ ci ltar nan mkha' dang mtshungs
143b4(mdo sde): pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na nyi ma lta bu rnams lags/ ci ltar na seng ge lta bu rnams lags/ ci ltar na dul ba rnams lags/ ci ltar na cang shes pa rnams lags/
143b5(mdo sde): ci ltar na pad ma lta bu rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems rgya che ba rnams lags/ ci ltar na sems rnam par dag pa rnam
143b6(mdo sde): lags/ ci ltar na sems nem nur ma mchis pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' blo rgya mtsho lta bu rnams lags/ ji ltar na
143b7(mdo sde): blo zhib pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rigs pa'i spobs pa can rnams lags/ ci ltar na grol ba'i spobs pa can rnam
143b8(mdo sde): legs/ ci ltar na rnam par dag pa'i spobs pa can rnams lags/ ci ltar ni sems can thams cad mgu bar byed pa'i spobs pa can rnams lags/ bcom ldan
144a1(mdo sde): @'das ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshigs gsung ba rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos brjod pa
144a2(mdo sde): rnams lags/ ci ltar na chos rjes su 'brang ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na chos kyis dbyings la mkhas pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar na byang chub sems
144a3(mdo sde): dpa' stong pa nyid spyod yul pa rnams lags/ ci ltar na mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa lags/ ci ltar na smon lam la gnas pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams lags//
144a4(mdo sde): ci ltar na byams pa'i bdag nyid can rnams lags/ ci ltar na snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams lags/ ci ltar na dga' ba la gnas pa rnams lags/ ci ltar
144a5(mdo sde): na btang snyoms la gnas pa rnams lags// bcom ldan 'das ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pas rnam par rol pa rnams lags/ ci ltar
144a6(mdo sde): na mi khom pa brgyad rnam par spongs pa rnams lags/ ci ltar na byang chub kyi sems ma stor ba rnams lags/ ci ltar na tshe rabs dran pa rnams lags/ ci ltar
144a7(mdo sde): na dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ma bral ba rnams lags/ ci ltar na sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spangs pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar na byang
144a8(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos nyid thob par 'gyur/ ci ltar na lus rdo rje ltar sra ba rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar na byang chub
144b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' ded dpon chen po rnams lags/ ci ltar na lam la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ci ltar na lam ma logs par ston pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan
144b2(mdo sde): 'das ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sems mnyam par gzhag pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar na byang chub sems
144b3(mdo sde): dpa' phyag dar khrod pa rnams lags/ ji ltar ni chos gos gsum pa rnams lags/ ci ltar na phying ba can rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar na byang
144b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' bsod snyoms pa rnams legs/ ci ltar na stan gcig pa rnams lags/ ci ltar na zas phyis mi len pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das
144b5(mdo sde): ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa pa rnams lags/ ci ltar na shing drang ba rnams lags/ ci ltar na bla gab med pa rnams lags/ ci ltar na dur khrod
144b6(mdo sde): pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na cog pu pa rnams lags/ ci ltar na gzhi ci bzhin pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor
144b7(mdo sde): spyod pa rnams lags/ ci ltar na mdo 'dzin pa rnams lags/ ci ltar na 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams lags/ ci ltar na cho ga dang spyod yul dang spyod pa dang /
144b8(mdo sde): spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa rnams legs/ ci ltar na ser sna dang phrag dog dang bral ba rnams lags/ ci ltar na sems can thams cad la sems snyom/
145a1(mdo sde): pa rnams lags/ ci ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim 'gro bgyid mkhas pa rnams lags/ ci ltar na nga rgyal
145a2(mdo sde): bcom pa rnams lags/ ci ltar na dad pa mang ba rnams lags/ ci ltar na kun rdzob la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ci ltar na don dam pa la mkhas pa rnams lag/
145a3(mdo sde): ci ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ci ltar na bdag shes pa rnams lags/ ci ltar na 'jig rten shes pa rnams lags/ bcom
145a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye/ ci ltar na mngal gyi dri mas ma gos par skye/ ci ltar na khyim gyi gnas nas
145a5(mdo sde): mngon par byung ba rnams lags/ ci ltar na 'tshe ba yongs su dag pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na yid yongs su dag pa rnams lags/ ci ltar na yid yongs mi
145a6(mdo sde): skyo ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bka' bzhin bgyid pa rnams lags/ ci ltar na de bzhin 'jam zhing khro gnyer ma mchis pa rnams
145a7(mdo sde): lags/ ci ltar na mang du thos pa rnams lags/ ci ltar na dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa rnams/ ci ltar na chos kyi rgyal po'i sras rnams lags
145a8(mdo sde): ci ltar na brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong bas bsu ba rnams lags/ ci ltar na bsam pa dang bag la nyal ba 'tshal ba rnams lags/ ci ltar na sem/
145b1(mdo sde): can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i ga ga 'tshal rnams lags/ ci ltar na nges pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na 'grogs pa bde ba rnams lags/ ci ltar na bsdu ba'i
145b2(mdo sde): dngos po la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ci ltar na tshul du shis pa rnams lags/ ci ltar na gnas bca' ba rnams lags/ ci ltar na rtsi'i rgyal po'i shing chen
145b3(mdo sde): po lta bu rnams lags/ ci ltar na bsod nams bgyi ba la brtson pa rnams lags/ ci ltar ni bsod nams sa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar na
145b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' dag myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
145b5(mdo sde): 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu legs so legs so//
145b6(mdo sde): yang rigs kyi bu khyod skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo ngal po che dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir
145b7(mdo sde): zhugs shing / de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la khyod 'di lta bu don 'dri bar sems pa legs pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon pa
145b8(mdo sde): yid zung shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do/ bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas/ bcom
146a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub
146a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos kyi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa
146a3(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ zang zing gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ lan du phan 'dogs pa la mi re ba'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams
146a4(mdo sde): yin/ snying rje ba'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ mi brnyas pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ snying stang gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnam
146a5(mdo sde): yin/ mchod pa dang rim gro'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ mi gnas pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnas yin/ yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa phun sum
146a6(mdo sde): tshogs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems
146a7(mdo sde): dpa' zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos rnams 'dzin cing kun chub par byed de/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i phyir ma yin/ shes ri khe 'dod pa'i phyir ma yin//
146a8(mdo sde): grags pa 'dod pa'i phyir ma yin te/ gzhan du na de ltar sems can 'di dag gi sdug bsngal thams cad ci ltar zad par bya snyam ste/ chos de dag kyang zang zing
146b1(mdo sde): med pa'i sems kyis gnyis su med par gzhan dag la yang yang dag par ston to// ci ltar na rgyal po 'am/ blon po chen po la yang dag par ston pa de ltar
146b2(mdo sde): gdol pa 'am/ gdol bu la yang dag par ston na/ de ma yin pa grong rdal gyi mi dang yul gyi mi gzhan dag lta ci smos/ chos kyi sbyin pa des khengs par yang mi
146b3(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa
146b4(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bdag gis dbyig pa bor ba dang mtshon cha bor ba yin te/ gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de
146b5(mdo sde): nyid la gzhag go// de sems can thams cad la phar 'du shes pa yin/ mar 'du shes pa yin/ bur 'du shes pa yin/ rtsa lag tu 'du shes pa yin/
146b6(mdo sde): nye thu 'am snag gi gnyen mtshams gang yang rung bar shes pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ de de bzhin gshegs pas kyang skye ba 'pho
146b7(mdo sde): ba de dang de dag tu sems can gyi rigs su gang khyed kyi pha 'am ma 'am bu 'am rtsa lags gam nye thu 'am/ snag gi gnyen mtshams gang yang rung ba'i gnas su
146b8(mdo sde): ma gyur pa'i sems can de dag med do zhes gsungs so snyam nas/ de srog chags su gyur pa phra mo'i phyir yang bdag gi sha dag gis kyang phan 'dogs na/
147a1(mdo sde): @srog chags chen po che ba gzhan dag lta ci smos te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/
147a2(mdo sde): ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' zang zing gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can gang dag mi dge ba'i
147a3(mdo sde): las rab tu byed pa mthong na/ de dag zang zing gis sdug cing zang zing gis bsdus nas mi dge ba'i gnas de nas bslang ste/ dge ba'i gnas su 'god do//
147a4(mdo sde): de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi kyang sbyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub po// byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa sbyin pa na mi dge ba'i
147a5(mdo sde): chos phrag dog dang ser sna dang / ngan sems gsum spangs pa yin no zhes gsungs te/ de bas na bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su bslab cing sbyin
147a6(mdo sde): ba sbyin par bya'o snyam ste/ de sbyin pa yang sbyin zhing / sbyin pa des khengs par yang mi 'gyur te/ de ltar na byang chub sos dpa' zang zing gi sbyin pa phun sum
147a7(mdo sde): tshogs pa yin no/ ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lan du phan 'dogs pa la mi re ba'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpas sbyin
147a8(mdo sde): pa sbyin pa yang 'dod pa'i phyir sbyin pa yang mi sbyin/ phan 'dogs su re ba'i phyir ma yin/ don gyi phyir ma yin/ g.yog gi phyir ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi tshul
147b1(mdo sde): gyi phyir ma yin gyi gzhan du na 'di snyam du sems te/ gang byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa'i ngang tshul can du 'gyur ba 'di ni chos nyid yin no snyam ste/ de rgyu de dang rkyen/
147b2(mdo sde): de dang gzhi des pan gtags pa'i lam lan du phan 'dogs pa thams cad mi re bar sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lan du phan 'dogs
147b3(mdo sde): pa la mi re ba'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa
147b4(mdo sde): sems can sdug bsngal ba dang / bkres pa dang / skom pa dang / gcer bu dang / gos ngan pa dang / bgo ba ngan pa dang / mgon med pa dang / dpung gnyen med pa
147b5(mdo sde): dang / skyabs med pa dang / gnas med pa dang / rten med pa lta bu bsod nams med pa lta bu dag mthong na de dag la snying rje'i sems rab tu skyed cing de 'di snyam du
147b6(mdo sde): sems te/ sems can gang zhig gi phyir/ bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i sems can de dag ni sdug bsngal ba
147b7(mdo sde): mgon med pa dpung gnyen med pa skyabs med pa/ gnas med pa rten med pa 'di dag yin te/ kun tu 'khyam na nam zhig bdag sems can de dag gi mgon dang /
147b8(mdo sde): dpung gnyen dang skyabs dang gnas dang rten du 'gyur snyam nas/ de snying rje bas rab tu mi bzad de/ bdog cing yod pa'i dngos pos sems can de dag la phan 'dogs so//
148a1(mdo sde): ban btags pa'i mod la skyes pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des kyang khengs par mi 'gyur te// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i sprin brdzu
