177b6(mdo sde): 'di ni de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba de dag la gang sems mngon par mos shing shin tu dga' ba 'di ni de'i bzod pa'i
177b7(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin pa'o// mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba de dag nyid la gang sems mi skyo ba 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba
177b8(mdo sde): de dag nyid la gang nye bar rtogs pa 'di ni de'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba de dag nyid la gang sna tshogs pa 'di ni de'i shes
178a1(mdo sde): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang rim gro bya/
178a2(mdo sde): ba'i thabs mkhas pa yin no/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa rnams yin no//
178a3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi dman pa'i
178a4(mdo sde): smon lam pa rnams yin/ ma zhum pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin/ sems can thams cad kyi don la brtson pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas tham
178a5(mdo sde): cad kyis yang dag par bsngags pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin/ bdud thams cad shin tu tshar gcod pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin/ gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog
178a6(mdo sde): ba'i smon lam pa rnams yin/ mtha' yas pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin/ mi skrag pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin/ yongs su mi skyo ba'i smon lam pa rnam
178a7(mdo sde): yin/ legs par yongs su rdzogs pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi dman pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/
178a8(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' srid pa'i bde ba 'dod cing smon lam mi 'debs te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi gnas pa'i smon
178b1(mdo sde): lam pa yin no// ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ma zhum pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni khams gsum las skyo ba dang / 'dod/
178b2(mdo sde): chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog par smon lam mi 'debs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ma zhum pa'i smon lam pa yin no// ci ltar na byang chub sems
178b3(mdo sde): dpa' sems can thams cad kyi don la brtson pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems can gyi khams ci snyed pa ma lus
178b4(mdo sde): par thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzlas nas/ bdag phyis sangs rgyas kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes smon lam
178b5(mdo sde): 'debs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ci ni thams cad kyi don la brtson pa'i smon lam pa yin no// ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas
178b6(mdo sde): thams cad kyis yang dag par bsngags pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar byang chub kyi sems ma bskyed pa'i
178b7(mdo sde): sems can gyi khams ci snyed pa de dag thams cad byang chub kyi sems bskyed du bcug ste/ mthar gyis byang chub kyi sbyang pa spyod du btsud nas byang chub
178b8(mdo sde): kyi spyad par 'dug pa rnams la mchod pa dang bkur sti bya'o// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gsol ba gdab po// yongs su mya ngan las 'da'
179a1(mdo sde): pa rnams kyang sems can la phan pa'i phyir bzhugs su gsol lo zhes smon lam 'debs ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
179a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par bsngags pa'i smon lam pa yin no// ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bdud thams cad shin tu tshar gcod pa'i
179a3(mdo sde): smon lam pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di ltar bdag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing na ci nas kyang
179a4(mdo sde): bdud kyi sgra 'am/ bdud kyi ris lha rnams 'byung bar yang mi 'gyur ba de ltar bdag gis bya'o// zhes smon lam 'debs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dang
179a5(mdo sde): bdud thams cad shin tu tsher gcod pa'i smon lam pa yin no// ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/
179a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ni gzhan gyi dring la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam mi 'debs kyi byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag nyid
179a7(mdo sde): kyis shes rab kyis dpyad de/ sems can gyi khams sdug bsngal la bltas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam 'debs te/
179a8(mdo sde): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa'i smon lam pa yin no// ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas pa'i smon lam pa
179b1(mdo sde): ma nan/ byang chub sems dpa' ni 'angasas/ byang chub sems dpa'i phyogs 'ga' zhig gzung rtsi ba'i smon lam mi 'dangs kyi byang chub pangs/
179b2(mdo sde): dpa' ni thags zas pa gcig tu gapar nas/ pus ma g.yas pa'i lha ngas la gzugs te/ sems skyo bar byas nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
179b3(mdo sde): khams rnams su bltas te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag phyogs bcun gnas pa dang / gang dag dka' ba spring ba la gnas pa dang / gang dag byang chug
179b4(mdo sde): kyi snying po la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas gang dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / gang dag chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de rnams la snying thag pa
179b5(mdo sde): nas brtsams te/ de dag gis chos bstan pa ci snyed pa de dag la mos par byed do// mos par gyur nas rjes su yi rang ngo // rjes su yi rang nas bla na med pa yang
179b6(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du yongs su bsngo ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas pa'i smon lam pa yin no// ci ltar na byang chub sems
179b7(mdo sde): dpa' mi skrag pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa yin yang chos zab mo rnams thos pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi che ba zab mo
179b8(mdo sde): thos pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par rol pa zab mo thos pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa'i tshul zab mo thos kyang mi skrag mi dngang dang
180a1(mdo sde): bar mi 'gyur ro// de 'di snyam du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyang mtha' yas sangs rgyas kyi yul yang mtha' yas/ sangs rgyas
180a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis// sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa yang mtha' yas te/ de ni bdag 'dra bas shes par mi nus kyi/ sangs rgyas
180a3(mdo sde): ngag nyid kyis mkhyen gyi bdag gis mi shes so snyam du sems te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi skrag pa'i smon lam pa yin no// ci ltar na byang chub
180a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' yongs su mi skyo ba'i smon pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can dmu god sems can gdul dka' bar rig pa ste/ de
180a5(mdo sde): rnams kyis yi chad nas 'di lta bu'i dmu rgod 'di lta bur gdul dka' ba'i sems can 'di dag gis chog go zhes ste/ de'i phyir yongs su skyo zhing rgyab kyis phyogs
180a6(mdo sde): par gyur te/ gang na sems can 'di lta bu dag gi ming yang mi thos pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag par smon lam mi 'debs so// sems can gyi don la
180a7(mdo sde): ma phyogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni yongs su dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar yang mi 'gyur te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' shes rab can ni 'di ltar
180a8(mdo sde): sems can gyi khams thams cad na sems can gang rnams ngan pa brtson 'grus chung ba blun po glen pa lug ltar lhag pa'i rang bzhin can/ yongs su mya ngan las
180b1(mdo sde): mi 'da' ba'i chos can sems can gyi khams ma lus pa 'di las bsnyigs pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis spangs pa/
180b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ba yod pa de dag bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dus par gyur la/ bdag gis de dag byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug du bcug ste/ bla na med pa yang
180b3(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed do/ byang chub sems dpa' de ltar sems pa'i sems bskyed
180b4(mdo sde): pa re re la yang bdud kyi gnas thams cad rab tu g.yo'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyang de'i bsngags pa gsung bar 'gyur ro// de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs
180b5(mdo sde): su dag par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang myur tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yod
180b6(mdo sde): mi skyo ba'i smon lam pa yin no// rigs kyi bu ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' legs pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la
180b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug ste/ bdud kyi dpung gzhom pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
180b8(mdo sde): par sangs rgyas dang / yang de las par smon myi 'debs pa 'di ni legs par yongs su rdzogs pa'i smon lam pa zhes bya'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na mar ram 'bru
181a1(mdo sde): mar gyi snod khang chang du gang ste/ lhag par rdul phra rab tsam gyi thigs pa yang mi shong na/ de'i phyir e ma'o snod gang ba e pa'o sdong shin tu
181a2(mdo sde): gang ba zhes bya'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa la smon lam legs par yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir smon lam ma
181a3(mdo sde): rdzogs pa rdul phra rab tsam yang med do// de bas na legs par yongs su rdzogs pa'i smon lam zhes bya ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sem
181a4(mdo sde): dpa' smon lam phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// // rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' stob
181a5(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ zil gyis mi non pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ mi tshugs pa'i stobs phun sum
181a6(mdo sde): tshegs pa rnams yin/ bsod nams kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ shes rab kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ 'khor gyi stobs phun sum
181a7(mdo sde): tshogs pa rnams yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ dbang gi stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ gzungs kyi stobs phun sum
181a8(mdo sde): tshogs pa rnams yin/ rnam par mi 'khrug pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ bka' mi gcog pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams/
181b1(mdo sde): yin no// rigs kyi bu ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' zil gyis mi non pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
181b2(mdo sde): pha rol rgol ba kun gyis zil gyis mi non pa yin te/ de ltar na zil gyis mi non pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi
181b3(mdo sde): tshugs pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de'i stobs la gang stobs kyis thub pa'i sems can de lta bu'i sems can gyi
181b4(mdo sde): ris na med de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi tshugs pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyi stobs
181b5(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ma bsgrubs pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs 'jig rten pa 'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa de gang yang
181b6(mdo sde): med de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi stobs phun
181b7(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes ma gtogs par/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang yang yang
181b8(mdo sde): dag pa'i shes rab kyis ma mthong ba dang / mngon tu ma byas pa dang / khong du ma chung ba de dag med de/ de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab
182a1(mdo sde): kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byad
182a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i 'khor tshul khrims nyams pa ma yin/ lta ba nyams pa ma yin/ cho ga nyams pa ma yin/ 'tsho ba nyams pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems
182a3(mdo sde): dpa'i 'khor byang chub sems dpa' mtshungs par spyod pa rnams nyid yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar
182a4(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi rdzu 'phrul gyi yul thams cad dang nyan thos
182a5(mdo sde): dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi yul thams cad zil gyis gnon te/ de yang rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pa mchog gis zil gyis gnon to// de 'dod na 'dzam bu
182a6(mdo sde): gling skra nyag ma gcig gi rtse mo la 'jog go/ de bzhin du gling bzhi pa dang / stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams dang / stong gnyis dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
182a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams kyang de bzhin no/ 'dod na gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rdul phra rab gcig la 'jog go// de bzhin du gang ga'i klung gnyis
182a8(mdo sde): kyi bye ma snyed dang gsum dang bzhi dang / lnga dang bcu dang nyi shu dang sum bcu dang bzhi bcu dang lnga bcu nas brjod du med pa'i gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi
182b1(mdo sde): khams rdul phra rab gcig la 'jog kyang rdul phra rab de la gang ba dang bri bar yang mi mngon te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de rnams kyang phan tshun du 'dres par mi 'gyur//
182b2(mdo sde): sems can de rnams la gnod par mi 'gyur te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems
182b3(mdo sde): dpa' dbang gi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'dod na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun
182b4(mdo sde): gyis gang bar byin gyis rlobs so// de 'dod na brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar du/ rin po che rnams pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang bar byin
182b5(mdo sde): gyis rlob ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dbang gi stobs phuni sum tshogs pa yin no/ ji ltar na gzungs kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/
182b6(mdo sde): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ci snyed cig don tha dad pa dang
182b7(mdo sde): brjod pa tha dad pa dang tshul tha dad pa'i chos bshed pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' skad cig yud tsam thang cig gcig la thams cad 'dzin par byed/ khong du chud dang
182b8(mdo sde): byed/ bsgom par byed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi
183a1(mdo sde): @#'khrugs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa
183a2(mdo sde): rgyas rnams ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpas byin gyi rlabs pa la gang rnam par 'khrugs par byed pa'i sems can de lta bu'i sems can ris na med de/ de ltar
183a3(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi 'khrugs pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no// rigs bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bka' mi
183a4(mdo sde): gcog pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ thabs mkhas pa ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpa'i bka' gcog pa'i sems can de lta bu'i sems kyi ris
183a5(mdo sde): nam mthong ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' bka' mi gcog pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan
183a6(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' ye shes bun
183a7(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gang zag la bdag med pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// chos la bdag med dri/
183a8(mdo sde): ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// nyi tshe ba ma yin pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi ye shes phun sum
183b1(mdo sde): tshogs pa rnams yin/ byin gyis rlabs kyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ mi 'phrogs pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ sems can thag
183b2(mdo sde): cad kyi sbyong ba la rnam par lta ba'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ chos thams cad kyi mtshan
183b3(mdo sde): nyid kyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ci ltar na byang chub
183b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' gang zag la bdag med pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa rnams
183b5(mdo sde): yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' phung po rnams skye ba yang yang dag par mthong 'jig pa dang 'gog pa yang yang dag par mthong ngo // des
183b6(mdo sde): phung po skye ba rnams snying po med pa dang / byed pa med pa dang / gsog du yang dag par mthong / phung po 'gag pa rnams 'jig par yang dag par mthong ste/
183b7(mdo sde): de 'di snyam du phung po 'di dag ni bdag med pa'i sems can med pa srog med pa gso ba med pa/ gang zag med pa yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang byis pa so so'i skye bo
183b8(mdo sde): kha dag tu 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa 'di dag na 'di dag bdag cag gi phung po rnams bdag go// bdag cag gi phung po rnams la bdag yod do/ bdag cag gi
184a1(mdo sde): bdag la phung po rnams yod de/ bdag cag gi bdag ni phung po can no snyam ste/ de dag bdag tu 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pas/ de kho na nyid
184a2(mdo sde): khong du mi chud do/ de kho na nyid khong du ma chung bas/ mgal me'i 'khor lo ltar 'khor ba na 'khyam mo snyam du sems shing / de thams cad kyang byang chub sems
184a3(mdo sde): dpas yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gang zag la bdag med pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar
184a4(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' chos la bdag med pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chos su sgro 'dog pa dang / chos la skur ba yang
184a5(mdo sde): yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du shes te/ de 'di snyam du glo bur du byung ba'i chos la kun brtags pa'i ming gdags te/ chos de yang de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin/ yi ge de
184a6(mdo sde): dag kyang de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin mod kyi/ 'di ni ming tsam dang tha snyad tsam du bya yi/ 'di la mngon par zhen par bya'o// glo bur du byung ba'i chos de yang thams cad kyi
184a7(mdo sde): thams cad du med pa ma yin te/ gzhan gyi rkyen dang rkyen gyi rkyen la sdod pa dang / gzhan gyi rkyen rnams kyis 'byung zhing rkyen dang bral na 'gag pa'i chos 'di ni yod
184a8(mdo sde): do zhes de thams cad byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa ci lta bzhin du rab tu shes te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos la bdag med pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs
184b1(mdo sde): ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyi tse ba ma yin pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyi tshe ba'i ye shes skad cig gcig la 'jug
184b2(mdo sde): cing skad cig gnyis pa la mi 'jug pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes mthong ba ni skad cig thams cad la thogs par 'jug ste/ de ltar na byang chub sem
184b3(mdo sde): dpa' nyi tshe ba ma yin pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la
184b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpas nyan thos kyi ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang rab tu shes rang sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang rab tu shes/ byang chub dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang rab tu
184b5(mdo sde): shes/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang rab tu shes/ des ting nge 'dzin gang dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gang la nyan thos spod pa yang nga rab tu shes//
184b6(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin gang dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi nga spod yul gang la rang sangs rgyas spyod pa de yang rab tu shes/ ting nge 'dzin gang dang / ting nge 'dzin kyi spyod yul gang la byang chub
184b7(mdo sde): sems dpa'i spyod pa de yang rab tu shes/ ting nge 'dzin gang dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gang la de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa de yang rab tu shes te/ de bzhin gshes
184b8(mdo sde): pas skabs bye na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu shes kyi rnam par smin pas grub pa'i rang gi ye shes kyis ni ma yin no// ting nge 'dzin gzhan rnams ni rnam par
185a1(mdo sde): masmin pas grub pa'i rang gi ye shes kyis rab tu shes te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi ye shes phun sum
185a2(mdo sde): tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpas nyan thos kyi byin gyi rlabs kyang
185a3(mdo sde): ci lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes/ rang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyang ci lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes byang chub sems dpa'i byin kyi rlabs kyang ci lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes na/
185a4(mdo sde): sems can de ma yin pa gzhan dag gi lta ci smos te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byin kyi rlabs kyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ ji ltar na byang chub sems
185a5(mdo sde): mi phrogs pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes ni mu stegs can thams cad dang / bdud thams cad dang / nyan thos/
185a6(mdo sde): dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi 'phrogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sem
185a7(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi spyod pa la rnam par lta ba'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na// 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes yongs su dag pa dang zhing rnyog pa med pas/
185a8(mdo sde): sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ste/ des de na sems can la la byang chub du sems bskyed pa dag dang / la la byang chub tu sems bsgrub pa dag dang / la la
185b1(mdo sde): byang chub du sems ma bsgrubs pa dag dang / la la sa dang po la gnas pa dag dang / la la sa bcu pa'i bar la gnas pa dag dang / la la mngon par rdzogs par
185b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas pa dag dang / la la mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dag dang / la la bya ba kun byas te/ yongs su mya ngan
185b3(mdo sde): las 'da' ba dag dang / la la nyan thos kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag dang / la la rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba
185b4(mdo sde): dag pa dang / la la bde 'gror skye ba dag rta dang / la la ngan 'gror skye ba dag mthong ngo / de ltar na sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa la rnam par lta ste/ de ltar
185b5(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi spod pa la rnam par lta ba'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lhan gyis
185b6(mdo sde): grub pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' spyong ba 'am 'greng ba 'am/ 'dug pa 'am/ 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba na
185b7(mdo sde): lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes 'byung ste/ 'di lta ste dper na mi gnyid kyis log dbugs 'byung ba dang / rngub pa dag lhun gyis grub cing 'byung ngo // byang chub
185b8(mdo sde): sems dpa'i ye shes de yang de bzhin du blta'o// ye shes de yang thams cad du mi chags par 'jug ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lhun gyis grub pa'i
186a1(mdo sde): ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi ye shes phun pa sum tshogs pa yin//
186a2(mdo sde): zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad mtshan nyid mtshungs par yang rab tu shes/ mtshan nyid gcig pa yang rab tu shes/ mtshan nyid du yang
186a3(mdo sde): yang rab tu shes/ sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du rab tu shes/ yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid du yang rab tu shes te/ de ltar na byang chub sem
186a4(mdo sde): dpa' chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes
186a5(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' zag pa med pa'i ye shes 'jig rten thams cad las 'das pa dang ldan pa yin te/
186a6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na//
186a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sa dang /
186a8(mdo sde): mtshungs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yangs shing tshad med pa rnams yin/ sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa
186b1(mdo sde): rnams yin/ gnod pa dang lan du phan 'dogs pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ chos kyi sprin chen po kun gzed pa rnams yin// sems can thams cad kyi
186b2(mdo sde): gnas su gyur pa rnams yin// dge ba'i chos kyi sa bon gyi gzhir gyur pa rnams yin/ rin po che'i snod du gyur pa rnams yin/ rtsi chen po'i snod du gyur pa yin//
186b3(mdo sde): mi skul ba rnams yin/ mi sdang ba rnams yin no/ rigs kyi bu de la ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yangs shing tshad med pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper
186b4(mdo sde): na sa chen po ni thams cad du langs shing tshad med do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'di lta ste/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyis kun tu yangs shing
186b5(mdo sde): tshad med pa yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yangs shing tshad med pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa yin
186b6(mdo sde): zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ sa chen po ni 'di ltar yo byad rnam pa de dang de dag gis sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa yin no de bzhin du byang chub
186b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' yang sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grub dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' dang
186b8(mdo sde): phan par 'gyur ba'i yo byad rnams du ma de dang de dag gis sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams
187a1(mdo sde): cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gnod pa dang lan du phan 'dogs pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/ 'di lta/
187a2(mdo sde): ste/ rigs kyi bu dper na/ sa chen pos ni gnod pas kyang zhe 'gras par mi 'gyur/ phan pas kyang rjes su chags par mi 'gyur te/ de la gnyis su 'du shes pa mi 'byung ba
187a3(mdo sde): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang gnod pa dag gis kyang zhe 'gras par mi 'gyur phan pa dag gis kyang rjes su chags par mi 'gyur te/ de ni sems can de dag
187a4(mdo sde): la rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba yang mi skye ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gnod pa dang lan du phan 'dogs pa dang bral ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems
187a5(mdo sde): dpa' chos kyi sprin po kun zed pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ sa chen po ni sprin chen po las bab pa'i chu'i klung chen po kun zed de/ bzod cing kun
187a6(mdo sde): 'dzin to// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sprin chen po las chos kyi 'ong ba chen po rab tu phab pa kun zed cing bzod la
187a7(mdo sde): 'dzin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sprin chen po kun zed pa yin no// ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pa
187a8(mdo sde): yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ sa chen po ni sems can thams cad 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i gnas su gyur pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
187b1(mdo sde): yang sems can thams cad kyi bde 'gro dang mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba'i gnas su gyur pa yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi
187b2(mdo sde): gnas su gyur pa yin no/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i chos kyi sa bon gyi gzhir gyur pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ sa bon thams
187b3(mdo sde): cad ni sa chen po gzhir gyur pa las skye'o// de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i chos kyi sa bon thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' gzhir gyur
187b4(mdo sde): pa las skyes te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i chos kyi sa bon gzhir gyur pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i snod du gyur pa yin
187b5(mdo sde): zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ sa chen po na rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi snod yin te/ sa chen po la rin po che sna tshogs kun snang ngo // de bzhin du byang
187b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' yang yon tan rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi snod du gyur pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' la yon tan rin po che sna tshogs kun snang ste// de
187b7(mdo sde): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i snod du gyur pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rtsi chen po'i snod du gyur pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste
187b8(mdo sde): dper na/ rtsi chen po gang dag nad rnam pa sna tshogs zhi bar gyur pa dag kyang sa chen po la gnas te 'jig rten na snang ngo // de bzhin du gang dag gis nyon mongs pa'i
188a1(mdo sde): nad rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams zhi bar 'gyur ba'i chos kyi rtsi chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' la gnas shing 'jig rten du 'byung bar
188a2(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rtsi chen po'i snod du gyur pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi skul ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper
188a3(mdo sde): na/ sa chen po ni 'di lta ste sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / rlung dang nyi ma dang sbrul gyis reg pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad kyis mi skal ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub
188a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' yang 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad las byung ba'i phyi nang gi sdug bsngal thams cad kyis mi skal pa yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
188a5(mdo sde): mi sgul ba yin no// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i mi sdang ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ sa chen po ni glang po che'i rgyal po dang / ri
188a6(mdo sde): dgas kyi rgyal po rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgra thos kyang mi skrag mi dngang dngang bar mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang bdud dang mu stegs can thams cad
188a7(mdo sde): kyi sgra thos na/ mi skrag mi dngang dngang bar mi 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi dngang ba yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan
188a8(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' sa chen po sa dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' chu dang
188b1(mdo sde): mtshungs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i chos la gzhol ba rnams yin/ dkar po'i chos thams cad skyed pa rnams yin dga' ba dang /
188b2(mdo sde): dang pa dang / rangs pa'i gsher ba can rnams yin/ nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyun thams cad skul ba rnams yin/ dang zhing rnyog pa med de gsal ba rnams yin/
188b3(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyun dung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa rnams yin/ 'dod pa la sred pa zlog pa rnams yin/ zab cing gting dpag dka' ba rnams yin/ mthon dman
188b4(mdo sde): 'grengs pa rnams yin/ nyon mongs pa'i rdul thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i chos la
188b5(mdo sde): gzhol ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ chu ni gzhol bar 'gro ba dang / gzhol bar rgyu ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang dge ba'i
188b6(mdo sde): chos la gzhol zhing dge ba'i chos kyi phyir rgyu ba yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i chos la gzhol ba yin no// ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
188b7(mdo sde): dkar po'i chos thams cad bskyed pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ chu ni rtsa dang shing rgol ba dang / rtsi dang nags tshal thams cad bskyed de/ skyes
188b8(mdo sde): pa rnams kyang phyir zhing rgyas par byed do/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang ting nge 'dzin gyi chus byang chub kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par
189a1(mdo sde): bskyed do/ skyes pa rnams kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shin tu gyur pa'i bar du phyir yang rgyas par byed do/ thams cad
189a2(mdo sde): mkhyen pa nyid kyi shing du gyur pa dag gi sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis sems can rnams 'tsho bar gyur te/ de ltar na byang chub sems
189a3(mdo sde): dpa' dkar po'i chos thams cad skyed pa yin no// ji ltar na sems dpa' dga' ba dang / dad pa dang rangs pa'i gsher ba can yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste
189a4(mdo sde): dper na/ chu ni ngo bo nyid kyis gsher pa can yin te/ sems can 'di lta ste dper na/ chu ni ngo bo nyid kyis gsher ba can te/ gzhan yang gsher bar byed//
189a5(mdo sde): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang ngo bo nyid kyis dka' ba dang / dad pa dang rangs pa'i gsher ba can yin te/ sems can gzhan yang dga' ba dang / dad pa
189a6(mdo sde): dang rangs pa'i gsher pa can du byed do// de la dga' ba ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos tshol ba'o// dad pa ni sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la rten pa'o// /
189a7(mdo sde): rangs pa ni gang sems dag pa ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba dang dad pa dang rangs pa'i gsher ba can yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dang/
189a8(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyun thams cad srung ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ chu ni shing gi rnam pa dang / rtsa'i rnam pa'i rtsa ba dag gi rgyun rnams
189b1(mdo sde): srul lo// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang bsgom pa la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chus nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyun thams cad skul te/ ji ltar na nyon
189b2(mdo sde): mongs pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyun 'di dag ming yang mi shes pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i dri nga ba'i bag chags kyang med par 'gyur ba de lta bur srul te/ de ltar na byang chub
189b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' mnyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyun thams cad srul pa yin no// ji ltar na dang zhing rnyog pa med de gsal ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/
189b4(mdo sde): chu ni rang bzhin gyis dang zhing rnyog pa med pa/ gsal lo// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang rang bzhin gyis dang zhing rnyog pa med pa gsal ba yin no//
189b5(mdo sde): de la bag la nyal ba dang kun nas ldang ba dang bral bas na dang ba'o// 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dang bral bas rnyog pa med do// de la bag la nyal
189b6(mdo sde): dang bas na gsal ba ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dang zhing rnyog pa med de gsal ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i
189b7(mdo sde): yongs su gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed ce na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ chu ni sa chen po dpyid kyi tsha bas gdungs pa dang / de las gzhan yang sems
189b8(mdo sde): can rnams dpyid kyi tsha bas gdungs pa rnams rab tu zhi bar byed do/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pas gdungs pa'i sems can gyi kham
190a1(mdo sde): thams cad chos kyi chus rab tu zhi bar byed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i yongs su gdung ba rab tu zhi bar
190a2(mdo sde): byed pa'o// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa la sred pa bzlog pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ chu ni skom pas nyen pa'i sems can
190a3(mdo sde): rnams kyi skom pa rnam par zlog go// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang yul la sred pas nyen pa'i sems can nyen par gyur pa dag la gang gis sems can
190a4(mdo sde): de dag yul la sred pa ldog par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos kyi char mngon par 'bebs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa la sred pa bzlog par byed do// /
190a5(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' zab cing gting dpag dka' ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ chu'i 'jings ni zab cing gting dpag dka' ba yin/
190a6(mdo sde): no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ye shes yang dag par bsgrub pa yang 'di lta ste/ bdud thams cad dang mu stegs can thams cad kyis gting dpag dka' zhing
190a7(mdo sde): zab pa yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' zab cing gting dpag dka' ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mthon dman 'gengs pa yin zhe na/
190a8(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ chu ni klung na sa'i phyogs mthon dman 'gengs so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos kyi chu'i klung gis sems can
190b1(mdo sde): gyi khams mthon dman 'gengs te/ ji ltar na chus 'gengs pa ltar sems can la gnod par byed pa de lta bu byang chub sems dpa' ma yin gyi sems can de rnams la/
190b2(mdo sde): snying rtse ba'i phyir chos kyi chu klung 'debs shing de dag la gnod par mi byed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mthon dman 'gengs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub
190b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i rdul thams can rab tu zhi bar byed pa yin zhe na// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ chus ni sa phyogs skam zhing rdul 'thul ba
190b4(mdo sde): thams cad snum par byed cing rdul de dag zhi bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can sems rtsu ba pa rnams 'di lta ste/ shes rab la
190b5(mdo sde): gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyi chus sems snum par byed cing / sems can de dag gi nyon mongs pa'i rdul thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed de/ de ltar na byang chub
190b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i rdul thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' chu dang mtshung
190b7(mdo sde): pa rnams yin no// / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' me dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/
190b8(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ nyon mongs pa'i phyag dar khung thams cad sreg par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bu rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed/ nyon mongs
191a1(mdo sde): pa'i 'dam thams cad kyang skam par byed de/ me'i phung po dang 'dra ba rnams yin/ snang bar gyur pa rnams yin/ skrag
191a2(mdo sde): par byed pa rnams yin/ dbugs 'byin pa rnams yin/ sems can thams cad kyi thun mongs du gyur pa rnams yin/ mchod par bgyid pa rnams
191a3(mdo sde): yin/ mi brnyas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i phyag dar khung thams cad sreg ce na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta
191a4(mdo sde): ste dper na/ me ni phyag dar khung dang rtsa dang shing dang gel ba dang rtsi dang sdong po thams cad sreg go// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang shes rab kyis bag la
191a5(mdo sde): nyal ba dang / kun nas ldang ba dang 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gi nyon mongs pa'i phyag dar khung thams cad sreg ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mong
191a6(mdo sde): pa'i phyag dar khung thams cad sreg pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su smin par byed ce na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/
191a7(mdo sde): dper na/ me ni lo tog dang rtsi dang sdong po'i rnam pa thams cad yongs su smin par byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang shes rab kyis nang gis
191a8(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su smin par byed pa'ang / ji ltar 'jig par mi 'gyur ba de ltar yongasu smin par byed do// de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su/
191b1(mdo sde): smin par byed pa'o/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i 'dam thams cad skam par byed ce na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na me ni chu phran gyi 'dam
191b2(mdo sde): thams cad skam par byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang shes rab kyis zag pa nyon mongs pa'i 'dam thams cad skam par byed de// de ltar na byang chub
191b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i 'dam thams cad skam par byed do// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' me'i phung po dang 'dra ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste
191b4(mdo sde): dper na/ sems can drang ba'i nad kyis nyen pa rnams kyi grang ba med par bya ba'i phyir me'i phung po byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa
191b5(mdo sde): grang ba'i nad kyis btab pa'i sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i grang ba'i nad med par bya ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyis rab tu dro bar byed de/ de ltar na byang chub
191b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' me'i phung po dang 'dra ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' snang bar gyur pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu dper na/ gangs kyi rtse mo 'am/ ri 'bigs
191b7(mdo sde): byed kyi rtse mo na/ me'i phung po chen po 'bar ba des dpag tshad gcig khor khor yug du snang bar byed/ dpag tshad gnyis kho ra khor yug dang / dpag tshad gsum
191b8(mdo sde): kho ra khor yug du yang snang bar byed do/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang ye shes kyi snang bas dpag tshad brgyar yang khyab par byed/ dpag tshad stong du
192a1(mdo sde): yang khyab par byed/ dpag tshad stong phrag brgyar yang / khyab par byed pa nas 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tshad grangs med pa'i bar du yang khyab
192a2(mdo sde): bar byas nas/ sems can thams cad la ye shes kyis snang bar byed de/ ye shes kyi snang ba des mi shes pa'i mun pa mun nag thams cad rnam par sel te/ de ltar
192a3(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' snang bar gyur pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' skrag par byed pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ ri dgas khro bo
192a4(mdo sde): 'am/ ri dgas khro rgyal po khro bos me'i phung po chen po mthong na skrag cing dngang la dngang bar gyur cing 'di lta ste/ me'i 'jigs pas gnas de ring bas kyang shin
192a5(mdo sde): tu ring bar spong ngo // de bzhin du bdud rnams sam bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis kyang chub sems dpa' mthong nas/ skrag cing dngang la dngang bar gyur cing
192a6(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ gzi brjid cung ba'i phyir/ gang du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ming yang mi thos na/ mthong ba lta smos kyang mi smos par ring ba bas
192a7(mdo sde): shin du ring bar sa'i phyogs de yongasu spong ngo // de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' skrag par byed pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dbugs 'byin pa
192a8(mdo sde): 'byin pa'i lan zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ mi la la zhig 'brog dgon par 'khyams pa las me'i phung po chen po mthong ste/ de de logs su song ba
192b1(mdo sde): dang / deb de la grong ngam dzi'u brang mthong nas/ de shugs byin te/ rab tu dbugs byin nas 'jigs pa thams cad bral bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems/
192b2(mdo sde): dpa' yang 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon par 'khyams pa'i sems can rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' mthong na shugs par 'gyur rab tu dbugs phyin par 'gyur/
192b3(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dbugs 'byin pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
192b4(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi thun mong du gyur pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ me ni sems can thams cad kyi thun mong du gyur pa ste/ ji ltar rgyal po
192b5(mdo sde): la phan par nye bar gnas pa ltar gdol bu la yang de bzhin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can thams cad kyi thun mong du gyur pa yin te/
192b6(mdo sde): ji ltar rgyal po la phan par nye bar gnas pa ltar gdol bu la yang de bzhin no// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi thun mong du gyur
192b7(mdo sde): pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mchod par bya ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ me la ni bram ze dang rgyal rigs dang / grong rdal dang
192b8(mdo sde): mi dang / yul gyi mi rnams kyis mchod do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'di lta ste/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten
193a1(mdo sde): gyis ston par 'du shes pas mchod do// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mchod par bya ba yin no// ji ltar na mi brnyas pa yin zhe na/
193a2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ me stag chu nga yang tshig bla'i bdag nyid yin pas na mi brnyas pa yin no// de bzhin du mos pas spyod pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems
193a3(mdo sde): dpa' mthu stobs rnyed pa theg pa chen po la las dang po pa yang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mi rnyas pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha dang klu
193a4(mdo sde): dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'di ring po mi thogs par byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
193a5(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar khong du chud de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi brnyas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang
193a6(mdo sde): ldan na byang chub sems dpa' me dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no// / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar dang mtshungs
193a7(mdo sde): pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gnas med par spyod pa dang / spyod yul kun tu mu med pa dang / sems can nga rgyal gyis bsnyems pa'i rtse mo
193a8(mdo sde): 'thor zhing 'jig la rab tu snyil bar byed pa dang / chos kyi cher sprin chen po kun nas skyed pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed
193b1(mdo sde): ba dang / sems can thams cad la chos dkar po las 'thun par byung ba'i dbugs dbyung ba dang / rngub pa'i srog nye bar sbyor ba dang / chos kyi char sprin dpag tu med pa
193b2(mdo sde): kun 'dzin pa dang / chos rnam pa tha dad pa'i gzhal med khang chen po'i bkod pa rnam par dbye ba thams cad rnam par 'byed cing yongs su 'god pa dang 'khor gyi
193b3(mdo sde): dkyil 'khor dpag bsams kyi shing las shin tu byung ba'i chos kyi gtam yang dag par nges pa'i me tog yid du 'ong ba'i char rtag tu mngon par 'bebs
193b4(mdo sde): pa dang / bskal pa grangs med par dkar po'i dkyil 'khor yongs su bsags pa ting nge 'dzin dang rnam par thar pa dang gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho dang ri dang 'od dang
193b5(mdo sde): zla ba dang nyi ma dang / chos kyi tshul dang / nags tshal dang khang pa dang / dge ba'i 'khor yug ri las sogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i sems can gyi 'khor gyi dkyil
193b6(mdo sde): 'khor na 'dul ba yongs su smin pa mang po yang dag par gnas pa bla na med cing lus med pa'i gnas 'gyur bar 'jig pa'i ye shes kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor rab
193b7(mdo sde): tu gtong ba'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu de la ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gnas med par spyod pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rlung mar ni thams/
193b8(mdo sde): cad du thogs pa med cing gnas med rten med cing / gzugs med kyang nags tshal dang / khang pa dang / gzhal med khang dang ri rab dang / rgya mtsho las so//
194a1(mdo sde): pa thams cad la rang gi dgos pa byed par snang ngo // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar yang chos thams cad la kun tu mi gnas
194a2(mdo sde): pa yin te/ phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams dang / gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / mig gi khams dang //
194a3(mdo sde): gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i khams
194a4(mdo sde): dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang /
194a5(mdo sde): reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / mig gi
194a6(mdo sde): skye mched dang / gzugs kyi skye mched dang / rnab rna ba'i skye mched dang / sgra'i skye mched dang / sna'i skye mched dang / dri'i skye mched dang / lce'i skye mched
194a7(mdo sde): dang / ro'i skye mched dang / lus kyi skye mched dang / reg bya'i skye mched dang / yid kyi skye mched dang / chos kyi skye mched la mi gnas pa yin/ 'jig rten
194a8(mdo sde): ba'i chos rnams dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams dang / lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / 'khor los sgyur ba dang / brgya byin dang /
194b1(mdo sde): tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dag tu 'gyur ba dang / dbang phyug chen po dag tu 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag tu 'gyur ba dang / byang chub
194b2(mdo sde): sems dpa'i sa rnams dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dag la yang gnas par mi byed de/ de thams cad la mi gnas pas dngos po dang dngos po med pa dang /
194b3(mdo sde): gcig pa dang / tha dad pa dang / de bzhin nyid las sogs par rlom sems kyi rnam pa du mas ma gyur cing / dmigs pa med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgrib pa med
194b4(mdo sde): pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pas/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba las sogs pa yang med la phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig
194b5(mdo sde): rten gyi khams kun tu sems can thams cad kyi don thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal par thams cad du yang rgyu
194b6(mdo sde): la chos kyi lus kyis mi snang ba yang yin zhing mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gnas med par spyod pa yin no// rigs bu
194b7(mdo sde): ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' spyod yul kun tu mu med pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rlung mar ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
194b8(mdo sde): khams dpag tu med pa dag tu reg par byed de g.yob cing rgyu'o// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar yang chos mu med pa dag
195a1(mdo sde): kun rdzob dang / don dam par kun nas mthong zhing rgyas par byed/ reg par byed/ rnam par 'god cing smon te/ de bzhin gshes
195a2(mdo sde): pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dag dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi gnas dag tu yid kyi mgyogs
195a3(mdo sde): pa dang ldan zhing phyogs thams cad kyi mthar thug pa'i spyod yul bar gyur nas rgyu zhing 'gro ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' spyod yul
195a4(mdo sde): kun tu mu med pa yin no// rigs kyi bu ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can nga rgyal gyis bsnyems pa'i rtse mo 'thor zhing 'jig rten la rab tu
195a5(mdo sde): rnyil bar byed pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rlung mar ni ri dang / khyim dang / nags tshal gyi rtse mo dag 'dud bar byed/ rab tu rnal
195a6(mdo sde): bar byed/ rnam par 'jigs par byed/ 'thor bar byed/ mi snang bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar yang sems can
195a7(mdo sde): nga rgyal dang rlom pa dang / dregs pa dang / 'jig tshogs la ltang bu'i rtse mes snyems pa rnams gzugs dang dar la bab pa dang / longs spyod dang /
195a8(mdo sde): dbang dang stobs dang / che dang nad med pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / bzo dang / thos pa dang / yid gzhungs pa dang / g.yog dang / smra mkhas pa dang /
195b1(mdo sde): dpal che ba'i dregs pas myos pa dag dang / yang dag pa'i nan tan gyis bdag stod pa rnams la de dang / khyad zhugs pa'i phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa
195b2(mdo sde): dang / chos bstan pas/ nga rgyal choms par byed cing dge ba'i dri ma med pa la sbyor bar byed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can nga rgyal gyis
195b3(mdo sde): bsnyems pa'i rtse mo 'thor zhing 'jig la rab tu rnyil bar byed pa yin no// rigs kyi bu ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi char sprin chen po kun
195b4(mdo sde): nas bskyed pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rlung mar ni phyogs bzhi nas sprin gyi dkyil 'khor kha dog sna tshogs can dang / zab cing gsal la
195b5(mdo sde): mnyen zhing 'jam pa'i 'brug sgra rgya mtsho'i dbyangs can gla rol sna tshogs kyi sgra 'byin cing yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs rjes su grags pa dang / glog gi phreng ba'i rgyun
195b6(mdo sde): gyis rnam par brgyan pa gang dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag brgyad dag kun nas yongasu khebs par byed de/ 'gro ba thams cad dga' ba
195b7(mdo sde): dang / lo tog dang sdong po yongs su bskyed pa'i phyir/ char gyi rgyun rin po che rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mngon par 'bebs pa'i sprin chen po che kun nas slong
195b8(mdo sde): ngo // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar yang lus sna tshogs kyi sprin sems can thams cad dga' bar byed pa/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha'
196a1(mdo sde): yas mu med pa snang bar byed pa/ 'od gzer kha dog mtha' yas pa'i grog gi phreng ba'i rgyun 'byung ba yang dag pa de kho na nyid kyi chos
196a2(mdo sde): kyi 'brug sgra yan lag stong phrag drug bcu pas sgrog pa/ snying rje chen po'i rlung mar gyis yang dag par mtho ba chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa'i 'gro ba'i thams cad kyi nam
196a3(mdo sde): mkha' khyad par byed pa dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kun nas khebs par byas shing / ngan song dang mi khom pa las sogs pa nas/ sems can rnams rnam par
196a4(mdo sde): bslang ste/ rnam pa thams cad du mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snang ba rnam par dag pa dang / byin gyis brlabs te bkod pa thams cad kyi rgyun
196a5(mdo sde): gyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag kyang byin gyis brlabs nas/ lha dang mi'i dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rangs pa mchog tu gyur pa/ dga' ba dang / bde
196a6(mdo sde): ba'i mchog thob pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dkar po'i lo tog dang / rtsi chen po dang / sdong po thams cad rnam par
196a7(mdo sde): bskyed pa dang thams cad du skyid par chos kyi dbang bskur ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi phun sum tshogs pa dang / dga' bar byed pa dang / rgud pa zhi bar byed/
196a8(mdo sde): pa'i chos kyi char chen po mngon par 'bebs te rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi char sprin chen po kun nas bskyed pa yin no// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na bya
196b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba tu zhi bar byed pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na rlung mar dri ba zhim pa'i char gyi rgyun gyi snying po
196b2(mdo sde): can ldang na sems can rnams kyi gdung ba yongs su zhi bar byas shing lus shin tu sim pa dang bsil bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar yang
196b3(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / ngan 'gro dang / ngan par lta ba dang / nyes byas dang / the tsom dang / phongs pa mi bzang
196b4(mdo sde): ba dang / yul ba la sred pa dang / sdug pa dang / mi sdug pa dang bral zhing phrad pa dang / nad rnams bcil nas dam pa ma yin pa'i chos la sred pa las sogs pa'i
196b5(mdo sde): gdung ba dag dam pa'i chos kyi char dang 'dres pa'i bla na med pa'i tshul khrims rnams par dag pa dang / smon lam dang mthong ba dang / reg pa dang 'grogs pa dang /
196b6(mdo sde): bstan pa don yod pa las sogs pas rab tu zhi bar byed de/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi
196b7(mdo sde): bar byed cing / nyon mongs pa med pa'i sa la 'god pa yin no// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la chos dkar po las mthun
196b8(mdo sde): bar 'byung ba'i dbugs 'byung ba dang / rngub pa'i srog nye bar sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ dbugs 'byung ba dang / rngub pa'i rlung ni
197a1(mdo sde): thas bams canams 'a ma/ debang du byung chub sems pas ma nga bar bslabs pa dang / byang chub sems pas
197a2(mdo sde): ba'i chos dkar ba'i drung bar bye bar sbyar baphun mum tshogs pa thams cad skyed pas kyang / sems can dga' thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu
197a3(mdo sde): gzhan yang 'di lta ste dper na/ rlung mar ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'di lta ste/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor rnams dang / khor lug ri dag dang / khor phug
197a4(mdo sde): ri chen po rnams dang gling chen po zin yangs su 'dzin pa'i gser gyi dkyil 'khor rnams dang / rgyamatsha rin za cha'i 'byung gnas dang bcas pa rnams dang / rar
197a5(mdo sde): rang ri rab chen po dang / de ma yin pa'i rin po che'i ri dang / gangs dang ri spos kyi ngad ldang ba dang grong rdal dang / nags tshal dang / gzhal med khang dag dang /
197a6(mdo sde): 'dzam bu gling dag dang / gling chen po bzhi dag dang / stong dag dang / stong gnyis dag dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po dag dang bkod pa rnam par bye ba
197a7(mdo sde): tshogs mngon par sgrub bo// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chung bar yang phyogs bcu kun tu sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zung bathun du
197a8(mdo sde): tshogs pa nye bar sgrub bo// bskyed do// yongs su gzhagag/ de la ci yar na gangs kyi de phrin sum tshogs pa de ltar ni 'jig rten pa'i bsad nams dran
197b1(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa rnams blta'o// ji ltar gling chen po bzhi pa dang / ri rab phun sum tshogs pa de ltar ni nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa rnams blta'o// ji ltar na stong
197b2(mdo sde): gi 'jig rten gyi khams phun sum tshogs pa de ltar ni rang sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa rnams blta'o// ji ltar na stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams phun sum
197b3(mdo sde): tshogs pa de ltar ni byang chub sems dpa'i phun sum tshogs pa rnams blta'o// ji ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams phun sum tshogs pa de ltar
197b4(mdo sde): ni 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas btags pa'i shin tu rnam par grags
197b5(mdo sde): pa/ mchod pa la dmigs pa thams cad la yang dag par gnas pa rnams kyis thams cad mngon du byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsod nams brgya pa'i
197b6(mdo sde): mtshan dang ldan pa rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams blta'o// de la rgya mtsho ltar ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rgya mtsho rnams blta'o// gling dang
197b7(mdo sde): bar gyi gling dang / ri gzhan dang / gling chen po bzhi pa las sogs pa ltar ni sbyor ba dang gzungs dang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / slob ma'i
197b8(mdo sde): dge 'dun las sogs pa blta'o// grong rdal dang nags tshal dang gzhal med khang ltar ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i yon tan bkod pa rnam
198a1(mdo sde): @#blta'o// dpag bsam shing gi nags tshal rnams ltar ni sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang mngon par shes/
198a2(mdo sde): pa dang / rig pa dang ye shes snang ba dang / dbang dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang /
198a3(mdo sde): ma 'dres pa dang / thugs rje chen po las sogs pa dbang sgyur ba dam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i chos rnams blta'o// rigs kyi bu de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
198a4(mdo sde): rnams kyi bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ yongs su brtag pa bzung ste/ phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi
198a5(mdo sde): khams gang gi'i klung grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed dag na sems can gang ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad stong gsum phrag bcu'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i bsod nams
198a6(mdo sde): kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur la/ de lta bu'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i dngos po nyid dang ldan pa'i sems can de dag gis bsod nams kyi phung po ci tsam pa de bsdoms
198a7(mdo sde): pa dang / 'khor los sgyur ba chen po gcig cig ldan par gyur te/ rnam grangs des shar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'das te/ de snyed kyi 'jig
198a8(mdo sde): rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can de snyed cig 'khor los sgyur ba'i dngos po de dang 'dra ba nyid dang so sor ldan par gyur la/ snga ma bzhin du phyogs
198b1(mdo sde): brtsir 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa dag na/ sems can yod do chog ji snyed drug thams cad 'khor los sgyur ba'i dngos/
198b2(mdo sde): po de lta bu sha stag dang so sor ldan par gyur te/ de bzhin du bgrang ba de nyid kyis 'jig rten gyi khams de snyed du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams brgya byin gyi bsod
198b3(mdo sde): nams kyi phung po dang ldan pa'i brgya byin sha stag du gyur la/ phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed du gton
198b4(mdo sde): ba'i brgya byin rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po ci tsam pa de dang / brgya byin gcig cig ldan par gyur te/ de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings/
198b5(mdo sde): kyis klas pa nam mkha'i mthas gtags pa thams cad ni/ sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de thams cad brgya byin de dang 'dra ba sha stag tu gyur pa bgrang ba de
198b6(mdo sde): nyid kyis phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed du gtogs pa'i sems can de dag thams cad tshangs
198b7(mdo sde): pa chen por gyur la/ bsod nams de thams cad gcig du bsdoms pa dang / tshangs pa chen po gcig cig ldan par gyur la/ tshangs pa chen po ji lta bar
198b8(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ snga ma bzhin du bgrang ba de nyid kyis nyan thos dag dang rang sangs rgyas dag dang / byang chub sems dang
199a1(mdo sde): sa chen po thob pa/ 'od gzer gyi sprin chen po'i dbang bskur ba dbang bcu thob pa sha stag du gyur te/ de ltar rigs kyi bu de lta bu'i
199a2(mdo sde): sems can thams cad phyogs bcu mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang nam mkha'i khams su gtogs pa dus gsum pa thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung
199a3(mdo sde): po ci tsam pa de dus gsum gyi nam mkha'i khams su gtogs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rdul phra rab brgyar
199a4(mdo sde): bsgyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ba spu'i khung bu gcig mngon par 'grub bo// ba spu'i khung bu thams cad du gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po brgya
199a5(mdo sde): steng grangs med pa bcur bsgyur pas dpe byad bzang po brgya bcu las dpe byad re re mngon par 'grub po// dpe byad bzang por gtogs pa'i bsod nams
199a6(mdo sde): kyi phung po de thams cad brjod du med pa bcur bsgyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyi shu rtsa dgu las mtshan re re mngon par 'grub bo// de la
199a7(mdo sde): brjod du med pa bcur bsgyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i smin mtshams kyi mdzod sku zla ba nya ste/ dri ma med pa'i dkyil 'khor stong pas kyang lhag par mdze
199a8(mdo sde): pa'i 'odi dang ldan pa mngon par 'grub bo/ de yang brjod du med pa'i bye ba stong phrag bcur bsgyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug 'gro ba thams cad
199b1(mdo sde): las mngon par 'phags shing da ltar mi snang ba gtsug tor gyis yongs su brgyan pa mngon par 'grub bo// de yang brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bye ba
199b2(mdo sde): khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcur bsgyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung yan lag stong phrag drug bcu pa dmigs pa thams cad las gsung
199b3(mdo sde): gi sgra mtha' yas pa 'byung ba lhun gyis grub pas sems can thams cad bsam pa yongs su tshim par 'gyur ba 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro bar byed pa
199b4(mdo sde): mngon par 'grub bo// rigs kyi bu de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan ces bya'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar de bzhin gsheg
199b5(mdo sde): pa bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs mi zad pa dang ldan zhing kun tu rgyas par byed pa bkod pa dang ldan pas sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba yin te/ rigs kyi
199b6(mdo sde): bu yongs su brtag pa nye bar bzung nas/ gal te phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa/
199b7(mdo sde): thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams sa bcu pa chos kyi sprin la gnas pa rnams pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi brgyan 'chad
199b8(mdo sde): ba dbang bcu la dbang sgyur ba sha stag du gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ba spu'i khung bu gcig du gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po la 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i
200a1(mdo sde): gser las byas pa'i snod rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis smras pa/ na mkha'i tshad tsam gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed so so nas thog
200a2(mdo sde): te/ phyi ma'i mthar thug pa'i bskal par yongs su bkang zhing / skad cig skad cig du blangs shing khyer yang ba skya'i khung bu gcig du gtogs pa'i bsod nam
200a3(mdo sde): kyi phung po de gang ba 'am/ bri bar mi mngon te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo//
200a4(mdo sde): de la sa bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems ma bskyed pa'i sa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dri ma med pa dang / 'od byed pa dang / 'od 'phro
200a5(mdo sde): ba can dang / shin tu sbyang dka'/ mngon du gyur dang / ring du song dang / mi g.yo ba dang / legs pa'i blo gros dang / chos kyi sprin dang / sangs rgyas kyi
200a6(mdo sde): sa kun 'od te/ sa bcu gnyis po ni de dag go/ de la byang chub kyi sems ma bskyed pa'i sa gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' byis pa'i spyod
200a7(mdo sde): ba dang / log pa'i nan tan thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang /
200a8(mdo sde): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / khyad du zhugs shing / 'gro ba thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa rnams thams cad du dpal dang ldan pa'i lus dang ngag dang
200b1(mdo sde): yid kyi brgyan kyis brgyan pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mu med pa snang bar byed pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa/ sgrib pa med pa'i stobs kyi shugs
200b2(mdo sde): 'chang ba 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par skad cig re re la 'gro zhing 'ong na/ dri zhim po dang / 'od gzer gyi dra ba'i tshogs chen po gling chen po bzhi pa 'jig rten
200b3(mdo sde): gyi khams kun tu byung ba pad mas rkang pa yongs su brtan pa stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mtha' dang mnyam pa'i bstan gyi rgyan dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad
200b4(mdo sde): shin tu rnam par non pa'i lhag mthong rnam par bsgoms pas thogs pa med cing / yid du 'ong ba'i dmigs pa'i mtshan ma chen po bcu las sogs pa grangs
200b5(mdo sde): med pa'i ltas bzang po mthong ba phyir mi ldog pa phyogs kyi nags tshal thibs po mtha' yas pa thams cad du 'od dra ba/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu 'gyed pa
200b6(mdo sde): zhing dpag du med pa'i rgyan byed pa 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi mnga' bdag dpag du med pa rnyed kyi bdag gi gzugs brnyan gyis dbang
200b7(mdo sde): bskur ba yang dag par mnod pa'i dbang dang byin gyis brlabs la mkhas pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rin po che'i char gyi snang ba'i sgo dpag du med
200b8(mdo sde): pa thams cad gtan pa med par kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i mchod sbyin chen po'i sprin gtong ba lhur byed pa/ blta na bzang zhing yid du 'ong la mdzes shing dge
201a1(mdo sde): la 'gro ba thams cad dang mi 'thun pa med cing don yod par bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med
201a2(mdo sde): pa rab tu g.yo bar byed cing 'gro bar byed pa/ ngan 'gro las sogs pa las sems can mtha' yas pa yongs su skyob pa/ mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas mchod pa dang /
201a3(mdo sde): chos kyi sgo 'dzin nus pa ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rig pa grangs med pas/ rnam par rol pa chos mtha'
201a4(mdo sde): phas pa la dga' zhing mos pas zang zing med par phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mthar thug par rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub pa'i dga' ba'i shugs kyi sna
201a5(mdo sde): ba thob pa bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ther 'bum dpag tu med par theg pa chen po la zhugs pa'i bsgom pa sna tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa/ gzhan gyi don
201a6(mdo sde): gyi nan tan tshar phyin pa'i bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs mngon par bsgrub pa'i grub pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba brgya stong phun sum tshogs pa'i mos pa chen po'i
201a7(mdo sde): yang chen pos spyod pa'i chos nyid kyis sa dang po de ma thag du thob par gang gnas pa/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi sems ma skyed pa'i sa'o
201a8(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni mi'i kha dog las ni 'das la/ lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa yin te/ de bzhin du byang chub
201b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' yang 'jig rten pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa thams cad las ni 'das pa yin/ don dam pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa ni/
201b2(mdo sde): ma thob pa yin no/ sangs rgyas kyi sa kun tu 'od ni mtha' dang / dbus med pa ma lus pa dri ma med pa'i chos thams cad dbang sgyur ba ste/ kun tu lta ba sem
201b3(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi don thams cad thob par byed pa'i mtshan nyid do// de la ting nge 'dzin rnams gang zhe na/ bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting
201b4(mdo sde): nge 'dzin rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ rin chen kun tu 'phags dang / shin te gnas pa dang / mi skul ba dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / dkon mchog
201b5(mdo sde): 'byung gnas dang / nyi ma'i 'od kyi gzi brjid dang / don thams cad grub pa dang / ye shes sgron ma dang / da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa
201b6(mdo sde): dang / dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin de/ de dag las sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin ni mtha' yas so// gzungs ni bcu
201b7(mdo sde): gnyis te/ bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dbang skur ba dang / ye shes ldan dang / sgra dbyangs rnam par dag pa dang / mi zad pa'i za ma tog pa dang //
201b8(mdo sde): 'khyil ba'i mtha' yas pa dang / rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya dang / pad mo bkod pa dang / chags pa med pa'i sgor 'jug pa dang / so sor yang dag par rig pa rnam
202a1(mdo sde): par nges pa la 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rgyan byin gyis brlab pa dang / kha dog mtha' yas pa dang sangs rgyas kyi sku'i kha dog rdzogs pa
202a2(mdo sde): mngon par sbyar ba'i gzungs te/ de dag las sogs pa snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// mngon par shes pa ni drug ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lha'i mig dang / lha'i
202a3(mdo sde): rna ba dang / pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par shes pa'i shes pa dang / zag pa dang bcas par
202a4(mdo sde): shes pa'i mngon par shes pa ste drug po de dag go/ dbang ni bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshe'i tshad bskal pa grangs med dpag ta med par byin gyis brlob
202a5(mdo sde): bas tshe la dbang ba dang / ting nge 'dzin brjod du med pa yang brjod du med pa la nges par rtog cing 'jug pa'i tshul gyis sems la dbang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi kham
202a6(mdo sde): thams cad du bkod pa'i rgyan du mas rgyan par byin gyis rlob pa ston pa'i tshul gyis yo byad la dbang ba dang / dus ci lta ba bzhin du las kyi rnam par smin pa byin gyis rlob
202a7(mdo sde): ba ston pas las la dbang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du skye ba ston pas skye ba la dbang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyis
202a8(mdo sde): yongs su gang ba ston pas mos pa la dbang ba dang / dus dang zhing gang du 'dod par mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ston pas smon lam la dbang ba dang / 'jig/
202b1(mdo sde): rten gyi khams thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' yas pa ston pas rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang / chos kyi sgo snang ba mtha' dang dpung med pa yongs su
202b2(mdo sde): ston pas chos la dbang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / mtshan
202b3(mdo sde): dang dpe byad bzang po dang / mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dam pa dang / dus thams cad du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi grang
202b4(mdo sde): las sogs pa skad cig gcig la yongs su shes pa rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa
202b5(mdo sde): ston pas ye shes la dbang ba ste/ bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang rnams so// de la byang chub sems dpa'i stobs bcu gang zhe na//
202b6(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ bsam pa'i stobs dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs dang / shes rab kyi stobs dang / smon lam gyi stobs dang / sprod pa'i stobs dang nga/ theg
202b7(mdo sde): pa'i stobs dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i stobs dang / byang chub kyi stobs dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i stobs te/ bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems
202b8(mdo sde): dpa'i stobs rnams so// de la byang chub sems dpa'i mi 'jigs pa'i bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzungs kyis thos pa 'dzin cing / don bstan pa la mi 'jin
203a1(mdo sde): pa dang / bdag med pa khong du chud pas gzhan gyis gtse ba'i mtshan ma mi 'byung zhing rang bzhin gyis spyod lam slad du med pa'i las gsum yodz+ra/
203a2(mdo sde): su dag pa'i bsrung ba chen po phun sum tshogs pa'i mi 'jigs pa dang / chos bzung ba yun ring du mi brjed pa dang / thabs dang shes rab mthar phyin pas sems
203a3(mdo sde): can sgrol zhing dad pa ston pa dang / dge ba'i bar chad du mi 'gyur ba'i mi 'jigs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems ma nyams zhing / theg pa gzhan gyis
203a4(mdo sde): mi 'byung bar dbang yongs su rdzogs pa dang / sems can gyi don rnam pa thams cad du yang dag par thob par bya ba la mi 'jigs pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni byang chub
203a5(mdo sde): sems dpa'i mi 'jigs pa rnams so// de la byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni
203a6(mdo sde): ma bstan pa'i sbyin pa can rnams yin/ ma bstan pa'i bzod pa can rnams dang / ma bstan pa'i brtson 'grus can rnams dang / ma bstan pa'i bsam gtan
203a7(mdo sde): can rnams dang / ma bstan pa'i shes rab can rnams dang / bsdu ba'i dngos pos sems can thams cad sdud pa rnams dang / yongs su bsngo ba'i cho ga shes pa
203a8(mdo sde): rnams dang / thabs mkhas pas sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i dbang gis theg pa'i mchog gis 'byung ba ston pa rnams dang / theg pa chen po las mnyam/
203b1(mdo sde): parnams dang / 'char ba dang mya nganams 'das pa'i maston pa rnams dang / zung dang spel na'i rgyangs mkhas pa rnams dang / ye shes ldan du 'gro bas mdzan
203b2(mdo sde): par 'du mi byed cing / kha na ma tho ba med par tshe rabs thams cad du mngon du zhugs pa rnams dang / lus dang ngag dang / yid kyi las kyi mtha' dge ba bcu dang ldan
203b3(mdo sde): pa rnams dang / sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad bzod pa'i lus len pas/ sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba rnams dang / 'gro ba
203b4(mdo sde): thams cad mngon par dga' bar ston pa rnams dang / byis pa dang nyan thos mi bzad pa'i ci snyed cig gi nang na yang dge ba mang po'i rin po che'i shing dpag
203b5(mdo sde): bsams ltar bstan pa'i/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems yongs su ma nyams pa rnams dang / chos thams cad kyi thabs sbyin pas dbang bskur ba thob par
203b6(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos btsal ba bstan lngas mi ldog pa rnams te/ bcwo brgyad po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa rnams so//
203b7(mdo sde): de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste gnas dang / gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang /
203b8(mdo sde): da ltar gyi las kyi rgyu'i rnam par smin pa len pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs
204a1(mdo sde): dang / dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
204a2(mdo sde): bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba dang / ldang ba thams
204a3(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / shi 'pho dang / skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / zag pa zad par mkhyen pa'i
204a4(mdo sde): stobs te/ bcu po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos
204a5(mdo sde): thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la mi 'jigs pa dang / zag pa thams cad zad par shes par shes pa la mi 'jigs pa dang / bar du gcod
204a6(mdo sde): ba'i chos rnams gzhan du mi 'gyur bar nges pa'i lung bstan pa la mi 'jigs pa dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ba 'byung ba'i lam
204a7(mdo sde): de bzhin du 'gyur ba la mi 'jigs pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa rnams so// de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bsgo
204a8(mdo sde): brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa med pa dang / ca co med pa dang / bsnyel ba med pa dang / sems mnyam par ma gzhag
204b1(mdo sde): ba med pa dang / tha dad pa'i 'du shes med pa dang / so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms med pa'i dang / mos pa nyams pa med pa dang / brtson 'grus nyams
204b2(mdo sde): ba med pa dang / dran pa nyams pa med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med pa dang / shes rab nyams pa med pa dang / rnam par grol ba nyams pa med pa dang //
204b3(mdo sde): 'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang /
204b4(mdo sde): da ltar gyi dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang / lus kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su
204b5(mdo sde): 'brang ba dang / ngag gi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / yid kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing
204b6(mdo sde): ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba ste/ bcwo brgyad po de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po gang
204b7(mdo sde): zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po ni rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas
204b8(mdo sde): mu med pa dag tu bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rang bzhin du 'byung ste/ sum bcu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad ni bdag med pa yin na/
205a1(mdo sde): sems can rnams ni bdag med par ma mos pas/ de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o//
205a2(mdo sde): chos thams cad ni sems can med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni sems can du smra'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o//
205a3(mdo sde): chos thams cad ni srog med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni srog du smra'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos tham
205a4(mdo sde): cad ni gang zag med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni gang zag la gnas pa'o zhes sems can rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// /
205a5(mdo sde): chos thams cad ni med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni yod par lta'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams
205a6(mdo sde): cad ni gnas pa med pa yin no/ sems can rnams ni gnas la rten to// zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams
205a7(mdo sde): cad ni gzhi med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni gzhi la dga' ba zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni nga'ir/
205a8(mdo sde): bya ba med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni nga'ir bya ba la rten to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni bdag
205b1(mdo sde): po med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni yongs su gzung ba la brtson no zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni dngos
205b2(mdo sde): po med pa yin na/ sems can thams cad ni dngos po la rten to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni ma
205b3(mdo sde): skyes pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni skye ba la rten to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni shi 'phos
205b4(mdo sde): med cing ma skyes pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni shi 'pho dang skye ba la rten to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos
205b5(mdo sde): thams cad ni kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin na/ sems can rnams ni kun nas nyon mongs so zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen
205b6(mdo sde): po skye'o// chos thams cad ni 'dod chags dang bral ba yin na/ sems can rnams ni 'dod chags par byed do zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshes
205b7(mdo sde): ba'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni zhe sdang dang bral ba yin na/ sems can rnams ni zhe sdang bar byed do zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin
205b8(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni gti mug dang bral ba yin na/ sems can rnams ni gti mug par gyur to zhes/ de'i phyir sems
206a1(mdo sde): can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni 'ong ba med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni 'ong ba la gnas
206a2(mdo sde): pa'o zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni 'gro ba med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni 'gro ba la gnas
206a3(mdo sde): so zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni mngon par 'du bya ba med pa yin na/ sems can rnam
206a4(mdo sde): ni mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod do zhes/ de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni spros pa med pa yin
206a5(mdo sde): na/ sems can rnams ni spros pa la dga'o zhes de'i phyir/ sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni stong pa
206a6(mdo sde): yin na/ sems can rnams ni lta ba la zhen to zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni mtshan ma
206a7(mdo sde): med pa yin na/ sems can rnams mtshan ma'i spyod yul can no zhes/ de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos
206a8(mdo sde): thams cad ni smon pa med pa yin no// sems can rnams ni smon lam la spyod do zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o//
206b1(mdo sde): kye ma'o 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni/ phan tshun rtsod pas yongs su zin cing / gnod sems kyi tha ba dang / zhe sdang la zhugs par gzigs nas/ de dag la gnod
206b2(mdo sde): sems kyi tha ba dang / zhe sdang spangs pa'i phyir chos bstan par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o/ kye ma 'jig rten gnas
206b3(mdo sde): pa 'di ni phyin ci log dang ldan zhing lam nyam nga ba la zhugs pa/ lam gol ba la gnas pa yin gyis/ de dag yang dag pa'i lam du gzud par bya'o zhes sems can
206b4(mdo sde): rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o/ kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni brkam zhing 'dod pa'i zil gyis non pa ste/ cho ga mi shes shing gzhan
206b5(mdo sde): gyi nor la 'phrog pa yin gyis/ de dag 'phags pa'i nor dad pa dang tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang gtong ba dang / shes rab dang / ngo che shes pa dang / khrel
206b6(mdo sde): yod pa'i nor la dgod do zhes/ sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// kye ma sems can 'di dag ni bu smad dang / khyim dang /
206b7(mdo sde): nor dang / 'bru la sred pas 'khol pa ste/ snying po med pa la snying por 'du shes pa yin gyis/ de dag la shin tu mi rtag pa bstan par bya'o// zhes de'i phyir/
206b8(mdo sde): sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// kye ma sems can 'di dag ni mi rigs pas 'tsho ba ste/ gcig la gcig 'drid par
207a1(mdo sde): gnas pa yin gyis de dag la 'tsho ba yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thug
207a2(mdo sde): rje chen po skye'o// kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni chog mi shes pa ste/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa la spyod kyang bdag cag ni chog shes pa'o snyam
