207a3(mdo sde): du 'dzin gyis/ de dag la gang 'di sdug bsngal shin tu zhi zhing bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pas shin tu chog par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs
207a4(mdo sde): pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// kye ma sems can 'di dag ni khyim gyi gnas sdug bsngal gyi snod kun nas nyon mongs pa la rtag tu dga' ba yin gyis de dag la/
207a5(mdo sde): byung zhing khams gsum las yang dag par 'dar bar bya ba'i phyir/ chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po
207a6(mdo sde): skye'o// chos thams cad ni rgyus nye bar 'gro ba ste bsgrub pas nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid yin na/ de la sems can rnams ni 'phags pa'i rnam par grol
207a7(mdo sde): ba la le lo byed kyis de dag la rnam par grol ba lhar blang ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus brtsams par chos bston to zhes// sems can rnams la de bzhin gsheg
207a8(mdo sde): pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// sems can rnams ni chags pa med pa'i ye shes dam pa khyad par du 'phags pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa 'di
207b1(mdo sde): btang zhing / gang 'di nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dman pa tshol ba yin gyis de dag la gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la dmigs par/
207b2(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir rgya chen po la blo mos par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye ste/ rigs kyi bu rnam pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis/
207b3(mdo sde): bo de dag dang ldan na sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje chen po la gnas pa zhes bya ste/
207b4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig sems can dag la rnam pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag dang ldan pa'i snying rje chen po skye na/ byang chub
207b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bsod nams kyi gzi brjid chen pos rgyas pa phyir mi ldog pa'i sems can gyi don la brtson par rig par bya'o//
207b6(mdo sde): snying rje chen po chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa na/ srog chags stong phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
207b7(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub du sems skyes so// srog chags brgyad stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob po/ lha'i bu stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis ni/ chos rnam
207b8(mdo sde): la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// rigs kyi bu de ltar de dag la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / byang chub
208a1(mdo sde): @##sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang sgyur gyi/ chos rnam par dgod pa ni dpag tu med grangs med do// de dag phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i
208a2(mdo sde): bskal par de bzhin gshegs pas bstan kyang mtha' med na/ sems can rnams kyi dga' ba dang / dad pa dang rangs pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ phyogs tsam zhig/
208a3(mdo sde): bstan te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la chos dkar po las 'thun par byung ba'i dbugs 'byung ba dang / rngub pa'i srog tha gnyer
208a4(mdo sde): bar sbyor ba la mkhas pa yin no// ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi char sprin dpag tu med pa kun 'dzin nus pa yin zhe na/ rigs kri bu 'di lta ste dper na/
208a5(mdo sde): rlung mar ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor mu med cing rgya che la brtan zhing sra bas/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig pa dang / 'chags pa char sprin dang bcas pa rgya mtsho dang
208a6(mdo sde): gling chen po bzhi par bcas pa/ ri rab dang ri gtang zung dang ri btang chen po dang / gangs dang 'khor yug ri dang / 'khor yug gi ri chen po dang / ri spos kyi ngad
208a7(mdo sde): ldan pa dang / grong rdal dang 'bab chu dang / nags tshal dang / gzhal med khang gi rnam par bcas pa dag yongs su 'dzin to// de bzhin du byang chub sems
208a8(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang gzungs kyi rlung mar gyi dkyil 'khor mu med pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sprin gyis phab pa'i gtan
208b1(mdo sde): ba med pa'i chos kyi char gyi rgyun chen po thams cad yongs su 'dzin to// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad chags pa'i tshe ci skad du brjod pa'i ri rab dang rgya mtsho
208b2(mdo sde): dang gling chen po bzhi pa dang / ri gtang bzung dang / ri gtang bzung chen po dang / gangs dang 'khor yug gi ri dang / 'khor yug gi ri chen po dang / ri spos kyi ngad
208b3(mdo sde): ldang ba dang / grong rdal dang 'bab chu dang / nags tshal dang / gzhal med khang gi rnam pa lta bu bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan dang / sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa
208b4(mdo sde): dang ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang mngon par shes pa dang / dbang dang stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang ma 'dres pa dang /
208b5(mdo sde): snying rje chen po las sogs pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad yongs su 'dzin to// 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos
208b6(mdo sde): kyi phung po brgya stong mu med pa phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang / rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par yongs su 'dzin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sprin dpag
208b7(mdo sde): tu med pa kun 'dzin nus pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos rnam pa tha dad pa'i gzhal med khang chen po'i bkod pa rnam par 'byed cing yongs su 'god
208b8(mdo sde): ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rlung mar ni gzhal med khang dgod pa'i rnam par dbye ba sna tshogs thams cad du kun nas gzhog par byed rnam
209a1(mdo sde): @bar 'byed par byed de/ nags tshal dang shing dang / yal ga dang / mdab ma dang / ldum bu dang byu gu dang me tog dang 'bras bu dang los
209a2(mdo sde): dang / sdong po las sogs pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi yan lag dang nying lag rnam par dbye ba sna tshogs su rtag tu rgyun mi chang bar yongs su gzhog cing /
209a3(mdo sde): rnam par 'byed de gsal bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar yang so so yang dag par rig pa dang / spobs pa'i ye shes ma thogs ma chags shing /
209a4(mdo sde): mtha' yas pas 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad sgo sna tshogs pa thams cad sgo sna tshogs pa nas yongs su gzhog par byed//
209a5(mdo sde): rnam par 'byed par byed/ snang bar byed/ yongs su ston par byed/ thob par byed cing / rnam pa 'di dag 'di lta ste/ chos 'di dag ni ngan song sgrub pa'o// /
209a6(mdo sde): 'di dag ni bde 'gro sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni bdag por sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni sems can dmyal ba sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni dud 'gro'i skye gnas sgrub pa'o// 'di
209a7(mdo sde): dag ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni mir sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni lhar sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni 'khor lo sbyar bar sgrub pa'o// de bzhin mdor bsdus te/
209a8(mdo sde): 'di dag ni brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni gzugs dang / g.yog dang yid gzhungs pa dang / dpal chen po sgrub pa'o// 'di
209b1(mdo sde): dag ni rig pa'o// 'di dag ni spu rtsal lo// 'di dag ni gzo'i gnas so// 'di dag ni bstan bcos sna tshogs la rnam pa thams cad du mkhas pa'o// 'di ni nyan/
209b2(mdo sde): thos kyi theg pa ste/ nyan thos su 'gyur ba'o// 'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ste/ rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'o// 'di ni theg pa chen po ste/ rnam pa
209b3(mdo sde): thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa bdag dang gzhan gyi don yang dag par byed pa/ kun tu bzang po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur ba'o// de bzhin du mdor bsdus
209b4(mdo sde): ste/ 'di dag ni sa rnams dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / rig pa rnams dang / dbang rnams dang / gzungs rnams dang /
209b5(mdo sde): mngon par shes pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / ma 'dres
209b6(mdo sde): rnams so zhes/ rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni de dag las sogs pa/ rnam pa tshad med pas gzungs pad ma bkod pa las sogs pa la mkhas pas chos
209b7(mdo sde): bkod pa rnam par dgod pa dag byed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos rnam pa tha dad pa'i gzhal med khang chen po'i bkod pa rnam par dbye ba thams cad rnam par
209b8(mdo sde): 'byed cing / yongs su 'god pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dpag bsam gyi shing las shin tu byung ba'i chos kyi gtam yang dag
210a1(mdo sde): par rnam par nges pa me tog yid du 'ong ba'i char rtag tu mngon par 'bebs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rlung mar ni
210a2(mdo sde): dpag bsam gyi shing gi nags tshal dag las gang gis/ lha dang mi rnams shin tu dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas mya ngan med par rnam par rtse zhing / dga' la
210a3(mdo sde): dga' dgur spyod pa/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par/ kha dog dang stobs dang / mthu dang yid bde ba las yongs su mi nyams pa de lta bu'i spos dang / me tog dang / rgyan
210a4(mdo sde): dang gos dang / rnga dang / sil snyan dang / rol mo'i sgra la sogs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i char mngon par 'bebs pa/ yongs su skyod cing / 'byin par byed do//
210a5(mdo sde): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar yang yongs su dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
210a6(mdo sde): nas sems can dag la gang nas sems can de dag rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par chos kyi kun dga' la mos shing 'dun pa dang / lus dang / ngag dang yid kyi las kha
210a7(mdo sde): na ma tho ba med pa dang / gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang yongs su skyo bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad nyams su myong bar byed pa dang /
210a8(mdo sde): mi nyams pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyis sdang bar gyur pas rtag tu khyad par gyi snang bar 'dor bar 'gyur ba'i mdo sde dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad
210b1(mdo sde): pa'i sde dang / lung du bstan pa'i sde dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang / ched du brjod pa'i sde dang / gleng bzhi'i sde dang / rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang / de ltar
210b2(mdo sde): bu byung ba'i sde dang / skyes pa rabs kyi sde dang / shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang / rmad du byung ba'i sde dang / gtan la phab par bstan pa'i sde dag dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos
210b3(mdo sde): rin po che'i me tog la sogs pa'i char mngon par 'beb so// rjes su 'thun pa'i dang / rjes su mi 'thun pa dang / spel zhi dang / spyi'u tshugs kyi rgyud la sogs
210b4(mdo sde): ba'i gtam rnam par nges par nye bar sgrub po// tha snyad kyi dmigs pa thams cad la bdag med pazhi zhing / rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid brjod cing ston la rnam par
210b5(mdo sde): byang bar byed do/ chos thams cad sgo kun tu gzhol ba yongs su ston to// sgyu ma'i rnam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa nye bar sbyor ro// ye shes sgyu ma rnam
210b6(mdo sde): par rgyas par byed do// chos thams cad la dga' bar rtse ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnams kyis sems can rnams yongs su rgyas par byed de/ 'dri ba thams cad
210b7(mdo sde): lung bstan pas tshim par byed do// mtha' dang dpung med pa'i rdzu 'phrul la mkhas paskyed do/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dpag
210b8(mdo sde): bsam gyi shing las shin tu 'byung ba'i chos kyi gtam yang dag pa'i rnam par gdon mi za ba'i me tog yid du 'ong ba'i char rtag tu mngon par 'bebs pa yin no// /
211a1(mdo sde): @ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bskal ba grangs med par dkar po'i dkyil 'khor yongs su bsags pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par
211a2(mdo sde): thar pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho dang / ri rab dang 'od dang zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / chos kyi tshul dang / nags tshal dang / khang pa dang / dge ba'i 'khor yug gi ri
211a3(mdo sde): la sogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i sems can gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na 'dul ba yongasu smin pa mang po yang dag par gnas pa/ bla na med cing lus med pa'i
211a4(mdo sde): gnas 'gyur bar 'jig pa'i ye shes kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor rab tu gtong ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rlung mar ni bskal pa'i mthar thug
211a5(mdo sde): ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig par 'gyur ba'i dus na gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ri rab dang /
211a6(mdo sde): khor yug ri dang rgya mtsho la sogs par bcas pa kun nas 'jig cing / rnam par 'thor ba dang / dmigs med par byed cing / nam ka'i rang bzhin du byed
211a7(mdo sde): pa de lta bur stobs kyi shugs thogs pa med par ldang ngo // rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar yang bskum pa mang por tshogs bsags
211a8(mdo sde): ba'i sems can bsod nams dang ye shes sna tshogs rnam par bkod pa'i ri mngon po dang ldan pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i stobs kyi shugs dang / rdzu 'gru/
211b1(mdo sde): dang / rnam par 'phrul pa chen po yongs su brtan pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo thogs pa med par rab tu bskor ba'i sgra skad kyi dbyangs rab tu bsgrags pas/ chos
211b2(mdo sde): kyi phung rlung gi dkyil 'khor gang gis 'dul ba chos snang ba'i lha dam pa dang ldan pa bzod par mi nus pa'i 'du de byed kyi stobs thams cad mnyam par gzhog pa
211b3(mdo sde): tshul bzhin yid la byas nas/ yang dag par sems nang du gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa la brten te/ srid pa dang phung po dang / khams dang skye
211b4(mdo sde): mched kyi 'du byed kyi lus thams cad bshig cing rnam par gtor te/ lus med par byas nas/ yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pa rnam par bshig ste/
211b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten thams cad las yongs su 'das pa bsam gyis mi khyab cing / gzugs med pa'i bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa dang / gzugs thams cad
211b6(mdo sde): yongs su bstan pa rnam par gshig pas gnas gyur pa rnam par dag pa phyi ma'i mtha'i myur thug par gnas pa/ rnam pa thams cad mtha' dang bral ba rnams
211b7(mdo sde): thob par byed pa de lta bu kun nas rab tu gtong ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa grangs med par dkar po'i dkyil 'khor yongs su
211b8(mdo sde): bsags pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par thar pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho dang / ri rab dang / 'od dang zla ba dang / nyi ma dang chos kyi tshul dang / nags
212a1(mdo sde): tshal dang / khang pa dang / dge ba'i 'khor yug ri las sogs pas/ yongs su bskor ba'i sems can gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang
212a2(mdo sde): 'dul ba yongs su smin pa mang po yang yang dag par gnas pa bla na med cing lus med pa'i gnas 'gyur bar 'jig rten ye shes kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor rab tu mthong ba
212a3(mdo sde): yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa'
212a4(mdo sde): sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to// a la la de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan zhing / sems can
212a5(mdo sde): rlabs po che rnams yongs su tshim par 'gyur ba'i bcu po 'di bstan pa bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das
212a6(mdo sde): lha dang mi gang la la chos 'di dag la mos shing nan tan bgyid na// de dag thams cad ci snyed du gsungs pa'i phun sum tshogs pa bde ba dang bcas/ yid bde ba
212a7(mdo sde): dang bcas pa thob par 'gyur te brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba las sogs pa zhig bgyid na yang gzhan gyi don la gzhol zhing / tshe 'di dang tshe rabs
212a8(mdo sde): gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ sems
212b1(mdo sde): can gang de lta bu'i chos rnams la nan tan du byed pa de dag ni/ 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa dang / kun tu rnam par bltas pa dang / mi dge ba'i
212b2(mdo sde): tshogs thams cad rab tu spangs pa dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa dang 'jig rten thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur ro// gang spong ba'i skyes bu glen pa de dag ni mun
212b3(mdo sde): pa nas mun par gzhol ba ste/ sdug bsngal thams cad la sten pa'o// lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mya ngan du bya ba'o//
212b4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar ste/ dri ma med pa rnams yin/
212b5(mdo sde): ma chags pa rnams yin/ zhi ba rnams yin/ shes rab mtha' yas pa rnams yin/ ye shes mtha' yas pa rnams yin/ yi chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyi
212b6(mdo sde): rjes su song ba rnams yin/ chos thams cad namakha'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid du mos pa rnams yin no// so sor mi rten pa rnams yin/ mtshan ma'i spyod yul las
212b7(mdo sde): 'das pa rnams yin/ rtog ge'i spyod yul las 'das pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' dang mtshungs
212b8(mdo sde): pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
213a1(mdo sde): yid du 'ong ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i gzugs rnams la chags par yang mi 'gyur/ khong khro bar mi 'gyur ba dang / yid du 'ong ba dang //
213a2(mdo sde): yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra rnams dang / dri rnams dang / ro rnams dang / reg bya rnams dang / yid du 'ong ba rnams dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams la chags par
213a3(mdo sde): yang mi 'gyur khong khro ba yang mi 'gyur ba dang / rnyed pa dang ma rnyed pa dang / bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba dang / grags pa dang ma grags pa dang / bstod pa dang smad pas
213a4(mdo sde): chags par yang mi 'gyur khong khro bar yang mi 'gyur pa ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams
213a5(mdo sde): yin no// // rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' zla ba lta bu rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems
213a6(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi lus rab tu sil bar byed pa dang / mthong na dga' ba rnams yin/ chos dkar po rnams skye bar byed pa dang / chos nag po rnams 'bri bar
213a7(mdo sde): byed pa dang / rab tu bsngags pa rnams yin/ lus yongs su dag pa rnams yin/ bzhon pa mchog la zhon pa rnams yin/ rtag du brgyan pa rnams yin chos
213a8(mdo sde): kyi kun dga' la mos shing 'dun pa rnams yin/ rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can
213b1(mdo sde): thams cad kyi lus rab tu sil bar byed pa nas/ ji ltar na rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ zla ba shar na 'di ltar
213b2(mdo sde): thams cad kyi lus bsil ba dang / yid du 'ong bas rab tu sel bar byed de/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba shar ba na yang 'di lta ste/ nyan thos pa'i
213b3(mdo sde): gdud pa dang bral ba dang dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs pa dang / yid du 'ong bas sems can thams cad kyi lus rab tu sil bar byed do// rigs kyi bu
213b4(mdo sde): 'di lta ste dper na/ zla ba shar na 'di ltar zhi ba dang dang ba dang / sems shin tu dga' bar byed pas/ sems can thams cad mthong na dga' ba yin no// de bzhin
213b5(mdo sde): du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba shar ba na yang 'di lta ste/ dbang po rnam par gsal ba dang / sems kyi rgyud dang ba dang / sprod pa dang spyod lam dang / yon tan phun
213b6(mdo sde): sum tshogs pas sems can mthong na dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ zla ba yar gyi ngo la zla ba nya ste/ rnams pa thams cad du
213b7(mdo sde): gyes par gyur gyi bar du nyi ma re re zhing 'phel lo// yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang thog ma sems skyed pa nas
213b8(mdo sde): bzung ste/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du/ nyi ma re re zhing chos dkar po rnams 'phel zhing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ nam byang chub
214a1(mdo sde): kyi snying po la 'dug pa den/ rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yin no/ rigs kyi bu 'dis skye dper na/ tha ba sar gyi rol bab pa/
214a2(mdo sde): dang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor kha dog dang / snang ba dang / chu zheng yang yongs su 'bri ste/ bco lnga la ci ltar rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du mi mngon pa de ltar 'bri'o//
214a3(mdo sde): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang / nam 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes thob par gyur pa de na de'i mi dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi thams cad du rab tu
214a4(mdo sde): 'bri ste/ ji ltar na byang chub kyi snying po la thams cad kyi thams cad du med par 'gyur ba de ltar rab tu 'bri'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ zla ba shar
214a5(mdo sde): na bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong pa dang / yul gyi mi skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams kyis rab tu bsngags par bya ba yin no// /
214a6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ lha'i bu zla ba'i lus 'di ltar rang gi bsod nams kyi lam rnam par smin pas grub pa ni yongs su dag ste/ rnyog pa med cing dang ba bstsag
214a7(mdo sde): pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i lus kyang 'di lta ste/ chos nyid kyi mngon par grub pa rdzus te/ skyes pa dang / pha ma'i brtsog pa dang / mer
214a8(mdo sde): mer po las byung ba ma yin te/ yongs su dag la rnyog pa med cing dang gsol ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ lha'i bu zla ba ni bzhon pa mchog la zhon te/
214b1(mdo sde): gling bzhir snang bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i zla ba yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa mchog la zhon te/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med/
214b2(mdo sde): par snang bar byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ lha'i bu zla ba ni rtag tu brgyan cing / rgyan ma rnyis pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang
214b3(mdo sde): yon tan gyi rgyan rnams rtag tu brgyan pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ lha'i bu zla ba ni rtag tu rgyun mi chad par lha'i 'dod pa'i dga' ba la mos pa yin no//
214b4(mdo sde): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang rtag tu rgyun mi chad par chos kyi kun dga' la mos shing / 'dun pa yin gyi/ 'dod pas dga' ba la dga' ba ma yin no// /
214b5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ lha'i bu zla ba ni 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang 'di lta ste bsod nams chen po dang /
214b6(mdo sde): ye shes chen pos 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi lus rab tu bsil bar byed pa nas/ 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i
214b7(mdo sde): bar du yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' zla ba dang 'dra ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang
214b8(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' nyi ma lta bu rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ ma rigs pa'i mun sel ba rnams yin pa/ 'dul ba'i sems can rnam par 'byed par byed pa
215a1(mdo sde): rnams yin/ phyogs bcu thams cad du lha ner byed pa rnams yin/ dge ba'i chos mngon par shar ba rnams yin/ de dag gi zag pa nub par 'gyur
215a2(mdo sde): ba rnams yin/ snang bar byed pa rnams yin/ mu steg can ngan pa'i lugs rnams zil gis mnan te 'dug pa rnams yin/ mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa kun ston pa rnams
215a3(mdo sde): yin/ chos dkar po'i las kyi mtha thams cad 'byung bar byed pa rnams yin skye bo dge ba rnams dga' ba yin no// rigs kyi bu de lta ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
215a4(mdo sde): me rig pa'i mun pa sel ba nas ci lta skye bo dge ba rnams yin/ mi zlogs pa rnams dang / seng ge'i sgra sgrog pa rnams yin/ nags tshal dang nags tshal gyi 'dab ma na
215a5(mdo sde): rgyu ba rnams yin/ ri'i phug na gnas pa rnams yin/ len pa med pa rnams yin/ bdag gi brtson 'grus dang / stobs dang / mthu thob pas/ bdad kyi sde rab tu
215a6(mdo sde): 'jom pa rnams yin/ dge ba'i chos lo tog srung ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bag mi tsha ba nas dge ba'i chos kyi lo tog srung ba'i
215a7(mdo sde): bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ seng ge ni gar 'gro yang bdag dang 'dra ba med par mthong bas/ bag mi tsha zhing skrag par 'gro'o// de bzhin du byang chub
215a8(mdo sde): sems dpa' seng ge yang bdag dang 'dra ba med par mthong bas/ gar 'gro yang bag mi tsha zhing mi skrag par 'gro'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ seng ge ni wa
215b1(mdo sde): thams cad kyi sgras mi rtags pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang bas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis brjod pas brgal kyang / mi brtags shing
215b2(mdo sde): rgod pa dang zhum par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ seng ge ni bsgags na phyir mi ldog pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang bas
215b3(mdo sde): kyi rgol ba thams cad kyi bsgrags na mi ldog shing mi zhum par 'gyur ro// seng ge ni sgra gang gis ri dgas phra mo thams cad dang wa thams cad phyogs bcur 'byer bar
215b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ba de lta bur sgrog go// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang bdag med pa'i seng ge'i sgra gang gis bdag du 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa gzhan
215b5(mdo sde): mu stegs can gyi ri dgas rnams dang / gzhan mu stegs can gi wa thams cad phyogs bcur 'byer bar 'gyur ba de lta bu sgog ste/ byang chub sems dpa' seng
215b6(mdo sde): ge ni bdag tu 'dzin pa las zlog par bya ba dang / sems can gzhan dag 'dul ba'i dbang du bya ba ma thogs pa de dag la gnod par bya ba'i phyir bdag med pa'i seng
215b7(mdo sde): ge'i sgra mi sgrog go// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ seng ge ni kun tu lta yang mi 'jigs pa yin no/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang spyod pa
215b8(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa'i nan tan la lta yang mi 'jigs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ seng ge ni rang bzhin gyis nags tshal dang nags tshal gyi 'dab ma
216a1(mdo sde): na rgyu ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang rang bzhin gyis dben pa la mngon du phyogs shing nags tshal dang nags tshal/
216a2(mdo sde): gyi 'dab ma na spyod pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ seng ge ni ri'i phug na gnas pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang ye shes
216a3(mdo sde): kyi brag gi ri'i phug na gnas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ ste ge ni mi len par 'gro ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i seng ge yang nyon
216a4(mdo sde): mongs pa'i khur thams cad bor zhing len pa med par 'gro ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ seng ge ni cig pu gnyis su med par bdag gi brtson 'grus dang /
216a5(mdo sde): stobs dang mthu thob pas pha rol gyi sde 'jom mo/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang cig pu gnyis su med par byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug nas
216a6(mdo sde): bdag gi brtson 'grus dang / stobs dang / mthu thob pas bdud kyi sde 'jom mo// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ grong gi mdab gang na seng ge rgyu ba
216a7(mdo sde): der ri dgas phra mo dag gis lo tog rnams chud mi gzon to// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang yul dang yul gyi phyogs gang na 'dug pa der mu steg
216a8(mdo sde): can gyi rigs phra mo dag gis dge ba'i chos kyi lo tog chud mi gzon te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bag mi tsha bas/ chos kyi lo tog srung ba'i bar
216b1(mdo sde): du yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' seng ge lta bu rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang
216b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' dul ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byad kyi sems brtan pa rnams yin/ byang chub kyi sems byi dor shin tu byas pa rnams
216b3(mdo sde): yin/ dbang po bsdams pa rnams yin lam du zhugs rnams yin/ khur ched po khyer phod pa rnams yin/ sems can gyi don rnams la yongs su mi skyo ba rnams
216b4(mdo sde): yin/ yang dag pas 'tsho ba rnams yin/ tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gsang gi rnyed pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ g.yo sgyu dang bral ba rnams yin/ drang
216b5(mdo sde): ba'i rang bzhin can pas drang ba rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' dul ba rnams yin no// // rigs
216b6(mdo sde): kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'i cang shes pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid la sgom pa mang bas rnal 'byor spyod
216b7(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/ sgrib pa med cing kun nas ldang thams cad dang bral bas lam gyi rgyun ma chad pa rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' mi gcog pas/ bkan
216b8(mdo sde): bzhin byed pa rnams yin/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rtogs pas/ chos thams cad kyi tshul mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa rnams yin/ dma' ba dma' ba'i yid kyis
217a1(mdo sde): gdam du lang 'jig rten na thong ba rnam pa yin// rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsad rnams thang bar 'du shes nye bar bzhas pas/ @rtsa
217a2(mdo sde): rgyags pa dang / dregs pa dang / zas pa rnams yin/ 'di ltar de mngon sum du gas pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyam gyi chos thams cad la nem nur med pa rnams
217a3(mdo sde): rnam rang bzhid kyis rig pa'i phyir/ btsam med pa rnamapa yin/ rang kyis las mthong bas gzhan gyis mibazi zhing ba ris gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams yin/ rab
217a4(mdo sde): zhugs pas 'jig rten na sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu pa dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' cang shes pa rnam pa yin no//
217a5(mdo sde): / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' pad ma lta bu rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di la ste/ mgos pa rnams
217a6(mdo sde): yin/ sdig pa chung ngu dang yang lhan cig mi gnas pa yin/ tshul khrims kyi dri zhim pa rnams yin/ gtsang ba rnams yin/ bzhin 'dzum pa rnams yin//
217a7(mdo sde): mi rtsub pa rnams yin/ mthong na bkra shis pa rnams yin/ bro rnam par dbye ba rnams yin/ zo yongs su smin pa rnams yin/ shin tu yongs su bzung
217a8(mdo sde): ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mgos pa yin pa nas/ ji ltar na shin tu yongs su bzung ba'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu
217b1(mdo sde): 'di lta ste dper na/ pad ma ni chu'i nang nas byung yang mi chags par skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de'i chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin du byang chub sem
217b2(mdo sde): dpa'i 'khor ba'i chu las byung yang mi chags par skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de'i thabs dang shes rab kyi chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dang
217b3(mdo sde): thabs mkhas pa ni 'khor ba na spyod kyang 'khor ba'i nyes pa dag gis mi gos te/ de'i thabs de ni shes rab kyis yang dag par zin pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta/
217b4(mdo sde): ste/ dper na/ pad ma la chu'i thigs pa chung ngu yang mi chags so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' la sdig pa sdig pa chung ngu yang mi chags so// rigs kyi bu 'di
217b5(mdo sde): lta ste dper na/ sa'i phyogs gang du pad ma skyes par gyur pa'i sa'i phyogs des dris khyab par 'dug go/ de bzhin nadu yul dang yul kyi phyogs gang na byang chub sems
217b6(mdo sde): dpa' gnas pa de thams cad tshul khrims kyi dris khyab par 'dug go// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ pad ma ni sa phyogs gar skyes pa'i sa phyogs de gtsang zhing /
217b7(mdo sde): bram ze dang rgyal rigs dang / grong pa dang / yul gyi mi thams cad kyang 'du ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gar skyes kyang rung 'di lta ste/ tshul
217b8(mdo sde): khrims dang / gtsang sbra kun spyod pas gtsang zhing dang te/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang /
218a1(mdo sde): lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams 'du ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs pa yin/ byang chub sems//
218a2(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyis rab tu bsngags pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ pad ma ni kha bye na 'di lta ste/ sems can rnams kyi yid du 'ong bas 'dzum pa lta
218a3(mdo sde): bur snang ngo / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang khro gnyer med cing dbang po shin tu dang bas/ bzhin rtag tu 'dzum pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/
218a4(mdo sde): pad ma ni rang bzhin gyis 'jam zhing mi brtsub pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang rang bzhin gis 'jam zhing dal gyis smra ba yin/ mi brlang zhing
218a5(mdo sde): su cor mi smra ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ pad ma ni rmi lam dang ltas dang yud tsam dag la mthong na yang 'di lta ste/ don grub pa'i phyir bkra shis
218a6(mdo sde): shing / rab tu bsngags pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' mthong na yang 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba la dus thams cad du bkra/
218a7(mdo sde): shis shing rab tu bsngags pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rigs kyi bu bad ma ni nam rgyas pa de na rnam par bye ba zhes bya'o// de bzhin du byang chub
218a8(mdo sde): sems dpa' yang rnam shes rab dang byang chub kyi yan lag gi me tog rgyas pa de na/ blo rnam par dbye ba zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ pad ma ni/
218b1(mdo sde): nam yongs su smin par gyur pa de na/ bltas na mig gi dbang po tshim par byed/ mnyan na rna ba'i dbang po tshis par byed/ bsnams na sna'i dbang po tshim par byed//
218b2(mdo sde): myangs na lce'i dbang po tshim par byed/ reg na lus kyi dbang po tshim par byed/ sems rab tu dga' bas yid kyi dbang po tshim par byed do// de bzhin du byang chub
218b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' yang nam shes rab kyi snang ba yongs su smin par gyur pa de'i tshe bltas na mig gi dbang po rnam par dag par byed/ mnyan na rna ba'i dbang po rnams par
218b4(mdo sde): dag par byed tshul khrims dang / yon tan gyi dri bsnams na sna'i dbang po rnam par dag par byed/ reg pa dang bsnyen bkur byas na/ lus kyi dbang po rnam par dag
218b5(mdo sde): par byed/ yon tan brjod pa rnam par bsams pas/ yid kyi dbang po rnam par dag par byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ pad ma ni skye ba'i tshe 'di lta ste
218b6(mdo sde): mi dang mi ma yin pa dag gis shin tu yongs su bzung ba yin te/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i tshe/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnam
218b7(mdo sde): dang / de ma yin pa bzhan brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dag gis shin tu yongs su bzung ba yin no// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems
218b8(mdo sde): dpa' ma gos pa nas shin yongs su bzung ba'i bar du yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' pad ma lta bu rnams yin no//
219a1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems rgya che ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams
219a2(mdo sde): cad yang dag par bsgrub po zhes sems rgya tsher bskyed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes sems rgya cher bskyed do/ sems can pa'i bstan/
219a3(mdo sde): pa las bskur ba'i phyir ma yin pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la bskur ba dang bral ba rnams yin no// ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la bskur
219a4(mdo sde): pa ma btab pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du sems bskyed do// skra dang kha bu bregs gos ngur smrig dag
219a5(mdo sde): byin nas yang dag par dad pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo // de rab tu byung ba na rgyal pos mnar med par rab tu 'byung / rkun pos
219a6(mdo sde): gtse ba med pa dang / bu lon gyis gtse ba'i med pa dang / 'jig pas gtse ba med pa dang / 'tsho ba med pa'i 'jigs pas skrag pa med par rab tu 'byung ngo //
219a7(mdo sde): de dang de rab tu byung nas dge ba'i rtsi ba yin zhes tshol ba yin te/ de dge ba ci yin zhes tshol bas dge ba'i bshes mnyen rnams la bsnyen par byed/ sten par
219a8(mdo sde): byed bsnyen bkur byed do// de dag las chos kyang nyan to// thos nas kyang nan tan du byed cing nga rgyal gyis zil gyi ma mnon pa yin te/ de nga rgyal dang bral
219b1(mdo sde): bas ma log par 'dzin pa yin/ ma log par 'dzin pas lam shin tu rtogs pa 'thob po/ de la lam shin tu rtogs pas chos nyid thob bo/ chos nyid thob pas bla na
219b2(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du nges par 'byung ngo // de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la bskur pa ma btab pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos
219b3(mdo sde): bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnam par dag pa rnaMs yino// / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sem
219b4(mdo sde): dpa'i nem nur med pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa sku'i gsang ba las mngon par dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
219b5(mdo sde): gsungs gi gsang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi gsang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub dang de bzhin gshegs
219b6(mdo sde): pa 'byung ba dang / theg pa cig gi tshul bstan pa dang / tshul sna tshogs bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsungasi gi sgra dbyangs zab mo dang / sems can
219b7(mdo sde): gyi bsam pa ci lta ba bzhin du 'dul ba la mngon par dad do/ rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba la mngon par dad pa nas ci ltar na
219b8(mdo sde): sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta bzhin du 'dul ba la mngon par dad pa'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems so//
220a1(mdo sde): gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku dang / zhi ba'i sku dang / mi mnyam pa'i sku dang / mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i sku dang /
220a2(mdo sde): tshad med pa'i sku dang / phal la med pa'i sku dang / rdo rje'i sku zhes thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni de kho na'o// 'di ni mi slu ba'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la de nem
220a3(mdo sde): nur med the tsom med de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i bsang ba mngon par dad do/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs
220a4(mdo sde): pa'i gsung gi gsung ba la mngon par dad ce na/ de 'di snyam du sems so// gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du lung
220a5(mdo sde): ston pa dang / gsangs ste lung ston pa dang / ldem po ngag gis kyang sems rnams la lung ston mod kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa 'am ca co med de/
220a6(mdo sde): de'i phyir de la brdzun du smra ba nyes pa mi 'byung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni skyon thams cad spangs pa/ dri ma thams cad spangs pa/ rdul
220a7(mdo sde): thams cad spangs pa/ yongs su gdung ba thams cad dang bral ba nyon mongs pa med pa dbang du gyur pa/ zhi ba dang ba/ yongs su dag pa/ rnyog pa med pa/
220a8(mdo sde): rnam par gsal ba te/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'khrul pa 'am/ ca co 'byung ba de ni gnas ma yin zhing / skabs med do// zhes thos pa 'di ni yang dag
220b1(mdo sde): pa'o// 'di ni kho na'o// 'di ni mi slu ba'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la nem nur med be tsom med de/ de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba la man
220b2(mdo sde): bar dad do// ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi gsang ba la mngon par dad ce na/ de 'di snyam du sems so// gang 'di de bzhin
220b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i yid kyi gsang ba'i de de bzhin gshegs pas ci dgongs pa'i don gang sems dang 'grogs pa/ sems la gnas pa/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
220b4(mdo sde): byin gyis brlabs gyis gyur pa ma gartogs par/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / sems can thams cad/
220b5(mdo sde): kyis shes par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni zab cing gting dpag bka' ba rtag par bya ba ma yin pa/ rtog ge'i spyod
220b6(mdo sde): yul las shin tu 'das pa dpag tu med pa/ rgya che ba yangs pa na mkha'i dbyings dang mtshungs/ rtog ge'i ba thams cad kyi yul las 'das par thos pa 'di
220b7(mdo sde): ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni de kho na'o// 'di ni mi slu ba'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la de nem nur med pathe tsom med pa yin te/ de ltar na de bzhin gshegs
220b8(mdo sde): pa'i yid kyi gsang ba la mngon par dad do// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par bsgrub pa la mngon dad ce na/ de 'di snyam du
221a1(mdo sde): sems so// gang 'di byang chub kyi rgyu byang chub kyi gzhi byang chub kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' de dag sems can gyi don la mngon tu phyog/
221a2(mdo sde): pa dang sems can gyi bya ba dang / sems can gyi byed pa dang / yongs su mi skyo ba dang / mi skrag pa dang / khur chen po khyer ba dang / mthu brtan pa dang brtul ba bstan pa
221a3(mdo sde): dang / pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par sgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mthar kyis yang dag par sgrub pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i blo dang / mtha' yas
221a4(mdo sde): ba'i blo dang / mi mnyam pa'i blo dang / phal la med pa'i blo dang / brtson 'grus brtan pa dang / go cha brtan pa dang / dam bcas pa brtan pa dang / dam bcas pa
221a5(mdo sde): las mi g.yo ba dang / dam pa bal la med pa de dag thams cad rim gyis 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhes thos 'di ni yang dag pa'o//
221a6(mdo sde): 'di ni de kho na'o// 'di ni mi slu ba'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la de nem nur med/ the tsom med de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par sgrub pa la par dad do//
221a7(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba la mngon par dad ce na/ de 'di snyam du sems so// gang 'di byang chub sems dpa' byang chub
221a8(mdo sde): kyi snying por 'dug nas lha'i mig chags pa med cing thogs pa med pa sgrib med pa 'thob po// lha'i rna ba dang / gzhan gyi sems shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su
221b1(mdo sde): dran pa'i shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par shes pa dang / zag pa zad pa shes pa dang / dus gsum bskad cig cig dang ldan pas shes chags pa med pa thogs pa
221b2(mdo sde): med pa/ sgrib pa med pa 'thob po// de'i phyir sems can gyi khams la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lta ste/ sems can 'di rnams ni lus kyi ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/
221b3(mdo sde): ngag gi ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyi ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la bkur pa 'debs pa/ logs par lta ba rnams te/ log par lta ba'i las dang /
221b4(mdo sde): chos yang dag par blongs pa'i phyir/ rgyu de dang rkyen de dang gzhi des lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og du ngan 'gro log par lhung ba sems can dmyal ba dag tu skye'o// sems
221b5(mdo sde): can 'di rnams lus kyi legs par sems spyod pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la bskur
221b6(mdo sde): pa la bskur pa mi 'debs pa/ yang dag par lta ba'i las dang / chos yang dag par blangs pa'i phyir/ rgyu de dang rkyen de dang / gzhi des lus zhig nas/ bde 'gro
221b7(mdo sde): 'tho ris 'jig rten du lha'i nang du skye'o snyam mo// de ltar yang dag pa ji lta bzhin du sems can gyi khams la bltas te/ sems can gyi khams de nyid kyi dge ba dang las
221b8(mdo sde): rnams la rnam par blta'o// de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ sngon bdag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa sbyong bas gang 'di ltar bdag nyid rnams par sangs rgyas nas
222a1(mdo sde): gzhan yang rnam par sangs rgyas par lta'o zhes dam bas pa'i bdag gi smon lam de yongs su rdzogs so// bdag gi brnag pa de yongs su rdzog/
222a2(mdo sde): so snyam zhes thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni de kho na'o// 'di ni mi slu ba'o snyam ste/ 'di nas 'di la de nem nur med/ the tsom med do// gang la byang chub sems
222a3(mdo sde): dpa' de rnams par sangs rgyas pa de ni byang chub ces bya'o// bdag nyid rnams par sangs rgyas pas/ des na rdzogs par sangs rgyas shes bya ste/ de ltar na byang chub
222a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' byang chub dang de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba la mngon par dad do// ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' theg pa cig gi tshul bstan pa la mngon par dad ce na/
222a5(mdo sde): de 'di snyam du sems te/ gang 'di snyam du sems te/ theg pa ni cig kho na ste/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa'o zhes thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o//
222a6(mdo sde): 'di ni de kho na'o// 'di ni mi slu ba'o/ 'di ni de bzhin pa'o// ma nor ba'o// gzhan ma yin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ theg pa gzhan rnams kyang 'di ltas byung ba'i
222a7(mdo sde): phyir ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dzam bu'i gling na/ gang gling yod pa rnams ming gis tha dad par shes mod kyi/ 'on kyang de dag ni 'dzam bu'i gling du 'du'o//
222a8(mdo sde): 'dzam bu'i gling la rten to// 'dzam bu'i gling gi grangs su 'gro'o// de'i phyir na gling cig kha na ste/ 'di ni 'dzam bu'i gling ngo // de bzhin du theg pa thams cad
222b1(mdo sde): ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg par 'du'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa la gnas so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa las byung ba'o// de'i phyir ba ni cig kho na
222b2(mdo sde): ste/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la nem nur med the tsom med de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' theg pa cig gis tshul bstan pa la
222b3(mdo sde): mngon par dad do/ ji ltar na tshul sna tshogs bstan pa la mngon par dad ce na/ de 'di snyam du sems so// gang 'di mdo sde de dang de dag las de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul
222b4(mdo sde): sna tshogs bshad pa thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni de kho na'o// 'di ni mi slu ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa tha dad pa ci lta
222b5(mdo sde): ba bzhin du/ sems rnams la chos ston to snyam ste/ gnas 'di la de nem nur med/ the tsom med de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul sna tshogs bstan pa la mngon
222b6(mdo sde): par dad do/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sgra'i dbyang zab mo mngon par dad ce na/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ gang 'di de bzhin
222b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i gsung sgra'i dbyangs zab mo thos nas 'di ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni de kho na'o// 'di ni mi slu ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba'i
222b8(mdo sde): lha'i bu rnams kyi dbyangs kyang zab cing snyan pa yin na/ bskal pa rgya stong du mar dge ba'i rtsa ba bsgrubs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lta ba ci smos snyam ste/
223a1(mdo sde): gnas 'di de la nem nur med the tsom med de/ de ltar na de byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sgra'i dbyangs zab mo la mngon/
223a2(mdo sde): par dad do// rigs kyi bu ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi bsam pa ci lta ba bzhin du 'dul ba la mngon par dad ce na/ de 'di snyam du sems so//
223a3(mdo sde): gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa bsam pa dang bag la nyal ba mkhyen te/ sems can mos pa tha dad pa dang / 'dul ba tha dad pa rnams la gsung sgra'i dbyangs cig brjod
223a4(mdo sde): pas the tsom gcod cing yongs su smin par ci lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams 'dul lo// sems can rnams kyang so so nas de bzhin gshegs pa bdag la chos ston to//
223a5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa bdag la chos ston to snyam byed kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go zhes thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni de kho na'o//
223a6(mdo sde): 'di ni mi slu ba'o// snyam ste/ gnas 'di la de nem nur med the tsom med de/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta
223a7(mdo sde): ba bzhin du 'dul ba la mngon par dad do/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' nem nur med pa rnams yin no//
223a8(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub dpa' blo rgya mtsho lta bu rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa rnams yin/ zab cing
223b1(mdo sde): gting dpag bka' ba rnams yin/ rgya che zhing tshad med pa rnams yin/ bags kyis gzhol ba rnams yin/ nyon mongs pa'i ro dang lhan cig mi 'dug pa rnams yin/
223b2(mdo sde): ri cig pa rnams yin/ chu bo kun zed pa rnams yin/ dus las mi g.yo ba rnams yin/ 'byung po mang po'i gnas su gyur pa rnams yin/ mi zad pa rnams yin no//
223b3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de lta ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin pa nas ci ltar mi zad pa'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na//
223b4(mdo sde): rgya mtsho chen po ni rin po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas te/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad kyis rin po che brang bas mi zad do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
223b5(mdo sde): yang yon tan rin po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ sems can thams cad kyis yon tan rin po che blangs pas mi zad do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper
223b6(mdo sde): na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni zab cing gting dpag bka' ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ye shes yang dag par grub pa yang zab cing / sems can tham
223b7(mdo sde): cad kyis gting dpag dka' ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni 'di lta ste/ chu tshad med pas na/ yang sa shing rgya che ba yin no//
223b8(mdo sde): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'di lta ste/ blo tshad med pas nas yangs shing rgya che ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni bags
224a1(mdo sde): gis gzhol ba bags kyis 'bab po/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la
224a2(mdo sde): 'bab thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'bab bo// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni shi ba'i ro dang lhan cig mi 'dug go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni rgya mtsho
224a3(mdo sde): chen po'i chos nyid do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa'i ro dang mi dge ba'i grogs po rnams lhan cig mi gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni
224a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen por chu bo che snyed pa de ba de thams cad kyang ro cig pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/
224a5(mdo sde): lan tsa'i ro'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos dkar po rnams ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ro cig pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen
224a6(mdo sde): pa'i ro'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni chu bo tshad med pa kun zed kyang de la bri ba 'am/ gang bar yang mi mngon no// de bzhin du
224a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' yang chos kyi chu bo tshad med pa kun zed kyang de la bri ba'i gang ba mi mngon no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni dus las
224a8(mdo sde): mi yol lo// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'dul bar bya ba'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i dus las mi yol lo// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste bya
224b1(mdo sde): dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni 'byung po mang po gnas so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can thams cad dang chos dkar po thams cad gnaso//
224b2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po na sems can thams cad kyi chu bcus kyang mi zad pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems
224b3(mdo sde): can thams cad la chos ston pa mi zad pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa nas mi zad pa'i bar du yin no//
224b4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' blo rgya mtsho lta bu rnams yin no// / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan
224b5(mdo sde): na/ byang chub sems dpa' blo zhib pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang ba tshol ba la mkhas pa rnams yin/ chos thams brtag pa la mkhas
224b6(mdo sde): pa rnams yin// chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa rnams yin no// chos thams cad sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du khong du chud pa rnams yin na/
224b7(mdo sde): chos thams cad yongs su shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab cing gting dka' ba la mkhas pa rnams yin/ las bsam
224b8(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/ smras pa'i don shes pa rnams yin/ don yang dge ba ci lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa rnams yin/ de kho na la mkhas pa rnams
225a1(mdo sde): @#yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba tshol ba la mkhas pa yin pas// ci ltar na de kho na la mkhas pa'i bar
225a2(mdo sde): du yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar dpyod de/ kye ma'o 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags kyi mes kun tu 'bar ro rab tu 'baro//
225a3(mdo sde): kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar ro// kye ma'o 'jig rten gnas pa 'di lta ste/ zhe sdang gi du ba/ 'khrigs pa'i du ba tshubs pas rnam par rmongs pa'o// kye ma'o
225a4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni lta ste/ gti mug gi mug pas mun nag du gyur to snyam mo// do ni 'di ltar sems can 'di dag ci ltar 'byung bar 'gyur snyam sems te/
225a5(mdo sde): de de dag gi 'byung ba yongs su tshol zhing chos thams cad la rtog go// chos thams cad la rtog pas/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid khong du chud par 'gyur ro// chos
225a6(mdo sde): thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pas/ chos thams cad sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so / chos thams cad sgyu ma'i mtshan
225a7(mdo sde): nyid du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pas/ chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
225a8(mdo sde): du yongs su shes pas rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo la rnam par sems so// rten cing 'byung ba bzab mo la rnam par sems pas/ las bsam gyis mi
225b1(mdo sde): khyab pa la rnam par rtog ste/ de 'di snyam du dngos po med pa'i chos rnams la/ las sna tshogs snang ba ni ngo mtshar to snyam du sems so// de ltar de blo zhib mo dang ldan
225b2(mdo sde): pas sangs rgyas sam/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gsungs pa tsam gyis don shes so// des don shes pas don yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du rtogs so//
225b3(mdo sde): don yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pas de kho na mthong ngo / de kho na mthong bas/ sems can rnams 'khor ba'i btson ra nas thar par byed de/ rigs kyi bu de
225b4(mdo sde): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba tshol ba la mkhas pa nas/ de kho na la mkhas pa'i bar du yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub
225b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' blo zhib pa rnams yin no// / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa can rnams yin no// bcu gang ga
225b6(mdo sde): zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad bdag med par 'jog go// chos thams cad sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gso ba med pa dang / gang zag
225b7(mdo sde): med pa dang / byed pa po med pa dang / tshor ba po med pa dang / shes pa po med pa dang / mthong ba po med pa dang / gsog gso ba ste/ dbang phyug chen po dang /
225b8(mdo sde): stong pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pa dang / rkyen las byung bar 'jog ste/ rigs kyi bu de la chos thams cad bdag med pa zhes bya ba 'din
226a1(mdo sde): rigs pa'o// 'di ni chos nyid dang mthun pa'o// chos thams cad sems can med pa srog med pa zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs pa'o// 'di ni chos//
226a2(mdo sde): nyid dang mthun pa'o// de bzhin du chos thams cad gso ba med pa dang / gang zag med pa dang / byed pa po med pa dang / tshor ba po med pa dang / shes pa po med pa dang //
226a3(mdo sde): mthong ba po med pa dang / gsog gsob ste/ dbang phyug med pa/ dang / stong pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pa dang / rkyen las byung ba'o zhes bya ba 'di
226a4(mdo sde): ni rigs pa'o// 'di ni chos nyid dang mthun pa'o// rigs kyi bu gang chos nyid dang mthun pa'i de ni rigs pa'o// gang chos nyid dang mi 'gal ba de ni rigs pa'o//
226a5(mdo sde): gang chos nyid las mi 'khrul pa de ni rigs pa'o// gang chos nyid la 'bab pa de ni rigs pa'o// gang chos nyid ston pa de ni rigs pa'o// de yang de dag la
226a6(mdo sde): spobs pas na/ de'i phyir rigs par spobs pa rnams shes bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rigs pa'i spobs pa can
226a7(mdo sde): rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' grol ba'i dga' ba'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma shar na
226a8(mdo sde): mun pa mun nag thams cad rnam par sel to// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na yang ma rigs pa'i mun pa thams cad rnam par sel to// rigs
226b1(mdo sde): kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma shar na pad ma rnam par 'byed par byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar ba yang 'dul ba'i sems can gyi bang
226b2(mdo sde): ma rnam par 'byed par byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma shar na phyogs bcu thams cad du lhan ner byed do/ de bzhin du byang chub sems
226b3(mdo sde): dpa' nyi ma shar na yang phyogs bcu thams cad du shes rab kyi gzi brjid dang / ye shes kyi 'od gzer gyis rab tu ldan ner byed kyang sems can rnams la gnod
226b4(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dzam bu gling du nyi ma'i 'od gzer dag rnam snang ba'i de'i tshe na shar ces bya'o// de bzhin du byang chub
226b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' nyi ma'i ye shes kyi 'od gzer rnams ni snang ba'i tshe na/ dge ba'i chos rnams shar ces bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dzam bu gling du
226b6(mdo sde): nyi ma'i snang ba nam med par 'gyur ba de'i tshe na nub ces bya'o/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams thams cad kyi thams cad du/ nam
226b7(mdo sde): med par gyur pa de'i tshe na zag pa zad ces bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma shar na 'dzam bu gling gi sems can rnams la snang bar byed do/ de bzhin
226b8(mdo sde): du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na yang sems can thams cad la ye shes kyis snang bar byed cing gti mug gi mun pa'i rab rib kyis khebs pa rnam par sel to//
227a1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma shar na 'od thams cad kyi 'od mi snang bar bya'o snyam du mi sems mod kyi/ 'on kyang chos nyid thob/
227a2(mdo sde): pas 'od med par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na yang mu stegs can ngan pa'i 'od dang mu stegs can ngan pa'i lugs thams cad 'od
227a3(mdo sde): med par 'gyur mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma ni ngas 'di dag 'od med par bya'o snyam du mi sems ste 'on kyang chos nyid thob pas 'od med par 'gyur ro//
227a4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma shar na 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams la mnyam pa dang / mi mnyam pa legs par ston to// de bzhin du byang chub sems
227a5(mdo sde): dpa'i nyi ma shar na yang sems can thams cad la ye shes kyi snang bas mnyam pa dang / mi mnyam pa legs par ston to// rigs kyi bu mnyam pa zhes bya ba 'di
227a6(mdo sde): ni 'phags pa'i lam gyi tshig bla dgas so// rigs kyi bu mi mnyam pa zhes bya ba 'di ni lam pa'i tshig bla dgas so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma
227a7(mdo sde): shar na rmo bko'i las kyi mtha' thams cad 'byung ngo // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na yang dge ba'i chos kyi las mtha' thams cad 'byung ngo //
227a8(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rigs nyi ma shar na skye bo dge ba na dga' bar 'gyur la/ mi srun pa'i rang bzhin can dag ni mi dga' bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin
227b1(mdo sde): du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na yang skye bo dge ba rnams dang mkhas pa rnams dang / shes rab kyi rang bzhin can rnams ni dga' bar 'gyur/ lam ngan par
227b2(mdo sde): zhugs pa rnams dang / mi srun pa'i rang bzhin can rnams dang / byis pa'i rang bzhin can rnams dang / shes rab 'chal ba'i rang bzhin can rnams dang / 'khor
227b3(mdo sde): ba la mngon par dga' ba dang / mya ngan 'das pa las phyir phyogs pa rnams ni mi dga' bar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma rig
227b4(mdo sde): pa'i mun pa sel ba skye bo dge ba dga' ba'i bar du yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma lta bu rnams yin no//
227b5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' seng ge lta bu rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bag mi tsha ba rnams yin/ mi brtags pa
227b6(mdo sde): spobs pa can rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa rnams yin/ spobs pa mi zad pa rnams yin/ spobs pa rgyun chags
227b7(mdo sde): ba rnams yin/ spobs pa mi brtags pa rnams yin/ spobs pa ma zhum pa rnams yin/ spobs pa mi skrag pa rnams yin/ spobs pa phal la med pa rnams yin/
227b8(mdo sde): spobs pa zil gis mi non pa rnams yin/ spobs pa mtha' yas pa rnams yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu
228a1(mdo sde): chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' grol ba'i spobs pa can rnams yin no// / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang
228a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnam par dag pa'i spobs pa rnams yin no/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dar 'dar po med pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin/ mi 'khrul bI
228a3(mdo sde): spobs pa can rnams yin/ mi zhan pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin/ yengs yeng po med pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin/ de dag gi spobs pa don dang bral ba ma
228a4(mdo sde): yin/ tshig 'bru dang bral ba ma yin/ sbyong ba dang bral ba ma yin/ dus dang bral ba ma yin/ mi gsal ba'i spobs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu byang
228a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni 'dar 'dang po ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'khor gyi 'jigs pa'i bag tsha ba dang bral ba'i phyir ro// byang chub
228a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni 'khrul pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ blo bstan zhi mi 'gyur pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
228a7(mdo sde): spobs pa ni zhen pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jigs pa med pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni 'khor gyi nang du byin na/ mi
228a8(mdo sde): 'jigs mi skrag ste/ seng ge ltar 'jigs pa med cing / mi skrag mi dngang pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni yeng yeng 'a bo med
228b1(mdo sde): pa yin no// de'i phyir zhe na/ nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i spobs pa ni yang seng por 'gyur ba yin te/
228b2(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa med pa'i ni ma yin no/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni don dang bral ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos nyid thob pa'i phyir te/
228b3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos nyid ma thob pa rnams kyi ni don dang bral bar 'gyur gyi chos nyid thob pa rnams kyi ni ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni
228b4(mdo sde): tshig 'bru dang bral ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bstan chos thams cad la 'jigs pa med pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu bstan bcos kyi phyogs dga'
228b5(mdo sde): shes pa rnams kyi tshig 'bru dang bral bar 'gyur gyi/ bstan bcos thams cad la 'jigs pa med pa rnams kyi ni ma yin no// byang chub sems pa dpa' rnams
228b6(mdo sde): kyi spobs pa ni sbyor ba dang bral ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par sgrubs pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu sbyor ba la mi mkhas pa
228b7(mdo sde): rnams kyi ni sbyor ba dang bral bar 'gyur gyi/ sbyor ba mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi ni ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni gang /
228b8(mdo sde): phyis smra bar bya ba de sngar smra ba 'am// gang sngar smra bar bya ba de phyis smra bra lta da bur dus dang bral ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'
229a1(mdo sde): rnams ni dus shes pa yin/ tshod shes pa yin dus man shes pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni/ rtsub pa yin
229a2(mdo sde): du mi 'ong ba/ mi snyan pa ma yin no/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngag gi gnas ngan len dang bral ba'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu gnas ngan len dang bcas pa rnams kyi
229a3(mdo sde): spobs pa ni rtsub pa yin gyi/ gnas ngan len dang bral ba rnams kyi ni ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni mi gsal ba ma yin te/ de ci'i
229a4(mdo sde): phyir zhe na/ dbang po rno ba'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu dbang po rtul po rnams kyi spobs pa ni mi gsal ba yin gyi/ dbang po rnon po rnams ni ma yin te/ rigs
229a5(mdo sde): kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dag pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/
229a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad mgu bar byed pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jam par smra ba rnams
229a7(mdo sde): yin/ bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer med pa rnams yin/ don du smra ba rnams yin/ chos su smra ba rnams yin/ mtshungs par smra ba rnams yin/ mi ngoms
229a8(mdo sde): ba rnams yin/ brnyas pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ nyon mongs par 'gyur ba med pa yin/ 'khrug pa med pa rnams yin/ spobs pa sna tshogs pa rnams
229b1(mdo sde): yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' 'jam par smra ba ni/ 'jam par smra bas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa' ni bzhin/
229b2(mdo sde): 'dzum zhing khro gnyer med pa yin te/ mdangs bzang pos sems can rnams mgu bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa' don du smra ba ni tshig ran pas
229b3(mdo sde): sems can rnams mgu bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa' chos su smra ba ni phan par smra bas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do/ byang chub sems dpa'
229b4(mdo sde): mtshungs par smra ba ni sems can thams cad la mtshungs par chos ston pas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa' mi ngom pa ni
229b5(mdo sde): nga rgyal dang dregs pa dang rgyags pa dang bral zhing spyod pa mtshungs pas/ sems can rnams mgu bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa' brnyas pa dang bral ba ni ri
229b6(mdo sde): mor byas shing chos ston pas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do// byang chub sos dpa' nyon mongs par 'gyur ba med pa ni ngang tshul de bas/ sems can
229b7(mdo sde): rnams mgu bar byed do/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khrug pa med pa ni bzod pa mang bas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
229b8(mdo sde): dpa' spobs pa sna tshogs can ni/ dga' ba'i tshig gis sems can rnams mgu bar byed do// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'
230a1(mdo sde): sems can thams cad mgu bar byed pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'
230a2(mdo sde): tshig gzung ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams snod du ma gyur pa'i sems can rnams la chos mi ston te/
230a3(mdo sde): zhe 'gras pa rnams la ma yin/ klan ka tshol ba rnams la ma yin/ mu stegs can rnams la ma yin/ ri mo med pa rnams la ma yin/ ma dad pa mang ba rnams
230a4(mdo sde): la ma yin/ g.yo dang sgyus grags pa rnams la ma yin/ 'tshe ba'i bsam pa can yin/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang / pra dog dang ser snas glags lta ba rnams la/
230a5(mdo sde): ma yin/ sems can glen pa rmongs pa lug ltar lkug pa'i rang bzhin can rnams la chos mi ston to// rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'
230a6(mdo sde): rnams la chos kyi ser sna yang med/ chos la slob dpon 'chab pa yang med sems can rnams ri mor mi byed pa yang med sems can gyi don la rgyab kyis phyogs
230a7(mdo sde): pa yang med mod kyi sems can 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba'i snod du ma gyur pa'o zhes btang snyoms su gnas pa rnams yin no/ byang chub
230a8(mdo sde): sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na sems can ci 'dra ba rnams la sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems
230b1(mdo sde): dpa' rnams chos ston/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sems can dad pa rnams la sangs rgyas rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnam
230b2(mdo sde): chos ston to// sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba smin pa rnams dang / snod du gyur pa rnams dang / sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa rnams dang / g.yo med pa rnams dang
230b3(mdo sde): sgyu med pa rnams dang / spyod lam mi mchos pa rnams dang / rnyed pa dang bkur bsti la tshogs pa dang bral ba rnams dang / bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang /
230b4(mdo sde): dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa dang / ngang tshul bzang po dang ldan pa rnams dang / legs par stong pa rnams dang / dbang po rno ba gang bshad
230b5(mdo sde): pa'i don rig par 'gyur ba de thob par bya ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas ci skad gsungs pa bzhin byed par 'gyur ba'i sems
230b6(mdo sde): can de lta bu dag la rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos ston to// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub
230b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chos ston nga ba rnams yin no// / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' chos brjod pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/
230b8(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par sgrub pa'i phyir chos ston kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yang dag par sgrub pa yang mi dmigs so// pha rol tu phyin
231a1(mdo sde): pa rnams yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir/ chos ston kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yang dag par bsgrub pa yang mi dmigs so// byang //
231a2(mdo sde): chub yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir chos ston kyang byang chub dang yang dag par sgrub pa yang mi dmigs so// nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir chos ston kyang nyon mongs
231a3(mdo sde): ba dang spang ba yang mi dmigs so// skyo ba dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang 'gogs pa'i phyir chos ston kyang skyo ba dang bral ba dang 'gog pa yang mi dmigs so//
231a4(mdo sde): rgyun tu zhugs pa dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi bya'i 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston kyang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i mi dmigs lan ciga'i phyir
231a5(mdo sde): 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba yang mi dmigs phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang mi dmigs so// dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston kyang
231a6(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu yang mi dmigs so// rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston kyang rang sangs rgyas dang rang
231a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu yang mi dmig so// bdag tu 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa yang spang ba'i phyir chos ston kyang bdag tu 'dzin pa yang mi dmigs so// las
231a8(mdo sde): kyi rnam par smin pa yang 'jog mod kyi/ las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa yang mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ chos
231b1(mdo sde): gang ming gang gis brjod pa de ming des yod pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos nyid ni yi ge'i rang bzhin ma yin yi ge'i rnams ni chos kyi rang bzhin ma yin//
231b2(mdo sde): mod kyi kun rdzob kyi bden pa la brten tha snyad la rten btags pa la brten nas ming med pa chos rnams la ming du 'jog ste/ ming de yang gsob gsog go/
231b3(mdo sde): gang gso ba dang gsog de la don dam pa med de/ gang la don dam pa med pa de brdzun te bslu ba'i chos so// gang brdzun zhing slu ba'i chos de ni byis bI skye bo
231b4(mdo sde): slu ba'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' chos brjod pa rnams yin no// // rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan
231b5(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos
231b6(mdo sde): kyi rje su 'brang la gzugs las kyang mi 'byung / chos kyi rjes su yang 'brang la/ tsher ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnams par shes
231b7(mdo sde): ba las kyang mi 'byung chos kyi rjes su yang 'brang la/ 'dod pa'i khams las kyang mi 'byung chos kyi rjes su yang 'breng la gzugs kyi khams las kyang
231b8(mdo sde): mi 'byung chos kyi rjes su yang 'brang la/ gzugs med pa'i khams las kyang mi 'byung / chos kyi rjes su yang 'brang la/ chos las kyang mi 'byung
232a1(mdo sde): chos kyi rjes su yang 'brang la chos las 'da' bar yang mi 'gyur chos kyi rjes su 'brang la sems can gyi phyir yang mi 'brang chos kyi
232a2(mdo sde): rjes su yang 'brang la chad par lta ba'i phyir yang mi 'brang chos kyi rjes su yang 'brang la lam las kyang mi 'byung ste/ de ni thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro//
232a3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag ldan na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi
232a4(mdo sde): dbyings la mkhas pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab can rnams yin/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba rnams yin/
232a5(mdo sde): brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams yin/ sgrib pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ shin tu yongs su dag pa rnams yin/ gdam ngag la ri mo dang bcas pa rnams yin//
232a6(mdo sde): stong pa nyid la bsgob pa mang ba rnams yin/ dmigs par lta ba dang bral ba rnams yin/ lam du zhugs pa rnams yin/ de kho na mthong ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu
232a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' shes rab dang ldan pa ni dge ba'i gshes gnyen tshol te/ des dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong nas dga' zhing rang te/ de la sten pa 'du shes skyed
232a8(mdo sde): cing brtan te gnas so/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brtan pas na mi dge ba'i chos thams cad ni spang ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya
232b1(mdo sde): ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin no// brtson 'grus brtsams pas ni bsgrib pa thams cad nub par 'gyu ro// sgrib pa med cing lam gyi rgyun ma
232b2(mdo sde): chad pas shin tu yongs su dag cing / lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gnas ngan len dang bral bar 'gyur ro// de shin tu yongs su dag pas gdam ngag la ri raM
232b3(mdo sde): mo dang bcas pa yin no// de gdam ngag la ri mo dang bcas pas stong pa nyid la sgom pa mang ba yin no// stong pa nyid la sgom pa mang bas/ dmigs pa'i lta ba
232b4(mdo sde): mi 'gyur ro// de dmigs pa'i lta ba dang bral bas lam du 'jug go// de lam du zhugs pas de kho na mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa'i sgrib pa thams cad
232b5(mdo sde): rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de kho na zhes bgyi ba ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/
232b6(mdo sde): de kho na zhes bya ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i don gyi tshig bla dgas so// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa zhes bya ba 'di ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das
232b7(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gang mi slu ba de ni yang dag pa'o// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das mi slu ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ci lags/ bcom
232b8(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ni de bzhin nyid dang ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das
233a1(mdo sde): de bzhin nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu chos 'di ni so so rang gis rig pa
233a2(mdo sde): yin te/ 'di ni yi ge dag gis gdags par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos 'di ni yi ge thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ smra ba tham
233a3(mdo sde): cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ tshig gi spyod yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ ngag gi las thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ spro ba
233a4(mdo sde): thams cad dang bral ba/ blang ba dang dor po thams cad dang bral ba/ phye ba dang btsums pa thams cad dang bral ba/ rtog ge thams cad dang bral ba/ brtag par
233a5(mdo sde): bya ba ma yin pa/ rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa/ rtog ge'i spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa mtshan ma med pa/ mtshan ma dang bral ba/ mtshan mi'i
233a6(mdo sde): spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ byis pa'i yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ byis pa'i spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ bdud thams cad
233a7(mdo sde): kyi yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul las yang dag par
233a8(mdo sde): 'das pa gnas pa ma yin pa/ mi gnas pa zhi pa/ 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis spyod yul te/ de dag nyid kyi so so rang gis rig pa/ dri ma med pa ma
233b1(mdo sde): gos pa/ dang ba rnam par dag pa gya nom pa mchog dam pa/ phul rtag pa brtan pa'i ther zug mi 'jigs pa'i chos can te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang /
233b2(mdo sde): rung chos kyi dbyings 'di ni 'dug pa kho na'o// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' dag chos nyid 'di thos nas/ sems can dag kyang chos 'di kho na la rab tu
233b3(mdo sde): dgod do snyam te/ don gang gi phyir 'bad cing rtsol ba dang / brtson 'grus brtsom pa dang / dka' ba brgya dag byed pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// /
233b4(mdo sde): yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya'o// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o// bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ces
233b5(mdo sde): bya'o// gnyis su med pa'i dbyings shes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnams par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ji ltar
233b6(mdo sde): mngon tu bgyi/ ji ltar khong du chud par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi mngon du bya'o//
233b7(mdo sde): rang gyis rig par khong du chud par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang shes rab kyis
233b8(mdo sde): mngon du bgyis pa de rang gyis rig pa khong du chud pa nyid ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
234a1(mdo sde): shes rab kyis ni chos rnams yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du mthong ngo // lus kyis ni mngon byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams//
234a2(mdo sde): cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu gang gis thos pa las byung ba 'am/ bsam pa las byung ba'i shes pas khong du chud pas
234a3(mdo sde): gyur pa de rang gis rig pa ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ma yin te/ thos pa tsam 'am/ bsam pa tsam gyis ni rang
234a4(mdo sde): ngagis rig pa'i chos khong du chud par mi nus so// rigs kyi bu de lta bas na/ dpe nyon cig rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ 'brog chen por sos ka'i zla ba
234a5(mdo sde): tha ma la mi la la zhig/ shar phyogs nas nub phyogs su 'gro la/ de nas mi gzhan zhig nub phyogs nas shar phyogs su 'ongs te/ de yang sos ka'i tsha bas
234a6(mdo sde): yongs su gdungs par gyur nas skom gis nyen pa de/ shar phyogs nas 'ongs pa'i mi de la 'di skad ces smras te/ kye skyes bu kho bo sos ka'i tsha bas yongs su
234a7(mdo sde): gdungs te/ skom gos nyen la/ gang na mtsho ba'am/ lteng ka'am/ rdzing gang chus bsil ba dang / rnyog pa med pa/ gsal ba gang yod cing / gang du bdag
234a8(mdo sde): tsha ba dang / skom pa rab du zhi bar 'gyur ba'i lam bdag la ston cig ces zer la/ shar phyogs nas 'ongs pa'i mi de yang / lam shes pa lam mkhas pa/
234b1(mdo sde): lam mthong ba/ lam gyi mtshan ma mthong ba zhig yin te/ des de ni chu'i nyes pa dang bral ba'i chu sngan cad mthong la/ sngon myangs shing / sngon yang zhus pa
234b2(mdo sde): yin te/ des mi de la 'di skad du/ kye grogs po lam 'di nas lam kha brag mthong gi bar du song la/ kye skyes bu khyod kyis g.yon gyi lam 'or te/ g.yas kyi
234b3(mdo sde): lam nas nags tshal sngon po dang / nags tshal de'i dbus na/ mtsho 'am/ lteng ka 'am/ rdzing bu bsil cing dang ba rnyog pa med pa gsal bas/ gang ba mthong
234b4(mdo sde): gi bar du song ste/ der skyes bu khyod kyis skom dang / tsha ba med par byos shig ces zer na/ rigs kyi bu de 'di snyam du sems/ sos ka'i tsha bas yongs
234b5(mdo sde): su gdungs te/ skom gis nyen pa'i mi des/ chu thos ma thag dang bsams pa tsam gyis tsha ba med par 'gyur ram/ skom pa dang yang bral bar 'gyur ram/
234b6(mdo sde): chu de'i bsil ba yang rang gis rig par 'gyur/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das mi de nam der phyin nas/ des chu der zhugs
234b7(mdo sde): te/ 'tshal bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ mi de'i tsha ba de ma mchis par 'gyur ro// skob pa dang yang bral bar 'gyur ro// nges bsil ba yang rang gis rig par
234b8(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin du rigs kyi bu thob pa dang / bsams patsam gyis rang gis rig pa'i chos khong du byar mi nub pa/
235a1(mdo sde): de la rigs kyi bu 'brog ces bya ba 'di ni 'khor ba'i 'brog gi tshig bla dgas so// mi sos ga'i tsha bas yongs su gdungs shing /
235a2(mdo sde): skom gyis nyen pa zhes bya ba 'di ni/ nyon mongs pa'i gdungs pas yongs su gdungs shing / yul gyi sred pa nyen pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshig bla dgas so//
235a3(mdo sde): lam shes pa'i mi zhes bya ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam la mkhas pa myong ba/ chos rang gis rig pa rnams kyi tshig bla dgas so//
235a4(mdo sde): chu bsil zhing dang la rnyog pa med pa gsal ba zhes bya 'di ni don dam pa'i chos nyid kyi tshig bla dgas so// yang rigs kyi bu dpe nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du
235a5(mdo sde): sems/ gang te de bzhin gshegs pa tshe'i tshad bskal par zhugs te/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyi mdun du 'di lta ste/ lha'i bdud rtsi dri zhim pa dang
235a6(mdo sde): gtsang ma dang gya nom pa dang / shin tu zhim pa dang / reg na bde ba las brtsams te/ sngags pa brjod na/ rigs kyi bu de ci snyam du sems// ci sems can
235a7(mdo sde): de dag gis lha'i bdud rtsi de'i bsngags pa rang gis rig par 'gyur ram/ gsol ba bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
235a8(mdo sde): pa/ rigs kyi bu de lta bas na/ khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis ci ltar thos pa tsam 'am/ bsams pa tsam rang gis rig pa'i chos khong du chud par mi nus
235b1(mdo sde): par rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu yang dpe nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ mi zhig gis shing tog gi rnam pa sngon sems can sus kyang ma myangs
235b2(mdo sde): ba zhig myangs par gyur la/ des mi gzhan zhig gi mdun du shing tog gi rnam pa de'i bsngags pa 'di lta ste/ kha dog phun sum tshogs pa dang / ro phun sum chog
235b3(mdo sde): ba dang / dri zhim pa las brtsams te/ brjod na rigs kyi bu de ci snyam du sems/ ji mi de shing tog gi ro de rang gis rig par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/
235b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de lta bas na khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis ci ltar thos pa tsam 'am/
235b5(mdo sde): bsams pa tsam gyis so sor rang gis rig pa'i chos khong du chud par mi nus par rig par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par
235b6(mdo sde): sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das legs par gsungs so// bde bar gshegs pa shin tu legs par gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi tshul
235b7(mdo sde): 'di su dag gi rna bar thos par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu de dag gis chos 'di khong du chud pa nyid du rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das
235b8(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de dag gis chos 'di thob par bgyi ba la 'di nyid ma log pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no//
236a1(mdo sde): @de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu de dag gis chos 'di thob par bya ba la 'di nyid ma log pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang
236a2(mdo sde): ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pa rnams yin no// // rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid
236a3(mdo sde): spyod yul ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ stobs kyi stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ mi 'jigs pa'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ sangs rgyas
236a4(mdo sde): kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes tshul khrims kyi phung po'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ ting nge 'dzin gi phung po'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/
236a5(mdo sde): shes rab kyi phung po'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ rnam par grol ba'i phung po'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung
