236a6(mdo sde): bo'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ stong pa'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ don dam pa'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes te/ rgyu de dang rkyen de dang / gzhi des
236a7(mdo sde): stong pa nyid du dmigs pa dang / stong pa nyid du 'dzin pa dang / stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / stong pa nyid la gnas pa yang mi dmigs/ rgyu de dang rkyen de dang gzhi
236a8(mdo sde): des med par yang ma ltung ngo // rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid kyi spyod yul ba rnams yin no//
236b1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chom bcu dang ldanan// byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ma med pa gangs rnams yin no// bcu gang zhen 'di lta ste/ phyi rol gyi mtshan ma dang thas
236b2(mdo sde): ba rnams yin/ nang gi mtshan ma dang bral ba rnams yin/ spros pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/
236b3(mdo sde): dmigs pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ g.yo ba thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ rgyu ba thams dacad dang bral ba rnams yin/ dmigs par bya ba
236b4(mdo sde): thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa rnaMs yin/ rnam par shes par bya ba'i dngos po mi dmigs pa rnams yin no//
236b5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa rnams yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub
236b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtshan ma ma mchis pa
236b7(mdo sde): la gnas pa de yang de 'dra na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kying ci 'dra bar lta bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu
236b8(mdo sde): gnas 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsam pa'i yul dang bral ba'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid rjes
237a1(mdo sde): bsams na/ sems can thams cad mos par 'gyur gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos nyid kyi pha rol tam/ tshu rol mthong bar mi
237a2(mdo sde): 'gyur mi dmigs te/ tha mar na dub pa'i skal pa can du 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni zab cing gting dpag dka' la/
237a3(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa dpag tu med pa rgya che ba/ nam mkha' dang / 'dra ba rtog ge thams cad kyi spyod yul las 'das pa/ dmigs pa thams cad kyi yul las
237a4(mdo sde): 'das pa ste/ bsam pa'am gzhal ba 'am/ tshad gzung bar mi nus so// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ gal te
237a5(mdo sde): zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
237a6(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs 'ga' zhig zha'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas rtag tu skabs phye'i
237a7(mdo sde): khyod dris shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bdag stod pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis kras/ skyes bu dam
237a8(mdo sde): pa ma lags pa'i chos su gsungs na/ de ji ltar chos kyi rje/ bcom ldan 'das nyid bdag la bstod pa mdzad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs
237b1(mdo sde): kyi bu leg so legaso// khyod kyis dri ba tshul bzhin dris so// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid ma zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom/
237b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das legs so zhes/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan par dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di
237b3(mdo sde): skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ sems can 'di dag la ci nas kyang phan pa dang / bde ba dang / chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir/ bdag
237b4(mdo sde): bstod pa ma gtogs par nga rgyal gyi zil gyis non pa dang / rnyed pa'i zil gyis non pa dang / bkur sti'i zil gyis non pa dang / grags pa 'dod pa'i phyir/
237b5(mdo sde): tshul 'chos pa 'am/ kha gsag byed cing yang dag pa ma yin par bdag stong pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs
237b6(mdo sde): pa la dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs pa nye bar gzhag pa chos bston pa'i bskal pa yod par 'gyur/ dge ba'i chos rnams kyi snod du 'gyur te/
237b7(mdo sde): de yang de dag la yun ring por don dang phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnams par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom
237b8(mdo sde): ldan 'das ci lags sems can 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu 'tshal tam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu mi shes so//
238a1(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i sems can rnams ni/ rgya chung ngu la mos bshes rab chung ba/ dad pa chung ba dge ba'i
238a2(mdo sde): rtsa ba chung ngus brtan pa dag ste/ de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi che ba mi shes so// de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa bdag nyid bdag gi yon tan gyi sdug
238a3(mdo sde): pa brjod pa mdzad de/ de 'ang nan tan gyis sgrub po// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ sman pa mkhas pa zhig yod la sems can rnams kyang nad kyis nyen par 'gyur cing /
238a4(mdo sde): sa'i phyogs de na yang sman pa de cig pur zed de/ gnyis su med la/ de'i yon tan gyi che ba sus kyang / mi shes pa dang / de nas sman pa de 'di snyam du sems te/
238a5(mdo sde): kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni sdug bsngal ba nad kyis nyen pa/ sman la mi mkhas pa/ gnod pa la sten pa yin gyis bdag gis de dag gso bar bya'o snyam nas/
238a6(mdo sde): sman pa des sems can de dag gi mdun du kye sems can dag ni sman pa te/ nad la mkhas pa'o// nad kyi bzhi la mkhas pa'o// sman pa mkhas pa'o zhes bdag gi yon
238a7(mdo sde): tan gyi sngags pa bdag nyid kyis brjod pa dang / sems can de dag 'di ni sman pa'o zhes bya bar shes shing / yid ces par gyur nas sman pa de la rten to// de nas sman pa de/
238a8(mdo sde): sems can de dag gso zhing nad de zhi bar byed na/ rigs kyi bu de ci snyam du sems/ sman pa de bdag la stod par 'gyur ram/ gsol ba bcom ldan 'das
238b1(mdo sde): ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang ldan pa'i rgyal po'i chen po bla na med pa ste/ nyon mongs/
238b2(mdo sde): ba'i nad la mkhas pa/ nyon mongs pa'i nad kyi gzhi la mkhas pa/ nyon mongs pa'i nad gso ba la mkhas pa/ chos kyi sman chen po stobs pa yin yang / nyon
238b3(mdo sde): mongs pa'i nad kyis nad par gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyis mi shes te/ nyon mongs pa'i nad kyi nad par 'gyur ba'i sems can rnams gzigs nas/ de dag gi
238b4(mdo sde): mdun du bdag gi yon tan dang bsngags pa bdag nyid brjod de/ de nas nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis nad par gyur pa'i sems can drug gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
238b5(mdo sde): yon tan gyi bsngags pa che ba thos nas yid ches par gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la brten to// de nas de dag la de bzhin gshegs pas sman gyi rgyal po chen po chos
238b6(mdo sde): kyi sman de dag gis nyon mongs pa'i nad rab tu zhi bar mdzad de/ chos kyi sman chen po de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi sdug pa dang byams pa dang / rten cing 'brel
238b7(mdo sde): bar 'byung ba las stsogs te/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni don gyi dbang 'di gzigs nas/ bdag la bdag nyid stong pa mdzad do// rigs kyi bu chos
238b8(mdo sde): dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams smon lam thams cad gnas pa dang bral ba yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa lnga smon kyang / sbyin pa la/
239a1(mdo sde): mi gnas pa rnams yin/ de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang brtson 'grus dang / bsam tan dang / shes rab dang / khams sum//
239a2(mdo sde): pa dang / byang chub dang / lam dang / mya ngan 'das pa la smon kyang mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang //
239a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' ni gnas pa thams cad dang bral ba te/ mi gnas par 'jig rten thams cad du rnam par spyod do// nga rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/
239a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' smon lam thams cad la gnas pa dang bral ba rnams yin no// / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'
239a5(mdo sde): byams pa'i bdag nyid can rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyi tshe ba med pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ tha dad pa med pa'i byams pa
239a6(mdo sde): dang ldan pa rnams yin chos kyi byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin// nges par rtogs pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ gnod pa med pa'i byams pa dang
239a7(mdo sde): ldan pa rnams yin/ phan pa'i byams pa dang byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/
239a8(mdo sde): gnod sems med pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ phyogs bcu kun tu khyab pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i byam
239b1(mdo sde): pa dang ldan pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ dmas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i bdag nyid can rnams yin no// rigs/
239b2(mdo sde): kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sems can sdug bsngal ba dang /
239b3(mdo sde): skyabs med pa dang / mgon med pa dang / rten med pa dang / dpung gnyen med pa dag mthong na/ byang chub sems bskyed do// byang chub sems bskyed nas/
239b4(mdo sde): chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir 'bad rtsol brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ dka' bar spyod pa brgyad dag kyang byed do// de dag chos thob nas/ sems can rnams la
239b5(mdo sde): phan par byed de/ 'di lta ste// sems can ser sna can smin pa la gzhog par byed tshul khrims ngan pa can rnams tshul khrims la/ gnod sems can rnams
239b6(mdo sde): bzod pa la/ le lo can rnams brtson 'grus la/ sems 'khrug pa rnams bsam gtan la/ sems can shes rab 'chal ba rnams mthong nas shes rab
239b7(mdo sde): la gzhog par byed kyang / sems can la sdug bsngal mi zad pa rtsub pa tsha ba dag gis nyen cing / byang chub las phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro// rigs
239b8(mdo sde): kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams yin no// // rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/
240a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba la gnas pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag ni 'khor ba'i brtson ra rab tu 'bar//
240a2(mdo sde): ba nas/ byung ba'o zhes rab tu dga' bskyed do/ bdag gi 'khor ba'i dpyad tag yun ring po nas thogs pa chad do zhes dga' ba skyed do// bdag ni rnam par
240a3(mdo sde): rtog pa sna tshogs mang po'i chu srin gis dkrug pa'i 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las rgal to zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do// bdag gis yun ring po nas bsgreng ba'i
240a4(mdo sde): nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan bskal lo zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do// bdag gis nyon mongs pa'i ri rnams ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/ ci ltar rdul yang mi snang /
240a5(mdo sde): de ltar bcom mo zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do// bdag nyid ni dbugs phyin pa yin gyis da ni gzhan yang dbugs dbyung bar bya'o zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do//
240a6(mdo sde): bdag nyid ni 'jig rten gnas pa yun ring po nas gnyid log pa sred pa'i snyoms pas yongs su zin pa mig gi gti mug gis bsgribs pa'i nang na sad pa yin
240a7(mdo sde): gyis/ da ni gzhan yang rnam par sad par bya'o// zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do// bdag nyid ni ngan 'gro dang ngan song dang / log par ltung ba thams cad las rnam
240a8(mdo sde): par grol ba yin gyis/ da ni gzhan yang ngan song dang ngan 'gro dang log par ltung ba thams cad las rnam par grol bar bya'o zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do// bdag
240b1(mdo sde): 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon par yun ring po nas 'khyams te/ grogs med cing gnyis su med par gar yang ma 'khyams zhing / lam la mi mkhas la lam mi shes/
240b2(mdo sde): shing yul mi shes pas lam stor ba rnyed do zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do// bdag ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer dang nye bar gyur to zhes rab tu dga' ba skyedado// /
240b3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba la gnas pa rnams yin no// // rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub
240b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' btang snyoms la gnas pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnams la btang snyoms
240b5(mdo sde): su gnas pa rnams yin te/ mig gyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnams kyis smras par mi 'gyur/ gnod par mi 'gyur/ rma 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba
240b6(mdo sde): rnams dang / de bzhin du rna bas rnam par shes par bya ba'i sgra rnams dang / snas par ba shes par bya ba'i dri rnams dang / lces rnam par shes par bya ba'i ro rnam
240b7(mdo sde): dang / lus kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i reg bya rnams dang / yid kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i chos rnams la btang snyoms su gnas pa yin te/ yid kyis
240b8(mdo sde): rnam par shes par bya ba'i chos rnams kyis sbas par mi 'gyur/ gnod par mi 'gyur/ rma 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal gyi dang / sdug
241a1(mdo sde): #bsngal gyi sdug bsngal dang / 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal la btang snyoms su gnas pa rnams yin te/ 'du byed kyis sdug bsngal
241a2(mdo sde): dang sdug bsngal dang 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal gyis smras par mi 'gyur// gnod par mi 'gyur/ rma 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bya ba byas pa'i sems can rnam
241a3(mdo sde): la btang snyoms su gnas pa rnams yin te/ de dag la dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs pa bskyed cig de dag la 'di snyam du sems te/ gang bdag gi sgral bar
241a4(mdo sde): bya ba'i de nyid rgal bar gyur to zhes btang snyoms su gnas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' btang snyoms
241a5(mdo sde): dag la gnas pa rnams yin no// // / rigs kyi bu chos bcu po dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pas rnam par rol pa rnams yino//
241a6(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shi 'pho yang ston/ skye 'ang ston bcas pa dang / byas pa'i spyod pa dang / sras kyi ngan na rtse'ang ston/ mngon par byung ba'ang /
241a7(mdo sde): ston/ dka' ba spyod pa'ang ston/ byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba'ang ston/ bdud 'dul ba'ang ston/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'ang ston chos
241a8(mdo sde): kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'ang ston/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yang ston to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams
241b1(mdo sde): cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi pho brang dam pa nas 'chi//
241b2(mdo sde): 'pho ston pa nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i bar du ston pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu dga' ldan gyi
241b3(mdo sde): pho brang dam pa na/ sems can gang dag rtag par 'du shes pa yod pa de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten thams cad dang / khyad zhug pa/
241b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa/ 'jig rten kun kyi phul du byung ba mi nyam pa 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams kyis ma gos pa ma mchis pa shi 'bo
241b5(mdo sde): bar mthong na/ rtag par 'du shes ldog cing / mi rtag pa'i 'du shes 'byung te/ mi rtag pa'i 'du shes la gnas pas bag yod pa la gnas par 'gyur ro// rigs
241b6(mdo sde): kyi bu dga' ldan gi pho brang dam pa na/ sems can gang dag bag med par spyod pa yod pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' la dga' ba yod/ dad pa yod/ rangs pa yod
241b7(mdo sde): kyang yul la mngon par zhen pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i drung du mi 'dro mi rten bsnyen bkur mi byed cing / de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa'
241b8(mdo sde): yar bzhugs la bdag cag kyang 'khod de dus kyang ring du yod kyang ba 'dong bar bya'o// snyam du sems pa de dag gi bag med pa bzlog pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
242a1(mdo sde): @dpa' shi 'pho ston te/ de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' 'ang shi 'pho ba mthong nas skyob la gnas par 'gyur zhing de dag skyo bar
242a2(mdo sde): gyur nas/ bag med pa mi byed de/ bag yod pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag
242a3(mdo sde): skyobs 'dul ba yod pa de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' mi'i mngal na/ 'dug pa'i mthu mthong na ngo mtshar rmad du byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag ji nas kyang bra na
242a4(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du nges par 'gyur ba de ltar/ de ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal du 'dug bzhin chos ston to// rigs kyi bu sem
242a5(mdo sde): can gang dag byang chub sems dpa' btsas pa dang byas pa'i spyod pa dang / sras kyi nang na 'dug pas yongs su smin par bya ba yod pa de dag yongs su smin par bya ba
242a6(mdo sde): dang / dman pa la mos pa'i sems can rnams bsrung ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' btsas pa dang / byas pa'i spyod pa dang / sras kyi nang 'dug pa ston to// /
242a7(mdo sde): rigs kyi sems can gang dag byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung ba dang / rab tu byung bas yongs su smin par bya ba yod pa de dag yongs su smin par bya ba'i
242a8(mdo sde): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung ba ston cing rab tu 'byung ngo // rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma
242b1(mdo sde): yin las byams pa stong ba dman pa la mas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sa dka' ba'i spyod pas sangs sa sbyin par bya zang ba de dag yongs su rkun d+hAr b+h+yaH/
242b2(mdo sde): dang / mu stegs pa can gzhan tshar gcad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba spyod pa ston to// rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag gis yun ring po nas
242b3(mdo sde): bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba'i tshe/ mchod pa'i las la brtson par bya'o zhes smon lam btab pa yod pa de dag la
242b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba ston la/ de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba la so sor tshul bzhin du mchod pa byed de/ de dag gis
242b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa byas pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag pa
242b6(mdo sde): rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pas rlom pa yod de/ de dag de las zlog pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug cing 'dud 'dul ba
242b7(mdo sde): ston to// sems can gang zhi ba la gnas pa de dag de las gong du khyad par thob par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ston/
242b8(mdo sde): to// gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe/ stong du gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sgra sna tshogs dang /
243a1(mdo sde): co lnga tshogs gang yod pa de dag thams cad med cing / stong gsum kyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang zhi bar 'gyur te/ de dag gis
243a2(mdo sde): mthu de mthong na bdag cag kyang de ltar byang chub kyi snying po la khod de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o// zhes 'a
243a3(mdo sde): smon lam 'debs so// rigs kyi bu sems can gang ston par bkur ba dang / ston par khas che la de dag gis 'byung ba dang / phyi ma'i chos mngon par rdzogs
243a4(mdo sde): par sangs rgyas pa yod pa de dag tshar gcad pa dang / sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin cing / snod du gyur pa rnams la lam bstan pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
243a5(mdo sde): dpa' byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa/ ka shi ka'i grong rdal du song nas lan gsum du bzlas te/ rnam pa bcu gnyis pa'i chos kyi 'khor mo rab tu
243a6(mdo sde): bskor ro// rigs kyi bu sems can gang yongs su mya ngan 'das pas 'dul ba yod pa de dag 'dul ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mya ngan 'das pa
243a7(mdo sde): ston te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni rgyu 'di ni rkyen te/ des byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi pho brang dam pa nas 'chi 'pho ston cing / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa
243a8(mdo sde): chen po'i bar du ston to// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub seMs dpa' mngon par shes pas rnam par rol pa rnams yin no//
243b1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' mi khoms pa brgyad rnams par spangs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi dge ba'i chos
243b2(mdo sde): las phyir logs pa rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa bcas pa las mi 'da' ba rnams yin/ ser sna dang bral ba rnams yin/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya
243b3(mdo sde): ba byas pa rnams yin bsod nams bya ba la brtson pa rnams yin// shes rab phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ thabs la mkhas pa rnams yin/ smon lam phun sum
243b4(mdo sde): tshogs pa yin/ skyo ba mang ba rnams yin/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni/ mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du
243b5(mdo sde): bya ba gang gis sems can dmyal ba dag tu skyes nas kyang / tshor ba mi bzad pa brtsub pa che ba/ yid du mi 'ong ba myong bar 'gyur ba 'am/ yun ring por gnas par
243b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ba 'am/ sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag la gnod pa'i sems bskyed par 'gyur ba de lta bur mi 'gyur gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni rang bzhin gyis
243b7(mdo sde): dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa yin te/ de ltar na de ni sems can dmyal bar skye bar mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni/ de bzhin gshegs
243b8(mdo sde): pas bslab pa bcas pa las 'da' ba gang gis dud 'gro'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ba 'am/ de dag du skyes nas kyang dud 'gro'i sdug bsngal mi zad pa myong bar 'gyur ba
244a1(mdo sde): med do// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni gang ser snar 'gyur ba'i rgyu de dang / rkyen de dang / gzhi des yi dgas kyi nang du skye zhing
244a2(mdo sde): de dag du skyes nas kyang yi dgas kyi sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa myong bar 'gyur ba med do// byang chub sems dpa' ni gang du skyes pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen
244a3(mdo sde): dang / 'grogs pa thob pa'i rkyen dang bral bar 'gyur ba'o log par lta ba'i rigs su mi skye'o/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sngon spyod pa ste/
244a4(mdo sde): sngon gi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa yin pas/ de dag yang dag par lta ba'i rigs skye ba yin te/ de dag tu skyes nas kyang rkyen phun sum tshogs par 'gyur zhing rkyen de
244a5(mdo sde): bas kyang de 'phel ba dang / rgyas pa dang yang bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' ni dbang po ma tshang ba'i rnam pa gang gis sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du
244a6(mdo sde): mi rung bar 'gyur bar/ dbang po dang mi ldan par 'gyur ba ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni bsod nams bya ba la brtson zhing bsod nams kyis btan pa yin te/
244a7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten nas/ chos sam dge 'dun la bya ba gang byas shing / bsnyen pa dang bsten pa dang / bsgoms pa dang mang du byas pas dbang po phun
244a8(mdo sde): sum tshogs par 'gyur ba'i bya ba de dang de dag byed cing / dbang po phun sum tshogs pas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi smad du 'gyur ba yin no// byang
244b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams ni mtha' khrob kyi yul gang na sems can blun pa rmongs pa lug ltar lkug pa'i ngang tshul can/ skal pa med pa legs par bshad
244b2(mdo sde): pa dang / nyes par spyad pa'i don shes par bya'i mthu med pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du ma gyur pa/ mar mi 'dzin par par mi 'dzin pa/ dge
244b3(mdo sde): sbyong du mi 'dzin pa dang / bram zer mi 'dzin pa dag gi nang du mi skye'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dbyings kyi yul gang na sems can de dag dbang
244b4(mdo sde): po rno ba/ dbang po gsal ba mkhas pa mkhas par bkur ba/ skal pa yod pa legs pa yod pa legs par bshad pa dang / nyes par bshad pa'i don
244b5(mdo sde): yongs su shes par bya ba'i mthu yod cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du gyur pa/ phar 'dzin pa/ mar 'dzin pa/ dge sbyong du 'dzin pa/ bram
244b6(mdo sde): zer 'dzin pa/ dag gi nang du skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni sngon gyi shes rab dang / ye shes kyi stobs kyi mthu dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems
244b7(mdo sde): dpa' rnams gang gnas pas sangs rgyas skyes pa du ma 'bras bu med par 'gyur ba dang / sems can gyi don 'grib par 'gyur ba lha tshe rings po'i nang du mi skye
244b8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ 'dod pa'i khams nyid du gang na sems can gdul bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas skyes par mnyes par byar yod par skyes so//
245a1(mdo sde): @#de ci'i phyir zhe na/ den thabs la mkhas pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gang na sangs rgyas mi bzhugs pa dang / chos mi thos
245a2(mdo sde): pa dang / dge 'dun brnyen bkur byar med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa dag du mi skye'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ dkon mchog gsum phun sum chog
245a3(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag du skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni sngon gi smon lam phun sum tshogs pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gnas de lta bu dag
245a4(mdo sde): thos nas kyang skyo ba mi mang ba dang dmu rgod kyi ngang tshul can ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gnas pa 'di lta bu dag thos ma thag tu skyo bar 'gyur te/
245a5(mdo sde): skyo bar gyur nas mi dge ba'i chos 'di dag spangs pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang
245a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' mi khom pa brgyad rnam par spangs pa rnams yin no// // rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems ma rtor ba rnam
245a7(mdo sde): yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ g.yo dang sgyu med pa drang zhing gya rgyu med sems drang ba rnams yin// sangs rgyas kyi rnams dang / de 'dzin pa'i gang zag
245a8(mdo sde): rnams la/ yid gnyis dang nem nur dang the tsom med pa rnams yin/ chos la slob dpon gi dpe mkhyud dang bral ba rnams yin gyis ser sna dang bral ba yin/ chos kyis
245b1(mdo sde): 'phongs par 'gyur ba'i las kyi mtha' dang bral ba rnams yin no// ci skad du smras pa de ltar bur byed de/ mi slu ba rnams yin/ theg pa chen po yongs su 'dzin
245b2(mdo sde): ba rnams yin/ de yongs su 'dzin pa'i gang zag rnams la chos mtshungs pa'i dus shes kyis zhes dang bcas/ ri mo bcas pa rnams yin/ theg pa chen po la gzhol ba/
245b3(mdo sde): theg pa chen po la 'bab/ theg pa chen po la bab pa rnams yin/ chos smras pa'i gang zag rnams la ston par 'du shes pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes skyed
245b4(mdo sde): pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems ma stor pa rnams yin no// // rigs kyi bu chos bcu
245b5(mdo sde): dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshe rabs dran pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa rnams yin/ dam
245b6(mdo sde): pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa rnams yin/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pa rnams yin/ 'gyod pa med pa rnams yin/ sgrib pa med pa rnams yin/ dga' ba mang ba
245b7(mdo sde): rnams yin/ sgom pa mang po rnams yin/ sems mnyam par bzhag pa rnams yin/ rdzu sa ste skye ba rnams yin/ rnam par shes pa ma rmongs pa yin te/ rigs
245b8(mdo sde): kyi bu sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ dam pa'i chos la rim 'gro yod cing bkur sti yod pa yin/ dam pa'i chos yongasu
246a1(mdo sde): 'dzin pa'i gang zag rnams la rim 'gro yod cing bkur sti yod pa yin te/ de rgyu de dang rkyen de dang gzhi des lus dang srog la mi lta bar dam pa'i//
246a2(mdo sde): chos yongs su 'dzin cing 'chang ngo // klog go kun chub par byed do// gzhan la yang rgya cher ston te/ de dam pa'i yongs su 'dzin pa la brtson pas/ 'di lta ste/
246a3(mdo sde): lus dang ngag dang sems kyi tshul khrims rnam pa gsum gyis/ tshul khrims rnam par dag pa yin tshul khrims yongs su dag pas 'gyod pa med pa yin te/ de yang
246a4(mdo sde): rim 'gro med pa ma yin gyi/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ 'gyod pa med pas sgrib pa med pa yin/ sgrib pa med pas dga' ba mang ba yin//
246a5(mdo sde): dga' ba mang bas sgom pa mang ba yin/ sgom pa mang bas sems mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro/ sems mnyam par bzhag pas 'gro ba yongs su dag par
246a6(mdo sde): 'gyur/ 'gro ba yongs su dag pas rdzus te skye bar 'gyur/ rdzus te skyes pas/ rnam par shes pa rmongs pa yin no// rnam par shes pa ma rmongs pa'i phyir/
246a7(mdo sde): tshe rabs dran pa yin te/ de tshe rabs cig kyang rjes dran no// gnyis dang gsum dang / bzhi dang lnga dang bcu dang nyi shu dang sum bcu dang / bzhi bcu dang lnga bcu dang nas
246a8(mdo sde): tshe rabs rgya stong du ma'i bar du rjes su dran no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshe rabs dran pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu
246b1(mdo sde): chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ma bral ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / thos
246b2(mdo sde): ba dang / dran pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ chos nyan pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ dge 'dun mchod cing bsnyen bskur ba dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ sangs rgyas dang
246b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gus par smras pa dang / phyag bya ba dang ldang ba dang / thal mo sbyar ba dang gus pa'i las dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ mang du thos pa'i
246b4(mdo sde): gang brag chos pa dag dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ pha rol tu phyin pa mnyan pa dang ma dral ba rnams yin/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos mnyan pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin/
246b5(mdo sde): rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum mnyan pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi mnyan pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mnyan pa
246b6(mdo sde): dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ma bral ba rnams yin no// // rigs
246b7(mdo sde): kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spangs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims nyams pa'i
246b8(mdo sde): gang zag rnam par spangs pas sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spangs par bya'o// lta ba nyams pa'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang / cho ga nyams pa'i gang zag rnam par
247a1(mdo sde): @grangs pa dang / 'tsho ba thams pa'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang / 'du 'jil dka' ba'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang /
247a2(mdo sde): le lo can gi gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang / 'khor ba la dga' ba'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang / byang chub la brgyab kyis phyogs pa'i gang zag rnam par sgrungs
247a3(mdo sde): pa dang / khyim pa dang / sten pa rnam par spangs pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par spangs pa nas/ sdig pa grogs po rnam par rigs par bya'o// rigs kyi
247a4(mdo sde): bu byang chub sems dpa' des gnas 'di dag rnam par spongs pa'i tshe/ gang zag de dag la zhe sdang ba'i sems bskyed par mi bya/ khong khro ba'i sems dang
247a5(mdo sde): brnyas pa'i sems bskyed pa'i mi bya'i/ des 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyang sems can rnams ni khams so sor sten te/ sten par gyur nas chud za bar 'gyur ro/
247a6(mdo sde): zhes bka' stsal gyis/ de bas na bdag gis sten pa yongs su spangs par bya'o snyam du sems nye bar bzhag par bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan
247a7(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spangs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshes
247a8(mdo sde): pa'i sku'i chos nyid thob par 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus mnyam pa rnams yin/ lus yongs su dag pa rnams yin/ lus ma rmed pa rnams yin/
247b1(mdo sde): lus legs par grub pa rnams yin/ chos kyi lus rnams yin/ lus brtag par bya ba ma yin zhing gting dpag dka' ba rnams yin/ lus bsam gyis mi khyag
247b2(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/ lus zhi ba rnams yin/ ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs
247b3(mdo sde): pa'i sku'i chos nyid thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol ba bcom ldan 'das gang dang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems
247b4(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos nyid 'di thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sa dang po la byang chub sems
247b5(mdo sde): dpa' lus mnyam pa nyid thob po/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus kyi mi mnyam pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du gyur
247b6(mdo sde): pa'i phyir ro// sa gnyis pa la byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i phyir lus yongs su dag pa thob po// sa gsum pa la byang chub sems dpa'
247b7(mdo sde): khro ba dang / gnod sems thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir lus rma med pa thob po// sa bzhi pa la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su grub pa'i phyir/
247b8(mdo sde): lus legs par grub pa thob po/ sa lnga pa la byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir/ chos kyi lus thob bo// sa drug pa la rtag par bya
248a1(mdo sde): ba ma yin zhing gting dpag dka' ba'i chos yongs su grub pa'i phyir/ lus brtag par bya ba ma zhing gting dpag dka' ba'o// sa 'du
248a2(mdo sde): pa la sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su grub pa dang / thabs mkhas pa yang dag par grub pa'i phyir/ lus bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob bo// sa brgyad pa la spros pa thams
248a3(mdo sde): cad dang bral ba dang nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir/ lus zhi ba thob bo// sa dgu pa la lus tshad med pas khyab pa'i phyir/ lus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa ma thob po// /
248a4(mdo sde): sa bcu po la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi lus 'thob po// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes bya thams cad yang dag par 'grub pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems
248a5(mdo sde): dpa' sgrib kwi pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos nyid dang / byang chub sems depa'i
248a6(mdo sde): lus kyi chos nyid la tha dad du bgyi ba ma mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu lus tha mi dad du bya ba med de/ yon tan dang mthus
248a7(mdo sde): ni tha dad du bya ba yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar lus tha mi dad pas tha dad du bgyi
248a8(mdo sde): bam mchis la/ yon tan dang mthus pa dang du bgyi ba mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu lus lus shes bya ba 'di
248b1(mdo sde): ni tha dad pa med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus brjod pa'i mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro// yon tan dang mthu'i mtshan nyid ni tha dad par lta'o// byang chub sem/
248b2(mdo sde): dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar gang lta bur yon tan dang mthu'i mtshan nyid tha dad du lta bar bgyid/ bcom ldan
248b3(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bas na don nyid khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir khyod la dper bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ byi dor byas pa'i
248b4(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che dang / byi dor ma byas pa'i nor bu rin po che ni 'di lta ste/ nor bu rin po che nor bu rin po che zhes bya ba'i nor bu rin po che'i grangs su 'gro mod kyi/ ci ltar
248b5(mdo sde): byi dor byas pa'i nor bu rin po che mthu dang yid du 'ong bas khyab par byed pa ltar ni byi dor ma byas ma yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i lus nor bu rin po che yang
248b6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che dang bcas su de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos nyid kyi grangs su 'gro mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus nor bu rin po che
248b7(mdo sde): ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che'i drung du yongs su dag pa zhes mi brjod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che ni sems can
248b8(mdo sde): gyi khams tshad med pa dang / nam mkha'i khams tshad med pa 'od kyis khyab par byas te gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni shin tu yongs su dag pa dang dri ma thams
249a1(mdo sde): @cang dang bral ba'i phyir te/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus nor bu rin po che ning tsam du khyab par byed pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni de ltar/
249a2(mdo sde): dri ma'i lhag ma las pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ tshes gnyis kyi zla ba'i grangs su 'gro ba nas zla ba nye ba'i bar gyi zla ba dang zla ba zhes bya ba'i grangs
249a3(mdo sde): su 'gro mod kyi/ tshes gnyis kyi zla ba ci 'dra ba de lta bur zla ba nya la ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni de ltar chos nyid thob pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang
249a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i lus dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur bcas te/ lus kyi grangs su 'gro mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i drung na
249a5(mdo sde): lam mer mi 'gyur/ lhan ner mi 'gyur/ lhang nger mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ zla ba nya'i drung na tshes gnyis kyi zla ba ci ltar ba de bzhin du/
249a6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyang lus su brjod pa'i mtshan nyid kyis mtshan nyid gcig mod kyi/ yon tan dang mthu'i mtshan nyid
249a7(mdo sde): kyis ni ma yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' lus rdo rje ltar bsra ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags dang /
249a8(mdo sde): zhe sdang dang / gti mug dag gis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ khro ba dang gnod sems kyi tha ba dang dri ma dang / nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa dang / lta ba phyin
249b1(mdo sde): ci log dag gis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ 'jig rten gyi chos rgyang po de dag gis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad kyis mi tshugs
249b2(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/ sems can gyi sdug bsngal dag gis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ skye ba dang rga ba dang / 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal dag gis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ mu ste
249b3(mdo sde): can dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ bdud thams cad dang / bdud kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/
249b4(mdo sde): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi na mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ 'dod pa la spyod pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang
249b5(mdo sde): ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' lus rdo rje ltar sra ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po rnams yin no// bcu
249b6(mdo sde): gang zhe na 'di lta ste bkur ba rnams yin/ mchod par 'os pa rnams yin/ byin par byed pa rnams yin/ brten par bya ba rnams yin// nye bar 'tsho bar byed
249b7(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/ brgyags shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ tshogs shin tu bsags pa rnams yin/ mi ngo mang pa rnams yin/ thog mar 'gro ba rnams
249b8(mdo sde): yin/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer na chen por phyin par bya ba la mkhas pa rnams yin no// / rigs kyi bu de la ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bkur
250a1(mdo sde): pa yin pa nas ci ltar na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por phyin par byas pa la mkhas pa'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu
250a2(mdo sde): 'di lta ste dper na/ ded dpon chen po ni rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i blon po chen po dag gis bkur ba yin/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen glang sangs
250a3(mdo sde): rgyas rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams kyis bkur pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ ded dpon chen po ni bram ze'i dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong
250a4(mdo sde): dang / yul gyi mi rnams kyis mchod par 'os pa rnams yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang slob pa dang mi slob pa dang / gzhan yang /
250a5(mdo sde): lha dang / klu dang gnod sprin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dag gis mchod par 'os pa yin no// rig
250a6(mdo sde): kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ ded dpon chen po ni 'brog dgon par 'dron po mang po 'chan pas gtses pa legs par bde zhing yongs su ma skyo bar phyin par byed
250a7(mdo sde): ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ ded dpon chen po la brten nas sdug bsngal ba dang / phongs pa dag 'brog dgon pa nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
250a8(mdo sde): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po la brten nas/ gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa can dang kun tu rgyu dang gcer bu pa rnams 'brog dgon pa
250b1(mdo sde): chen po nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ ded dpon pa chen po ni/ rgyal po dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tshe ba dang / de ma yin pa'i
250b2(mdo sde): sems can gzhan rnams nye bar 'tsho ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang 'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can rnams
250b3(mdo sde): nye bar 'tsho ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ ded dpon chen po ni nam phyogs su 'gro bar chas te/ 'dron po mang po dang lhan gcig du grong khyer chen
250b4(mdo sde): por phyin par bya ba'i phyir/ 'brog dgon par zhugs pa de'i tshe/ grong khyer chen po byin gyi bar du brgyags phun sum tshogs pas/ 'brog dgon pa de nas legs
250b5(mdo sde): par bde zhing yongs su skyo ba med par 'byung bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang / nam sangs rgyas kyis brten pa'i phyogs su
250b6(mdo sde): 'gro bar 'dod cing / sems can 'gran po mang po de'i 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa chen por 'jug par 'dod la/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen
250b7(mdo sde): por phyin par 'dod pa de'i tshe/ bsod nams kyi rgyags kyi tshogs shin tu phun sum tshogs pas 'gro'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ ded dpon chen po
250b8(mdo sde): 'tsho ba'i yo byad 'di lta ste/ gser dang nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bye du r+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru las stsogs pa mang po bstsogs shing phyogs su
251a1(mdo sde): 'gro'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang nam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por mngon par zhugs pa
251a2(mdo sde): de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshogs shin tu bsags shing 'gro'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ ded dpon chen po ni nor ba stsogs pas/ chog mi shes pa
251a3(mdo sde): yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang chos kyi nor stsogs pas chog mi shes pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ ded dpon chen
251a4(mdo sde): po ni 'di lta ste/ nor bu phun sum tshogs pa dang / gtso bo dang / dbang yod pa dang / ngag mnyan pas 'dron pa mang po thams cad kyi thogs mar 'gro ba yin no//
251a5(mdo sde): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang 'di lta ste/ yon tan phun sum tshogs dang / yongs kyi gtso bo dang / chos la dbang ba dang / ma log
251a6(mdo sde): par smras pas/ sems can 'dron pa mang po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi thog mar 'gro ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ ded dpon chen po ni grong khyer che/
251a7(mdo sde): por phyin par bya ba la mkhas pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon po yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por phyin par byas pa la
251a8(mdo sde): mkhas pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bkur ba yin pa nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por phyin par bya ba la mkhas pa
251b1(mdo sde): bya ba'i bar du yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/
251b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' lam la mkhas pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lam mnyam pa yang rab tu shes/ lam nyam nga bar yang rab tu shes
251b3(mdo sde): lam bde ba yang rab tu shes/ 'tsham pa'i lam yang rab tu shes/ lam chu che ba dang chu med pa yang rab tu shes/ lam gyi dgongs lam dag kyang rab tu shes//
251b4(mdo sde): kham gyis tsugs pa dag kyang rab tu shes/ lam 'khyugs pa dag kyang rab tu shes/ lam drang po dag kyang rab tu shes/ lam 'byung ba yang rab tu shes so//
251b5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' lam la mkhas pa rnams yin no// / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'
251b6(mdo sde): lam la log par ston pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ theg pa chen pos 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i lam
251b7(mdo sde): la ston gyi/ nyan thos kyi lam mi ston to// nyan thos kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ nyan thos kyi lam ston gyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam mi ston
251b8(mdo sde): to// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ston gyi/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mi ston to// rang sa
252a1(mdo sde): rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la rang sangs rgyas kyi lam ston gyi/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam mi ston to// bdag tu 'dzi/
252a2(mdo sde): pa la mngon par zhen pa'i sems can rnams yin no// chos su 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa rnams la/ bdag med pa'i lam dang stong pa nyid kyi lam ston gyi/
252a3(mdo sde): bdag dang sems can dang srog dang gso ba dang / skyes bu dang gang zag gi lam mi ston to// mtha' gnyis la gnas pa'i sems can rnamasal mtha' gnyis dad
252a4(mdo sde): bral ba'i lam ston gyi/ mtha' gnyis la gnas pa mi ston to// sems g.yengs pa'i sems can rnams la zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gyi lam ston gyi/ g.yengs
252a5(mdo sde): ba'i lam mi ston to// spros pa la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can rnams la de bzhin nyid kyi lam ston gyi/ byis pa spros pa la mngon par dga' ba'i lam mi ston to// /
252a6(mdo sde): 'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can rnams la mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam ston gyi/ 'khor ba'i lam mi ston to// lam gol bar zhugs pa'i sems can/
252a7(mdo sde): rnams la lam srol ma 'dod pa ma yin pa dang / tshor ba med pa'i lam ston gyi/ nyon mongs pa'i tsher mas gang ba'i lam mi ston to// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag
252a8(mdo sde): dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' lam ma log par ston pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu rgyun mi
252b1(mdo sde): 'chang bar sems mnyam bla zhag pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ lus na 'di lta ste/ lus la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas so// tshor ba rnams dang /
252b2(mdo sde): sems dang / chos rnams dang / lus rnams dang / dgon pa rnams dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang rgyal
252b3(mdo sde): po'i pho brang 'khor rnams dang / rnyed pa dang bkur bsti dang / grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa bslab pa
252b4(mdo sde): bcas pa rnams dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang yongs su nyon mongs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad la dran pa nye bar bzhag cing gnas so//
252b5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de la ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lus la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang
252b6(mdo sde): lus dang ldan pa'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag yang dag pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du/ shing yongs su spong ngo // de'i 'og gi rkang pa'i mthil nas btsams te/
252b7(mdo sde): yang na glang ba'i bar du lus kyi nyes pa la rtog go// lus la bdag med par yang dag par rtog go// lus mi brtan pa dang / 'jig pa dang chu rgyus kyis glags
252b8(mdo sde): pa dang / dri mi zhim pa dang dri nga ba dang / kha dog mi sdug par rtog te/ de de ltar rtog pa'i tshe/ gang lus pa la lus su 'dod pa dang / lus la 'dod chags pa
253a1(mdo sde): dang / lus la dga' ba dang / lus la bdag gir 'dzin pa dang / lus la zhen pa de dag mi 'byung ste/ rgyu dang rkyen de dang gzhi des lus dang /
253a2(mdo sde): ldan pa'i chos rnams kyi dbang du 'gro bar mi 'gyur gyi/ gzhan du na lus dang ldan pa'i chos rnams de nyid kyi dbang du 'gyur te/ de ltar na lus la dran pa shin tu
253a3(mdo sde): nye bar bzhag cing gnas pa'o// ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshor ba rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i
253a4(mdo sde): 'di snyam du sems te/ tsher ba gang ci snyed pa de dag thams cad ni sdug bsngal na/ byis pa phyin ci log gis phyin ci log du 'gyur ba rnams ni bde bar 'dzin te/
253a5(mdo sde): byis pa rmongs pa rnams sdug bsngal la bde ba zhes bya bar 'dzin gi/ 'phags pa rnams kyis ni thams cad sdug bsngal bar thugs su chud nas de spang ba'i
253a6(mdo sde): phyir/ nan tan mdzad la/ sems can gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de nyid la dgod kyis/ bdag gis kyang de dag gi rjes su bslab par bya'o snyam te/ de de ltar
253a7(mdo sde): rtogs pas tshor ba rnams la dran la shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas so// de tshor ba dag la chags pa 'ang med/ khong khro ba'ang med cing / de de dag spangs sha
253a8(mdo sde): pa'i phyir rab tu zhugs pa yin no// gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de nyid la 'god do// de ltar na tshor ba rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas so//
253b1(mdo sde): ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems la dran pa shin tu che bar bzhag cing gnas zhe na/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can 'di ni mi rtag pa la rtag par mngon par/
253b2(mdo sde): dga' ba'o// sdug bsngal la bde bar mngon par dga' ba'o// bdag med pa la bdag du mngon par dga' ba'o// mi gtsang ba la gtsang bar mngon par dga' ba'o//
253b3(mdo sde): g.yo zhing mi brtan pa la myur du 'gyur ba'o// nyon mongs pa rnams kyi rtsa ba'o// ngan song rnams kyi sgo'o// nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyi bzhi'o// bde 'gro
253b4(mdo sde): rnams chung bzon pa'o// 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug rnams kyi rkyen du gyur pa'o// chos thams cad kyi bdag por gyur pa'o// chos thams cad ni thog
253b5(mdo sde): mar 'gro ste/ sems yongs su shes na/ chos thams cad kyang yongs su shes par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang 'jig rten sems kyis bris pa ste/ sems ni sems
253b6(mdo sde): kyis mi mthong ngo // dge ba 'am yang na mi bla'i las ni sems kyis bstsags pa'o// sems ni mgal me bskor ltar 'khor/ sems ni rta ltar rnam par 'khyam/
253b7(mdo sde): sems ni nags kyi me ltar tshig/ sems ni chu chen bzhin du bskyed/ de de ltar rtogs pas sems la pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas te/ sems dbang du mi
253b8(mdo sde): 'gro'i/ sems nyid de'i dbang du 'gro ste/ sems de'i dbang du gyur pas chos thams cad dbang du gyur pa yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems/
254a1(mdo sde): @#la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas so// ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing /
254a2(mdo sde): gnas zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang gti mug la stsogs pa dang / de dag la gnas pa gzhan dag la 'di dag ni mi
254a3(mdo sde): dge ba'i chos rnams so zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ de 'dod chags kyi gnyen po la ste na/ zhe sdang dang gti mug gi gnyen po la sten cing / de dag
254a4(mdo sde): bang pa'i phyir/ brtson pa yin no// chos 'di dag ni dge ba'i zhes bya bar shes nas/ chos dag la gtong zhing dran pa nye bar gzhog te/ chos de dag kyang yang
254a5(mdo sde): dag par blangs shing gnaso// gzhan yang bslab pa de nyid la 'god de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos rnams la dran shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas so//
254a6(mdo sde): ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yul rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' yid du 'ong ba dang / yid du mi
254a7(mdo sde): 'ong ba'i gzugs dang / sgra dang dri dang ro dang / reg la chags par yang mi 'gyur/ khong khro ba'i sems kyang mi skyed de/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ de ltar bdag
254a8(mdo sde): dngos po med pa'i chos rnams la chags pa skyed pa ni bdag gi mi cha ste/ de na bdag byis pa rmongs pa dang / mi gsal ba dang / mi mkhas par 'gyur ro// bcom
254b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis kyang chags par 'gyur nas zhen par 'gyur ro// zhen nas rmongs par 'gyur ro// rmongs nas dge ba 'am mi dge ba'i chos rnam par sgom pa'i mi
254b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// de'i rgyus ngan song du 'gro ba'i gsungaso// zhes de snyam du de ltar bdag chos gsog rnams la khong khro ba'i sems skyed pa ni bdag gi mi cha ste/ de ni bdag
254b3(mdo sde): bzod pa dang / dang du mi len pa dang / khong khro ba kun nas ldang bar 'gyur te/ 'phags pa rnams kyis mi smad par 'gyur/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis ni
254b4(mdo sde): dbye bar 'gyur ro zhes/ de de ltar rtog pas yul rnams la shin tu nye bar bzheg cing gnas te/ yul rnams kyis mi smras shing rma 'byung bar mi 'gyur la/ gzhan yang
254b5(mdo sde): bslab pa bcas pa de nyid la dgod do/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' yul rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas so// ci ltar na byang chub sems dgon pa rnams
254b6(mdo sde): la/ dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas zhe na/ de 'di snyam du dgon pa zhes bya ba 'di ni nyon mongs pa med par rnam par spyod pa rnams kyi gnas so// zhi bar rnam par
254b7(mdo sde): spyod pa rnams kyi gnas so// dgon pa na ni lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za gzhan gyi sems mngon par shes pa dag kyang yod de/ de dag bdag gi sems la/
254b8(mdo sde): dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams rab tu shes na/ bdag tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed cing sems pa de ni bdag gi mi che'o snyam te/ de tshul bzhin ma
255a1(mdo sde): yin pa'i yid la byas pa thams cad dang bral nas/ tshul bzhin du chos rnams la sems gtong zhing chos de dag la sgom pa mang ba yin te//
255a2(mdo sde): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhags cing gnas so// ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' grong dang grong rdal dang ljongs dang
255a3(mdo sde): yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' grong dang grong khyer dang ljongs dang /
255a4(mdo sde): yul 'khor dang rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag na byang chub sems dpa'i spyod na/ gnas gang tshul dang mi 'dri zhing yongs su spang bar bya ba rab tu byung ba'i tshul dang mi mthun
255a5(mdo sde): pa de dag yongs su spong ngo // de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chang ma'i khyim 'am/ smad tshong ma'i khyim 'am/ rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/ rgyal po'i gnas
255a6(mdo sde): sam/ ra ro ba'i 'khor gyi tshogs sam/ gar mkhan dang glu gang gi gnas dang / de ma yin pa gzhan yang rung ste/ rab tu byung ba'i tshul dang / mi 'dra ba de/
255a7(mdo sde): dag yongs su spang zhing / de dag la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' grong dang grong khyer dang grong rdal dang / ljongs dang /
255a8(mdo sde): yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ba dag la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas so// ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang
255b1(mdo sde): grags pa dang / skra dang tshigs su bcad pa dag la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas she na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa byed pa rnams kyi bsod
255b2(mdo sde): nams kyi dngos po nye bar bzung zhing / rnyed pa dang bkur sti la sems gtong ste/ ci nas zhen par 'gyur/ sreg par mi skye chags pa mi skye ba/ bdag gir mi
255b3(mdo sde): byed/ nor du mi 'dzin bdag gir mi 'dzin pa dang / ci nas kyang sems can thams cad dang / 'thun mong du byas shing / sdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnams
255b4(mdo sde): la phan par gyur pa de ltar gdong ste/ gal te yang rgyu de dang rkyen de dang / gzhi des grags pa dang / sgra dang tshigs su bcad pa gang yin zhig byung yang des khengs
255b5(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur/ nga rgyal mi skye/ rgyags pa mi skye ste/ de 'di snyam du sems so// ring por mi thogs par grags pa dang / sgra dang tshigs su bcad pa 'di gang
255b6(mdo sde): las byung ba dang / gang gis byung ba dang / grags pa dang sgra dang tshigs su bcad pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad med par 'gyur na/ de la mkhas pa'i rang
255b7(mdo sde): bzhin can su zhig mi rtag cing gnas pa'i chos brtan pa 'am/ yid rten du mi rung ba dag la dag pa'i sems dpa' 'am/ khengs par 'gyur ba 'am/
255b8(mdo sde): nga rgyal dang / rgyags pas dregs par 'gyur ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnyed pa dang / bkur sti grags pa dang / skra dang tshigs su bcad pa rnam/
256a1(mdo sde): la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas so// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa bcas pa la dran pa shin
256a2(mdo sde): tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang / bslab pa 'di
256a3(mdo sde): nyid bslabs te/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// gang ma byon pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang bslab pa 'di nyid
256a4(mdo sde): la bslabs shin tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ro// gang da ltar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang /
256a5(mdo sde): bslab pa 'di nyid la bslabs ste/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o// zhes de de ltar yid ches pas bslabs pa rnams la nan
256a6(mdo sde): tan du byed pa yin te/ brtson par byed pa dang / legs par bya ba byed cing shin tu rdzogs par byed pa yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gsheg
256a7(mdo sde): pas bslab bcas pa la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas so// rigs kyi bu ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nye bar nyon mongs pa dang / yongs su nyon mong
256a8(mdo sde): ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams la dran pa
256b1(mdo sde): dang ldan pa yin/ yongs su nyon mongs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa rnams la dran pa dang / ldan pa yin te/ de dag gang las byung ba dang / rkyen gang gis byung ba'i
256b2(mdo sde): zhig yang rab tu shes te/ des de ltar shes nas 'byung ba de dag yongs su spong ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / kun nas
256b3(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa thams cad la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu rgyun mi chad
256b4(mdo sde): bar sems mnyam gzhag pa rnams yin no// // rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' phyag dar khrod pa rnams yin no// bcu
256b5(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag par blangs pa la brtan pa rnams yin/ sems dma' ba rnams yin/ yongs su skyo ba rnams yin/ nyes pas lta ba dang bral
256b6(mdo sde): rnams yin/ yon tan du lta ba rnams yin/ bdag la mi stong pa rnams yin/ gzhan la mi spang ba rnams yin/ tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/
256b7(mdo sde): lha 'du ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par blangs pa la brtan pa yin pa nas ci ltar na lha 'du ba'i bar du yin zhe na/
256b8(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dad cing bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dad cing / yid ches pa rnams yin/
257a1(mdo sde): de srog gis phyir yang dag par blangs pa mi 'jig cing / yang dag par blangs pa las mi 'gyur te/ de yang dag par blangs pa la brtan pa/
257a2(mdo sde): bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang sems dpa' zhing nga rgyal med pa'i yin/ de nga rgyal med cing sems dma' bas/ phyag dar khrod pa ngan ngon yongs su bor ba/ skye bo
257a3(mdo sde): thams cad dang mi 'thun pa sdud do// de dag bsdug nas 'khru bar byed do// de 'khru ba dang / glan pa dang bcom pa dang / btso bor byed btso ba med byed pa kun nas nyon
257a4(mdo sde): mongs pa med cing yongs su mi skyo ste/ yongs su mi skyo ba rkyen du byas nas ci tsam gyis don grub par 'gyur ba ma gtogs par de la zhen par yang mi 'gyur ro//
257a5(mdo sde): kye ma'o phyag dar khrod pa 'di dag ni sbom pa'o// kye ma'o phyag dar khrod pa 'di dag ni shig mang ba ste/ lus la mi bde zhing / dngol 'byin to zhe nyes par lta ba ma yin
257a6(mdo sde): gyi/ phyag dar khrod pa 'di dag ni drang srong gis bgos pa'o// 'dod chags dang bral ba dang 'thun pa'o// 'phags pa'i rigs dang / 'thun pa'o// de bzhin gsheg
257a7(mdo sde): pas bstod pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pas bsngags pa'o// zhes phyag dar khrod pa de dag la yon tan du lta ba yin te/ rgyu de dang rkyen de dang / gzhi des bdag
257a8(mdo sde): la mi stongad/ gzhan la mi stod do// de bdag la stod cing gzhan la stod pa dang bral bas/ tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa yin te/ tshul khrims phun sum tshog/
257b1(mdo sde): pas lha rnams 'du ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bsngags pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su btsal ba yin/ mi dang mi
257b2(mdo sde): ma yin pa rnams kyis yongs su bsrung ba yin/ bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong rdal gyis mi dang yul gyi mi rnams kyis phyag bya ba yin/ tshangs pa
257b3(mdo sde): mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis gzeng stong par bya ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' phyag dar khrod pa rnams
257b4(mdo sde): yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems rgya chen po rnams spong
257b5(mdo sde): pa dma' tshegs kyis zhig bgyi bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'jig rten gyi yid dang spor ba yi ni
257b6(mdo sde): te/ stobs kyi mthu thob pa rnams 'jig rten dang 'thun par spyod kyis/ stobs kyi mthu ma thob pa rnams ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i stobs kyi
257b7(mdo sde): mthu ma thob pas ni/ nyon mongs pa ma langs pa'i gnyen po bsten par bya'o// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu ci snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa rgya chen po la mos te/
257b8(mdo sde): 'on te dman pa la mos pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de'i lan gsol du bdag gis tshig mi phyin no//
258a1(mdo sde): ci'i slang du zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni mas pa la ldan pas lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das ni chos gzigs pa da /
258a2(mdo sde): bar gshegs pa ni chos rnams gzigs pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos gang la yang mos par bgyi ba ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
258a3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa gring bzhi'i mi rnams dang / lha dang mi dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za mos pa dman pa gzhan dag la spyod pa dman
258a4(mdo sde): tshegs ston cing de dag gi mdun du spangs pa'i yon tan rnams kyi bsngags pa brjod pa de ci'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol
258a5(mdo sde): pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag de ltar bus 'dul ba'i slad du ste/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' theg pa gser du zhugs pa rnams kyi nyon mongs pa ma
258a6(mdo sde): skyes pa'i gnyen por de bzhin gshegs pa snyan pa mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' stobs kyi mthu
258a7(mdo sde): tham sams kyang / 'dus pa'i dang ba gyir/ byas dang kyang par 'gyur cing ba pas rnam pa'i tsha ma / rje'i ra byang chub pa smra smra
258a8(mdo sde): dar khrod pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos gos gsum pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/
258b1(mdo sde): zas pa rnams yin// brgyags pa chung mam pa'i sdug pa rdzas dang bral pa rnams tshan/ 'dami ba ba dang thas pa rnams yin/ 'khrug pa dang thas pa rnams yin
258b2(mdo sde): leb pa med pa rnams yin/ zag pa zad par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos ngan ngon gyis chog shes shing 'dod pa chung
258b3(mdo sde): ba yin/ de 'dod pa chung bas na kun tu tshol ba med pa yin/ kun tu 'tsho ba med pas na/ stsogs pa med pa yin/ stsogs pa med pas na stsags pa chud za ba med pa
258b4(mdo sde): yin/ bstsogs pa chung zod pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal med pa yin/ sdug bsngal med pas yid mi bde ba med pas na 'khrug pa med pa yin/ 'jug pa med pas
258b5(mdo sde): na len pa yin/ len pa med pas na/ zag pa zad par bya ba'i phyir bstan pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' chos gos gsum
258b6(mdo sde): rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bying ba can rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags kyi bsam pas/
258b7(mdo sde): me 'gro ste/ de'i phyir bying ba can zhen bya'o// de bzhin du zhe sdang gi bsam pas mi 'gro/ gti mug gi bsam pas mi 'gro/ khro ba dang gnod sems kyi bsam pas
259a1(mdo sde): 'gro/ tha dog dang / ser sna'i bsam pas mi 'gro/ nga rgyal gyi bsam pas mi 'gro/ grags pa 'dod pa'i bsam pas mi 'gro/ shes kyi khe/
259a2(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i bsam pas mi 'gro// rnyed pa dang / bkur sti 'dod pa'i bsam pas mi 'gro// zhing bdud la mi 'dud/ dga' bar bya bas bsnyems pa yin te/ de'i phyir
259a3(mdo sde): bying ba can zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' phying pa can rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sem
259a4(mdo sde): dpa' bsod snyoms pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sems can rnams la banA pa zhugs pa rnams yin/ mthar gyis bsod snyoms len pa rnams yin/
259a5(mdo sde): yongs su yi chad pa med pa rang bzhin can rnams yin chog shes pa rnams yin/ bgo bsha' byed ngang tshul can rnams yin/ ma chags pa rnams yin/ bsod snyoms
259a6(mdo sde): bza' ba la tshod shes pa rnams yin/ dge ba'i phyogs la mngon du phyogs pa rnams yin/ dge ba'i chos shin tu yongs su bsdus pa rnams yin/ ril po'i 'du
259a7(mdo sde): shes med pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams la phan par zhugs pa rnams yin pa nas ci ltar na ril po'i 'du shes
259a8(mdo sde): med pa'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang ldan pa sdug bsngal ba dag
259b1(mdo sde): mthong na/ sems can de dag la phan par bya ba'i phyir bsod snyoms pa'i yid dam 'dzin te/ de nam grong ngam/ grong khyer ram grong rdal du bsod snyoms kyi phyir 'gro/
259b2(mdo sde): kha de'i tshe/ dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag pa dang / spyod lam mdzes pas dbang po mi g.yo ba dang / dbang po mi rgod pa dang dbang po dul ba dang gnya' shing gang tsam du
259b3(mdo sde): lta ba dang / dge ba'i chos rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag nas bsod snyoms kyi phyir 'gro'o// de bsod snyoms kyi phyir 'gro na/ bsod snyoms mthar kyis len
259b4(mdo sde): pa yin te/ mgo 'phangs bstod cing / bram ze shing sa la chen po lta bu'i grong ngam/ rgyal rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu'i grong ngam/ khyim bdag shing sa la
259b5(mdo sde): chen po lta bu'i rtswa grong 'gror dag du 'jug go// mtha' cig nas gzung ste/ nam de'i don grub par gyur gyi bar du bsod snyoms spyod de/ gzhan du na gnas gang
259b6(mdo sde): na khyid za ba 'am/ ba drus ma 'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa rang bzhin gyis ngang tshul ngan pa'i srog chags sam bud dang / skyes pa dang khye'u dang /
259b7(mdo sde): bu mo dang / rgyal ka bya ba'i bsam pa can dag yod pa 'am/ smod pa'i gnas thams cad du spong ste/ de mthar gyis bsod snyoms la 'gro na/ yongs su yi mi chad/
259b8(mdo sde): cing kun nas nyon mongs pa med la/ sems can de dag la chags pa yang mi bskyed/ khong khro ba yang mi skyed de/ yongs su yi chad par med pas so sor ci rigs
260a1(mdo sde): pa'i bsod snyoms ngan ngon gis chog shes pa yin te/ des bsod snyoms de blangs nas bdag gi gnas su 'ongs te/ lhung bzed dang chos/
260a2(mdo sde): gos bzhag rka lag bkrus te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten rnams la bskur sti dang rim gro byas te/ gnas su
260a3(mdo sde): song nas bsod snyoms de las tsha cig ni tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyi phyir gzhog go// gnyis pa ni sdug bsngal ba rnams kyi phyir gzhog go/ gsum pa
260a4(mdo sde): ni sems can log par ltung ba rnams kyi phyir gzhog go/ cha bzhi pa ni bdag za ste/ de za ba na/ 'dod chags med par za ste/ chags par ma yin/ brkam par/
260a5(mdo sde): ma yin/ zhen par ma yin gyi gzhan du na ci tsam du lus gnas par 'gyur ba dang / 'tsho bar bya ba'i phyir za ste/ ci ltar ha chang yang nyams dma' ba dang /
260a6(mdo sde): ha chang yang lus lci bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar za ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ha chang yang nyams pas dma' na ni dge ba'i phyogs la rgyab kyis ltas par 'gyur ro//
260a7(mdo sde): lus ha chang lcis na ni gnyid kyis non par 'gyur ro// des bsod snyoms de zos nas dge ba'i phyogs la mngon du phyogs pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang /
260a8(mdo sde): le lo med pa dang / snyoms pa med pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o// de byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos yongs su 'dus pas/
260b1(mdo sde): bdag du 'dzin pa med pa yin/ bdag du 'dzin pa med pas/ bdag gi shas kyang sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag
260b2(mdo sde): dang ldan byang chub sems dpa' bsod snyoms pa rnams yin no// // rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' stan cig pa rnams yin no
260b3(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdud thams cad kyis bsdigs pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po'i bstan cig la mi g.yo ba rnams yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
260b4(mdo sde): bsam gtang las mi g.yo ba rnams yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab las mi g.yo ba rnams yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes las mi g.yo
260b5(mdo sde): ba rnams yin/ stong pa nyid las mi g.yo ba rnams yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag pa lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa las mi g.yo ba rnams yin/ lam las
260b6(mdo sde): mi g.yo ba rnams yin yang dag pa'i mtha' las mi g.yo ba rnams yin/ de bzhin nyid las mi g.yo ba rnams yin/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bstan las mi g.yo ba
260b7(mdo sde): rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu stan cig po 'di yin te/ de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stan no// rigs kyi bu stan cig po ni 'di yin te/ de ni chos kyi stan no// stan
260b8(mdo sde): de las byang chub sems dpa' de dag mi g.yo ste/ de bas na stan cig pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' stan cig rnams
261a1(mdo sde): yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' zas phyis mi len pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
261a2(mdo sde): mi brkam pa'i rang bzhin can rnams yin/ mi chags pa'i rang bzhin can rnams yin/ de dag gis nam tshod bzung bar gyur pa de ni tshe/ nyi tshod yod dam med kyang rung //
261a3(mdo sde): ste/ de dag gi lus rton pa 'di lta ste/ mar ram 'bru mar ram/ sbrang rtsi 'am/ bu ram 'am/ rtsa ba'i khu ba 'am sdong po'i khu ba 'am/ 'bras bu'i khu ba de lta bu dag
261a4(mdo sde): gzar mi rung ngo // gzhan za ba mthong yang khong khro ba'i sems dang / 'ju ba'i sems kyang mi bskyed do// yang gal te zas phyis mi len byang chub sems dpa'
261a5(mdo sde): de ji lta bu'i nad kyis srog gi bar chad du 'gyur ba 'am/ dge ba'i phyogs kyi bar chad du 'gyur te/ nang tshabs che na des 'gyod pa med cing the tsom med par byas la//
261a6(mdo sde): sman yin par sems nye bar bzhag la spyad par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' zas phyis len pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang /
261a7(mdo sde): ldan na byang chub sems dpa' zas phyis mi len pa rnams yin no// / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa rnams yin no// bcu gang
261a8(mdo sde): zhe na 'di lta ste/ yun ring po nas tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa rnams yin/ 'dul ba la mkhas pa rnams yin/ dbang po ma nyams pa rnams yin/ mang du thog/
261b1(mdo sde): ba rnams yin/ nus pa rnams yin/ bdag du 'dzin pa'i 'jig rten pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ ri dag sa dang 'dra ba rnams yin na/ lus kyis thag bsrings
261b2(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/ bden pa la mngon par phyogs pa rnams yin/ mi dga' ba dang ma 'dres pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
261b3(mdo sde): yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa la gnas pa yin pa nas/ ci ltar na mi dga' ba dang / ma 'dres pa bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
261b4(mdo sde): legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba yin/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/ chos nyid la mkhas shing / cho ga dang
261b5(mdo sde): spyod yul dang / 'gro ba dang / phyir 'ong ba la mkhas pa dang / gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pas rgan rabs dang / bar ma dang / gsar bu rnams kyi bslab pa'i la
261b6(mdo sde): bstan pa de la 'di lta ste/ don dang tshig dang / 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog cing gzhan gyis mi bkri ba yin no// de ltung ba byung na/ ltung
261b7(mdo sde): ba las byung bar rab tu shes shing gnas de dag kyang yongs su spong ngo // gnas de dag la gus par byed cing / 'chags pa mang ba yin/ sdig pa de la smod
261b8(mdo sde): cing 'gyod de/ mthol bar byed do// gnas gang du ltung bar gyur pa de dag kyang rab tu shes/ gang dag mi 'gyur ba de dag kyang rab tu shes/ gang dag tu
262a1(mdo sde): chen por 'gyur ba dang / gang dag du 'bring dang / gang dag du chung rung 'gyur ba de dag kyang rab tu shes/ las gang gi rnam par smin
262a2(mdo sde): pa'i yun ji srid pa de la yang rab tu shes te/ de yang nan tan gyis sgrub po// de mig gi dbang po ma nyams pa dang // rna ba'i dbang po ma nyams shing yan lag dang
262a3(mdo sde): snying lag thams cad ma nyams par dgon pa na gnas te gnas gang na 'tshe ba med pa'i gnas de dag tu gnas so// gnas gang dag na bsod snyoms blang ba'i spyod yul dang
262a4(mdo sde): ha cang yang mi rig ha cang yang mi ba dang / gnas gang dag na chu dang zhing rnyog pa med pa btsang zhing dri ma med pa tshegs chung ba yod pa dang / gnas na shing phun sum tshogs pa/
262a5(mdo sde): me tog phun sum tshogs pa/ 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa/ lo ma phun sum tshogs pa/ gcan zan khro bo med pa phug dang ldan pa sman gshong dang ldan pa thag thug med pa/
262a6(mdo sde): 'gro na bde ba/ zhi ba gnyis su med pa'i gnas de 'dra ba dag na gnas so// gnas de dag na gnas shing gang des sngon blags pa dang / sngon thos pa de nyin lan
262a7(mdo sde): sum mtshan lan gsum du/ s+tha ha cang yang mi che/ hacang yang mi chung ba dang / dbang po mi rgod cing phyi rol tu ma song ba'i sems kyis dad pa nye bar 'tsho zhing
262a8(mdo sde): tshig nye bar bzung te/ mtshan ma 'dzin cing / gnyid kyis ma log par kha ton byed do// gal te dge sbyong dgon pa pa'i drung du/ rgyal po 'am/ blon po chen po 'am/
262b1(mdo sde): de ma yin pa'i gzhan bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ grong rdal gyi mi 'am/ yul gyi mi 'ongs na/ des de dag la gus pa legs 'ongs so zhes brjod par bya ste/ des/
262b2(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po ji ltar gdan bting ba la bzhugs shig ces de skad byas nas gal te 'dug na gnyi ga yang 'dug par bya'o// de ste mi 'dug pa na gnyi ga yang mi 'dug
262b3(mdo sde): par bya'o// gal te dbang po rgod par gyur na/ rgyal po chen po gang khyod kyis phyogs na/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze rnams tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang ldan pa mang
262b4(mdo sde): po thos pa dag/ mi rgod dang / spre'u rnams kyis ma gces par gnas pa/ de ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed do zhes stod par bya'o// de ste brtan zhing dul la dbang po rab
262b5(mdo sde): tu zhi ba zhig yin te/ chos brtan par rung na/ de la chos sna tshogs bstan par bya'o// de ste chos sna tshogs bstan pa la mi dga' na/ de la skyo ba dang 'thun pa'i chos
262b6(mdo sde): bstan par bya'o// de ste skye bo dang chos bstan pa la mi dga' na/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos pa rgya che ba dag bstan par bya'o// bram ze dang rgyal rigs dang grong pa
262b7(mdo sde): dang / yul gyi mi dag 'ongs na yang ci rigs par bya ba dag bya'o// de de ltar mang du thos pas chos nyan pa rnams kyi sems mgu bar byed nus pa yin te/ sems can de
262b8(mdo sde): dag kyang de lta dga' ba dang / dad pa dang rangs pa thob par 'gyur ro// nyon mongs kun nas langs pa rnams kyi gnyen po yang nus pa yin no// mang du thos pa'i stobs
263a1(mdo sde): bskyed pas/ bdag du 'dzin pa'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba yin no// bdag du 'dzin pa'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba bas dgon pa den mi 'jigs mi
263a2(mdo sde): skrag/ mi sdang bag tsha ba med cing / rab tu dben pa la mngon du phyogs par gyur te gnas so// de dgon pa de na dben pa la mngon du phyogs shing 'du 'dzi med par gnas pas/
263a3(mdo sde): ri dgas dang 'dra ba yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa ni ri dgas ltar brtag tu 'jigs pa ma yin te/ de la ri dgas kyi nyes pa yang med mod kyi ji ltar ri
263a4(mdo sde): dgas dag bdag 'di'i lan byon gyis/ srog gi bar chad du 'ong ngo zhes/ yul yang yul gyi phyogs ring po nas kyang ring bor ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang
263a5(mdo sde): bdag 'di lan byon gyis/ yid dam gyi bar chad dam/ sems g.yeng bar gyur na/ mi rung ngo zhes bud med dang skyes pa dang / khye'u dang bu mo rnams dang / 'du 'dzi mi byed
263a6(mdo sde): cing / 'du 'dzi dag ring por yongs su spong ngo // de de ltar thag bsrings te/ gnas nas rab tu dben pa la mngon du phyogs pa yin/ de rab du dben pa la mngon du phyogs/
263a7(mdo sde): pas/ dgon pa la yon tan du lta ba dang / zhi bar lta ba yin/ de yon tan du lta zhing zhi bar lta bas na/ mi dga' ba dang ma 'dres pas na/ dgos pa'i chos rnams yang dag
263a8(mdo sde): bar blangs spyod de/ de lta na rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' lung ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa la gnas pa nas mi dga' ba dang ma 'dres pa'i bar du yin no// rigs
263b1(mdo sde): kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'i shing drung ba rnams
263b2(mdo sde): yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ grong ha cang yang nye ba'i shing drung du mi rten/ grong dang ha cang ring po'i shing drung du mi rten/ ldam ldum tshem can gis gang
263b3(mdo sde): ba'i shing drung du mi rten/ shing lo ma skams pa'i shing drung du mi rten/ spre'u gnas pa'i shing drung du mi rten/ bya gnas pa'i shing drung du mi rten/ gcan zan khro bo gnas
263b4(mdo sde): ba'i shing drung du mi rten/ mgron po gnas pa'i shing drung du mi rten/ mi g.yon can gnas pa'i shing drung du mi rten kyi/ gang na lus bag yangs shing sems dga' bar
263b5(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i shing drung du lta bur rten to// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' shing drung ba rnams yin no// // rigs kyi bu chos bcu
263b6(mdo sde): dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bla gab med pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dgun nam dpyid dam/ dbyar ram ston yang rung ste/ brtsig drung na mi
263b7(mdo sde): gnas/ shing drung du ma yin/ sog ma srungs par ma yin/ ri'i sman gshong du ma yin/ chu lkog du ma yin/ grang ba skyob par yang mi byed rlung skyob pa ma yin/
263b8(mdo sde): char skyob pa ma yin/ nyi ma skyob pa ma yin/ ba mo'i skyabs su yang mi byed kyi/ gzhan du na gal te/ byang chub sems dpa' bla gab med pa na lus kyis mi nus
264a1(mdo sde): par gyur na/ des gtsug lag khang du gnas te/ nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pas sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcas te/
264a2(mdo sde): ci nas kyang bdag rtsug lag khang na gnas bzhin du/ nyon mongs pa rnams pa rnams spong bar 'bad pa de ltar bya'o zhes de ltar sems bskyed par bya'o// brtsug lag khang
264a3(mdo sde): de la yang chags pa mi skyed de/ zhen pa 'am ma yin no// de'ang 'di ltar sems te/ sbyin pa'i bdag po rnams la phan gdags par bya'o// bdag cag gis bdag
264a4(mdo sde): nyid gso bar mi bya'o// snyam te/ de rtag tu rgyun mi mchad par bla gab med pa'i 'du shes nye bar 'jog pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang
264a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' bla gab med pa rnams yin no// // rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' dur khrod pa rnams yin no// / bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/
264a6(mdo sde): gnas gang na gnas kyang rung / skyo ba mang ba rnams yin/ de dag shi ba'i 'du shes rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par nye bar gzhog pa yin/ de dag rnam par zos par 'du shes pa
264a7(mdo sde): dang / rnam par dmar bar 'du shes pa dang rnam par sngos par 'du shes pa dang / rnam par rul par 'du shes pa dang / rnam par bam par 'du shes pa dang / rnam par tshig
264a8(mdo sde): par 'du shes pa dang / rnam par 'thor bar 'du shes pa dang / keng rus su 'du shes pa rtag tu rgyun mi chad par nye bar gzhog pa yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
264b1(mdo sde): dur khrod pas ni byams pa'i sems su bya'o// phan sems dang sems can la snying brtse ba dang tshul khrims dang / gtsang sbra'i cho ga dang ldan zhing / sha dang 'bags pa med par byal
264b2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dur khrod gam yon ni/ gang byang chub sems dpa' sha za ba mthong na ma dad pa skyed cing / gtse bar sems pa'i mi ma yin pa dag gnas yod
264b3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' dur khrod pas gtsug lag khang du zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la phyag byas te/ dge slong rgan rabs rnams la phyag byas te/
264b4(mdo sde): gsar bu rnams kyang dga' bar byas la/ 'grong ste 'dug par bya'o// dge 'dun gyi lam bstan la 'dug par mi bya'o// rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems
264b5(mdo sde): dpa' 'jig rten gyi yid dang sbyar bar byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' dur khrod pa ni 'phags pa'i ma yin pa'i/ 'jig rten dang mi mthun gyi/ 'phags pa dang ni mi mthun
264b6(mdo sde): pa med do/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' dur khrod pa gang zag gi lam bstan la bdar na/ des ci nas kyang 'gyod par mi 'gyur la gzhan gis kyang dbye bar mi 'gyur
264b7(mdo sde): bar shin tu rtogs par byas la/ dge slong de'i bsam pa yang shes nas/ gdod bstan de la gdol bu dang 'dra bar dma' ba dma' ba'i sems kyis bstan de la 'dug par
264b8(mdo sde): bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' dur khrod pa rnams yin no// // rigs kyi bu chos bcu po dang ldan na/ byang chub
265a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' cog pu pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ lus yongs su gdung bar bya ba'i phyir 'dug pa ma yin sems yongs su gdung bar
265a2(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir 'dug pa ma yin/ gnyid kyi non te 'dug pa ma yin/ lus dub pas 'dug pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' cog pu pa 'dug pa ni/ byang chub kyi tshogs
265a3(mdo sde): yongs su bskang ba'i phyir 'dug go/ sems rtse cig pa'i phyir 'dug go// lam mngon du bya ba'i phyir 'dug go// byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba'i phyir 'dug go/
265a4(mdo sde): sems can phan pa'i phyir 'dug go// nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir 'dug go// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' cog pu
265a5(mdo sde): ba rnams yin no// / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' gzhi ji gzhin pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ mal stan la ma
265a6(mdo sde): chags pa rnams yin/ bdag nyid mal stan mi gding / gzhan dag kyang gding du mi 'jug/ gding ba'i phyir brda' mi byed cing / gzhan du na lo mas gang ba 'am/
265a7(mdo sde): rtswas gang ba'i gnas kyang rung ste/ gnas de dag du nyal bar byed cing / sa gang gi phyogs na sbrul gis gang ba 'am/ sbrang ma 'am/ sha sbrang gis gang ba 'am/
