265a8(mdo sde): khung mang ba de dag ring po bas kyang ring por yongs su spongs // de dag nyal ba na glo g.yas pas nyal bar byed de/ rkang pa'i steng du rkang pa gzhag nas/ lus chos
265b1(mdo sde): gos dag gis shin tu g.yogs shing / dran pa dang shes bzhin du snang ba'i 'du shes su nyal bar byed de/ gnyid kyi bde ba la chags par mi byed/ skyes pa'i bde ba/
265b2(mdo sde): yang ma yin te gzhan du na de dag ci tsam du 'byung ba chen po rnams gnas shing 'tsho ba'i phyir nyal bar byed la/ rtag du rgyun mi chad pa yang dge ba'i phyogs la mngon du
265b3(mdo sde): phyogs pa rnams yin no/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' gzhi ji bzhin pa rnams yin no// / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na
265b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ mi sdug bsgom pa mang ba rnams yin/ byams pa sgom pa mang ba rnams yin/
265b5(mdo sde): rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba sgom pa mang ba rnams yin/ skyon la mkhas pa rnams yin/ stong pa nyid sgom pa mang ba rnams yin/ mtshan ma med pa sgom pa rnams yin//
265b6(mdo sde): rnal 'byor sgom pa mang ba rnams yin/ rgyun tu sgom pa mang ba rnams yin/ 'gyod pa med pa rnams yin/ tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// rigs
265b7(mdo sde): kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi sdug pa sgom pa mang ba rnams yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' cig pu lkog du song ste/ nang du yang dag pa
265b8(mdo sde): bzhag nas/ rab tu dben pa la mngon par phyogs shing shin tu skyo ba'i sems kyis/ lus drang po drang po dang // lus bags gis grod pas/ dkyil mo grangs bcas
266a1(mdo sde): nas/ dran pa mngon du bzhag te/ phyi rol du ma byung ba'i sems kyis 'di snyam du sems so// ji snyed du ma'i nang na kha zas zas skom gtsang ma
266a2(mdo sde): yang rung / bzang po yang rung ngan pa yang rung / ro phun sum tshogs pa yang rung / ro chung ba yang rung ste/ de thams cad lus kyi med reg pa dang / brtsog
266a3(mdo sde): par 'gyur te/ lus cing dri nga ba dang / 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'phrad pa yin no// de la byis pa 'di dag ni shin tu zhen cing rab tu chags so// bdag cag ni 'phag
266a4(mdo sde): pa'i chos 'dul ba la gnas te/ yang dag pa shes rab kyis/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtags te/ 'di 'dra ba'i lus la ma zhen ma chags par bya'o// de'i phyir/
266a5(mdo sde): skyo ba'i sems kyang mi skyed do snyam ste/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' mi sdug pa sgom pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byams pa sgom pa mang ba yin// /
266a6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gcig pu dben par 'dug ste/ nang du yang dag par gzhag nas rab tu dben pa la mngon par phyogs te// shin tu skyo ba'i ses
266a7(mdo sde): kyis lus drang po dang lus bags kyis klod pas dkyil mo krung bcas nas dran pa mngon du gzhag ste/ phyi rol tu ma byung ba'i sems kyis 'di snyam du sems so// sems
266a8(mdo sde): can gang dag khro ba/ gnod sems mang ba mi dge ba'i las byed pa rnams dang / gang rnams bdag la rgol ba dang / dgra bo gcugs med par sha gnyer bar rnams byung ba
266b1(mdo sde): 'am/ 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'ang rung ste/ bdag gis de dag thams cad kyis khro ba dang / gnod sems rab tu zhi bar byas te/ byang chub kyi snying po la dgod par bya'o//
266b2(mdo sde): snyam mo yang dag tsam gyis ma yin gyi/ bsam pa thag pas sems te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byams pa sgom pa mang ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sem
266b3(mdo sde): dpa' rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba sgom pa mang ba yin te/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags skyes pa dang / khro ba skyes pa dang gnod sems skyes nas
266b4(mdo sde): 'di snyam du sems so// chos 'di su la skye bar de yang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ngo // chos 'di gang skye ba yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o// rkyen gang dag
266b5(mdo sde): gis skye ba de dag kyang rten cing 'byung ba'o// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos gsog de dag la mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can su zhig bdag la rma bzhin 'byin
266b6(mdo sde): no snyam ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba sgom pa mang ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' skyon la mkhas pa yin
266b7(mdo sde): zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang bdag gi rgyud la skyon yod pa de dag spang ba'i phyir nan tan tu byed/ gang gzhan gyi rgyud la yod pa mi nus pa'i rang
266b8(mdo sde): bzhin de dag la yang btang snyoms su gnas so// skyon de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas la rim gro mi byed pa dang / chos dang dge 'dun
267a1(mdo sde): dang / bslab pa dang / 'phags pa rnams dang / tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rgan rabs dang / bar ma dang / gsar bu rnams la rim gro mi
267a2(mdo sde): byed pa 'di na skyon no// bdag la ri mo byed pa dang / gzhan la brnyes pa dang / yul la mngon du phyogs pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la rgyab gyis phyogs pa dang / bdag du
267a3(mdo sde): lta ba dang / sems can du lta ba dang / srog tu lta ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba dang / chad par lta ba dang / rtag par lta ba dang / stong pa nyid du 'dzin pa dang / rtag par 'dzin pa dang /
267a4(mdo sde): mi rtag par 'dzin pa dang / 'phags pa rnams mnyen par mi byed pa dang / byis pa skye bo dang / sten pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan na/ yongs su spong ba dang / sems can tshul
267a5(mdo sde): khrims 'chal pa la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / sdig pa'i grogs po la sten pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su spong ba dang / mdo sde zab mo spong ba dang / mdo sde zab
267a6(mdo sde): mos skrag pa dang / snyoms las dang / le lo dang / bdag la brnyas pa dang / gzi brjid chung ba dang / spobs pa med pa dang / gnas ma yin pa la 'gyod pa dang / mi 'gyod pa
267a7(mdo sde): la 'gyod pa dang / 'gyod pa la mi 'gyod pa dang / sgrib pa kun nas ldang bas/ grags pa dang / g.yo sgyus bcings pa dang / rmugs shing gnyid kyis non pa dang / rnyed pa dang
267a8(mdo sde): bkur sti 'dod pa dang / rus la 'dod chags pa dang / lta ba la 'dod chags pa dang / yul la 'dod chags pa dang / 'khor la 'dod chags pa dang / 'jig rten rgyang phan
267b1(mdo sde): gyi gsang tshig la rten pa dang / dam pa'i chos las 'byol ba dang / yi dam 'dor ba dang / mi dge ba dang ldan pa dag la stsol ba dang / rab tu 'byung ba dang mi sde pa dang / skyes pa/
267b2(mdo sde): sde pa dang / bud med dang sde pa dang / khye'u dang sde pa dang / bu mo dang sde pa dang / mu stegs can dang sde ba dang / dgon pa la mngon par mi dga' ba dang / zas kyi cho ga mi shes
267b3(mdo sde): ba dang / bu'i drung du mi 'gro ba dang / kha don gyi dus mi shes pa dang / spyod yul gi gnas mi shes pa dang / bslab pa dang / phra dog dag la gus par mi byed pa dang / sdig pa chud
267b4(mdo sde): du rnams la 'jigs par mi lta ba dang / dbang po gti mug gis bsgribs pa dang / ldan pa dang / g.yeng ba la dbang po grims pa dang / rgod par spyod pa dang / bcos dka'
267b5(mdo sde): ba dang / dka' blo mi bde ba dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i gzugs dag la mtshan ma dang mngon rtags su 'dzin pa dang / khro ba rnams
267b6(mdo sde): la sems mi byams pa dang / sdug bsngal ba rnams la snying mi rtse ba dang / na bas skyo bar mi byed pa dang / shi bas mi skrag pa dang / kun tu 'bar ba las mi 'byung ba dang /
267b7(mdo sde): lus la so sor mi rtogs pa dang / tshul khrims la so sor mi rtog pa dang / ci byas ci byed zhes so sor mi rtog pa dang / mi bsam pa la sems pa dang / mi rtag pa la rtog pa
267b8(mdo sde): dang / mi smon pa la smon pa dang / mi 'byung ba la 'byung bar 'du shes pa dang / mi dga' ba la dga' bar shes pa dang / lam ma yin pa la lam du 'du shes pa dang / ma
268a1(mdo sde): thob pa la thob par 'du shes pa dang / 'phral gyi bya ba la chags pa dang / byed pa ngan pas g.yeng ba dang / dge ba'i phyogs rgya chen po rnams rnam par spong /
268a2(mdo sde): ba dang / theg pa chen po la mi bsngags pa brjod pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa la bsngags pa brjod pa dang / theg pa chen po la mngon par dad pa'i gang zag rnams la mi bsngag
268a3(mdo sde): ba brjod pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa la mngon par dad pa'i gang zag rnams la bsngags pa brjod pa dang / rtsod pa ltar len pa dang / 'thab pa'i ngang tshul can dang //
268a4(mdo sde): brlung ba dang / rtsub pa dang / pho theg can dang / spyi rtol che ba dang / 'dul ba dang / ngag mi snyan pa dang / mu cor smra ba dang / mi gtsigs par smra ba dang / ngan du smra bas smra ba
268a5(mdo sde): dang / brdzun zer ba dang / spros pa la mngon par dga' ba dang / spros pa la gzhol ba ni skyon no// de de ltar skyon la mkhas pas spros pa thams cad dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir/
268a6(mdo sde): stong pa nyid sgom pa la rnal 'byor du byed/ de stong pa nyid sgom pa mang bas/ gnas gang dang gang dag la sems 'jug cing sems mngon par dad pa'i gnas de dang de dag la ngo bo
268a7(mdo sde): nyid yongs su btsal na stong pa nyid rtogs so// sems de gang yin pa de yang yongs su brtags na stong pa'o// ngag gis brtags pa de yang stong par rtogs so// de de ltar
268a8(mdo sde): rtogs pas mtshan ma med pa la rnal 'byor du byed do// de la nang gi mtshan ma gang dang gang snang bar 'gyur ba de dang de dag mtshan ma med par byed de/ ci nas kyang lus mi
268b1(mdo sde): dmigs pa dang / lus la dran pa nye bar mi 'jog pa dang / lus la sems mi gtong ba dang / phyi rol gyi mtshan ma rnams mi dmigs pa dang / phyi rol gyi mtshan ma med pa rnams/
268b2(mdo sde): mi dmigs pa dang / phyi rol gyi mtshan ma rnams la dran pa nye bar mi 'jog pa dang / sems mi gtong ba de ltar mtshan ma med par byed do// de phyi rol gyi mtshan ma med sA dang
268b3(mdo sde): bral ba dang lus kyi mtshan ma rnams dang bral bas/ nang gi mtshan ma rnams spangs pa'i phyir zhugs te/ skom pa la mngon par dga' skyod do// de sgom pa mang bas/ rtag tu
268b4(mdo sde): sgom pa la brtson pa yin/ rgyun mi 'chad par zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pas gnas pa yin/ de la zhi gnas ni sems rtse gcig pa'o// lhag mthong ni gang yang
268b5(mdo sde): dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du chos la so sor rtog pa'o// de sems mnyam par bzhag pas 'gyod pas med cing rab tu dag pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar de tshul khrims
268b6(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa'i phyir ro// tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rnal 'byor spyod pa yin te/ tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa rnams la ni rnal 'byor
268b7(mdo sde): yang dag par 'grub bo// tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa rnams ni rnal 'byor la spyod de/ de bas na rnal 'byor du sbyong ba rnams shes bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag
268b8(mdo sde): dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' mdo 'dzin pa rnams yin no// bcug pa
269a1(mdo sde): zhe na 'di lta ste/ dam pa'i chos kun nas bsrung ba'i phyir thos pa 'dzin gyi/ zang zing gyi phyir ma yin no// bstan pa kun nas bsrung ba'i phyir/ thog
269a2(mdo sde): pa 'dzin gyi/ rnyed pa'i phyir ma yin no// dkon mchog gsum gi rigs mi chad par bya ba'i phyir thos pa 'dzin gyi/ bkur sti'i phyir ma yin no// theg pa chen po la yang dag
269a3(mdo sde): par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir thos pa 'dzin gyi/ grags pa dang sgra dang tshigs su bcad pa'i phyir ma yin no// mgon med pa'i sems can rnams la
269a4(mdo sde): phan par bya ba'i phyir thos pa 'dzin to// sdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnams la bde bar bya ba'i phyir thos pa 'dzin to// shes rab kyi mig dang bral ba'i sems can rnams shes
269a5(mdo sde): rab kyi mig thob par bya ba'i phyir chos 'dzin to// nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams la nyan thos kyi theg pa'i lam bstan pa'i phyir chos
269a6(mdo sde): 'dzin to// theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams la theg pa chen po'i lam bstan pa'i phyir thos pa 'dzin to// bdag nyid kyang bla na med pa'i ye shes
269a7(mdo sde): khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir thos pa 'dzin gyi/ theg pa chung ngu la mi smon to// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' mdo ba rnams yin no// /
269a8(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 'dul ba yang rab tu shes 'dul ba'i tshul yang
269b1(mdo sde): rab tu shes/ 'dul ba zhi ba yang rab tu shes/ rung ba dang mi rung ba yang rab tu shes/ rang bzhin gyis kha na ma tho ba yang rab tu shes/ bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba yang
269b2(mdo sde): rab tu shes// so sor thar pa'i bslab pa'i glong bzhi dang 'byung ba yang rab tu shes/ nyan thos kyi 'dul ba yang rab tu shes/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'dul ba yang rab tu
269b3(mdo sde): shes so// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams yin no// // rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems
269b4(mdo sde): dpa' cho ga dang spyod yul dang spyod pa dang / spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi bslab pa dag la shin tu bslab pa rnams yin/
269b5(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa dag la shin tu bslabs pa rnams yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa dag la shin tu bslabs pa rnams yin/ de dag shin tu bslabs pa nas/
269b6(mdo sde): pha cho ga dang spyod yul phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ cho ga dang spyod yul phun sum tshogs pas/ dge slong gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa'i spyod yul rnams yongs su
269b7(mdo sde): spong / de dag de'i phyir/ gnas ma yin par mi spyod/ yul ma yin pa dang / dus ma yin par mi spyod/ de dag dge sbyong gi yul sgrog pas spyod pa phun sum tshogs pa
269b8(mdo sde): rnams yin te/ dge slong ngam bram zes 'di lta ste/ don dang ma ldan pa de dang des mtshang 'brur med cing / gzhan dag kyang bslab pa nyid la 'jog par byed do// de dag spyod
270a1(mdo sde): ba phun sum tshogs pas spyod lam mdzes pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ spyod lam rab tu zhi bas spyod lam bcos pa med pa dang ldan pa yin no// rigs kyi/
270a2(mdo sde): bu chos bcu po de dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' cho ga dang spyod yul dang sprod pa dang / spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/
270a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ser sna dang pra dog dang bral ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ bdag nyid sbyin pa'i bdag po yin/ gzhan yang sbyin pa la yang dag par
270a4(mdo sde): 'dzud/ sbyin pa'i bsngags pa smra ba rnams yin/ gzhan dag gi sbyin pa la rjes su yi rang bar byed/ smin pa'i bdag po gzhan dag la yang gzeng stod cing rab tu dga'
270a5(mdo sde): bar byed/ gzhan dag la sprin na yang 'di snyam du bdag cag la byin gcig gzhan la ma sbyin no// bdag cag gir gyur la/ gzhan dag gir ma gyur cig ces sems mi
270a6(mdo sde): skyed 'di snyam du/ 'di sems can thams cad 'tshe ba'i yo byad de dang de dag thob par gyur cig ces/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba dang ldan te/ bde
270a7(mdo sde): bar gyur cig/ bdag gis kyang de nyid kyi don du 'bad par bya/ brtsal bar bya'o// bdag cag gis ser sna dang / phra dog gi sems skyed par mi bya'o// zhes sems
270a8(mdo sde): bskyed do// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' ser sna dang phrag dog dang bral ba rnams yin no// // rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan
270b1(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la snyoms pa sbyor ba rnams yin/
270b2(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la khong khro ba'i sems med pa rnams yin/ sems can thams cad la gnod sems med pa rnams yin/ sems can thams cad kyi don kho nar
270b3(mdo sde): sbyin pa dag sbyin tshul khrims srung / bzod pa sgom brtson 'grus brtsom/ bsam gtan la bsam gtan du byed/ shes rab sgom thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yang dag
270b4(mdo sde): par sgrub med kyi/ gnyis la gnas pa'i sems kyis sgrib pa ma yin/ sems can thams cad la 'thun mong gi sems dang / sems can thams cad la dmigs pa
270b5(mdo sde): sgrub ste/ ci nas kyang chos nyid myur du thob par 'gyur ba de ltar sgrub po// de dag 'khor ba rab du 'bar ba nas/ bdag nyid byung nas gzhan dag kyang 'byin te/ de
270b6(mdo sde): yang mnyam pa nyid kyi sems nye bar bzhag cing 'byin gyi/ sdug pa'i sems kyis ma yin/ khong khro bas ma yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ tshong dpon
270b7(mdo sde): nam/ bdag cag la bu sdug pa phangs pa byams pa yid du 'ong ba drag cig yod la/ bu de dag la tshong dpon nam/ khyim bdag mtshungs par byams shing / mtshungs
270b8(mdo sde): bar sbyor bar 'gyur ba las de'i de dag byis pa yin te/ gog pa mi shes pa/ mi mkhas pa dag cig la/ de nas tshong dpon nam khyim bdag de'i khyim mi thar te/ de'i
271a1(mdo sde): @bu de dag kyang so so na 'khod par 'gyur na rigs kyi bu de ci snyam du sems/ tshong dpon nam khyim bdag de 'di ni sngan rdo dbyung ngo // de nas phyis
271a2(mdo sde): 'di dbyung ngo snyam de ltar sems sam/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma legs so/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/
271a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das tshong dpon nam/ khyim bdag de bu rnams la sems snyoms pas/ de gang dang gang dag ji ltar 'jal ba de dag de dang de nyid de bzhin du byon to// bcom
271a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byis pa lta bu'i sems can thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i bu dang 'dra'o// 'phags pa rnams ni ma
271a5(mdo sde): yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' de byis pa mi gsal ba mi mkhas pa 'gro ba drug so so na gnas de dag 'khor ba'i khyim ma thar pa nas/ gang dag gang ji ltar yongs su
271a6(mdo sde): smin pa 'gyur ba de dag de nyid de ltar 'byon to/ phyung nas kyang mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings zhi bar rab tu gzhog go// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na
271a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa la
271a8(mdo sde): mchod pa dang / rim 'gro bya ba la mkhas pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ chos la mchod pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa
271b1(mdo sde): dang bsnyen bkur byas pa yin gyi/ zang zing gi mchod pa ni ma yin no// nan tan gyi mchod pa dang / sems can rnams la phan zhing bde bar bya ba dang / sems can phan
271b2(mdo sde): dgas par byed pa dang sems can gyi don la zhags pa dang / yi dam mi gtong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam mi gtong ba dang / ci ltar smras pa bzhin du byed pa dang /
271b3(mdo sde): yid yongs su mi skyo ba dang / byang chub sems kyi sems ma gtong ba bas/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa dang / sgren bkur byas pa yin gyi/
271b4(mdo sde): zang zing gyi mchod pas ni ma yin no// rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni chos kyi sku ste/ chos la mchod na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
271b5(mdo sde): la mchod par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni nan tan gyis yang dag par gra ba yin te/ sems can thams cad phan zhing bde ba dang / sems
271b6(mdo sde): can thams cad la phan 'dogs pa dang / sems can gyi don bya ba'i phyir skye'o// rigs kyi bu sems can gyi don de yang / yi dam btang ba dang / byang chub sems
271b7(mdo sde): dpa'i lus la rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang / brdzun du smras pa dang / smras pa las nyams pa dang / dam bcas pa las nyams pa dang / yid yongs su skyo ba dang / byang
271b8(mdo sde): chub kyi sems dang bral bas/ yang dag par thob par mi nus so// rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag
272a1(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems na gyi don la rag las pas ste/ gal te sems can rnams med na/ byang chub sems dpa'
272a2(mdo sde): rnams mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro/ de bas na rigs kyi bu chos la mchod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod cing rim gro byas
272a3(mdo sde): ba yin gyi/ zang zing gi mchod pas ma yin pa de ltar blta'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod
272a4(mdo sde): ba dang / rim 'gro bya la mkhas pa rnams yin no// / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' nga rgyal bcom pa rnams yin no/ bcu gang zhe na/
272a5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byang ste/ rab tu byung nas bdag ni grogs po blon po dang / gnyen bshes dang /
272a6(mdo sde): snag gi gnyin mtshams la shi ba dang 'dra'o zhe nga rgyal bcom pa dang / bdag gis gzugs mi sdug par khas blangs shing / bdag gis gos kha dog mi sdug pa bgos
272a7(mdo sde): te/ chos tshul bzhin du bsgyur to zhes nga rgyal bcom pa yin/ spong ba'i rgyu ba spong ba'i phyir/ mgo bregs shing lag du lhung zed thogs te/ grong nas grong du 'gro'o/
272a8(mdo sde): zhes nga rgyal bcom pa yin/ gdol bu dang 'dra bar dma' ba dma' ba'i sems kyis bsod snyoms kyi phyir 'gro'o zhes nga rgyal bcom pa yin/ bdag ni bsod
272b1(mdo sde): snyoms pa te/ bdag gi 'tsho ba gzhan la rag lus so zhes nga rgyal bcom pa yin/ brnyas pa'i bsod snyoms ngan ngon len to zhes nga rgyal bcom pa yin/ bdag gis slob
272b2(mdo sde): dpon dang bla ma dang sbyin pa'i gnas rnams mnyes par bya dgos so zhes nga rgyal bcom pa yin/ bdag gis tshangs par mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la 'di lta ste/ cho ga dang
272b3(mdo sde): spyod yul dang kun spyod pa de dang / des mgu bar par bya'o zhes brgyal bcom pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma thob pa rnams thob par bya'o zhes nga rgyal bcom pa yin/
272b4(mdo sde): sems can khros pa dang / gnod sems can rnams kyi nang na bzod par mang bar bya'o zhes nga rgyal bcom pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems
272b5(mdo sde): dpa' nga rgyal bcom pa rnams yin no// rigs kyis bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' dad pa mang ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ ston gyi
272b6(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsas brtan pa'i rgyu phun sum tshogs pas bsod nams kyis brtan pa rnams yin/ gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog gzhan gyis mi bkri ston pa gzhan med pas yang dag
272b7(mdo sde): bar lta ba rnams yin/ g.yo dag dang sbrus sbyong ba dang bral bas bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ grurgyu med pa'i rang bzhin can pas drang ba rnams yin/ dbang po rje
272b8(mdo sde): pas shes rab phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ rgyud dang bas sgrib pa dang kun nas ldang bral ba rnams yin/ sdig pa'i grogs po dang bral bas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la
273a1(mdo sde): rten pa rnams yin/ legs par bshad pa tshol ba mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa rnams yin/ chos bstan pa la log par mi 'dzin pa rnams yin//
273a2(mdo sde): rgya chen po la mos pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba rab tu shes pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' dad pa mang ba rnams yin no//
273a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba'i phyogs 'ga' tsam zhig nyan par gsol te
273a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba'i phyogs 'ga' zhig ngas bstan kyis legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig/
273a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad
273a6(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa na/ sems can thams cad la mthun mong ba'i byams pa chen po dang ldan te/ des de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar sems
273a7(mdo sde): cig la khyab pa de bzhin du sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad la yang khyab ste/ sems can gi khams thams cad la khyab nas nam mkha'i khams la khyab kyang / de bzhin
273a8(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i byams pa chen po'i mtha' dang mu shes pa'ang med do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams
273b1(mdo sde): cad dang thun mong ma yin/ pa'i snying rje chen po dang ldan te/ des de bzhin gshegs pa ci ltar sems can cig la snying rje ba bzhin du/ sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams la
273b2(mdo sde): snying rje zhing / de la phan pa mdzad do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos ston pa zad pa dang ldan te/ des de bzhin gshegs paskal pa du ma nas/ bskal pa rgya stong tshad
273b3(mdo sde): med grangs med pa'i bar du rnam grangs gzhan dang / gzhan dag dang tshul gzhan dang / gzhan dag gis sems can thams cad la dus gcig tu ches ston kyang / de bzhin gshegs
273b4(mdo sde): pa'i chos bstan pa zad par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ 'dri ba la lung bstan pa shin tu ston pa tshad med pa dang ldan te/ rigs kyi bu gal te sems can
273b5(mdo sde): ci snyed sems can gi grangs su gtogs pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa la dus cig du/ tshig dang yi ge gzhan dag gis/ dri ba tha dad du dris kyang de dag la de bzhin
273b6(mdo sde): gshegs pas skad cig thang cig yud tsam gcig la dris pa lung bstan pa'i ston pa bstan kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dri ba la lung bstan pa'i ston pa zad par mi
273b7(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni chags pa med pa'i bsam gtan gyi spyod yul ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu gal te sems can thams cad byang chub sems
273b8(mdo sde): dpa' sa bcu la gnas par gyur la/ de dag thams cad dus cig du ting nge 'dzin brgya stong du ma la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin du snyoms par zhugs nas/
274a1(mdo sde): bskal pa brgya stong du mar ting nge 'dzin dang gzhan dgal snyoms par zhugs kyang / de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin tam/ de bzhin
274a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi mtha' 'am mu mi rnyed do/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshad med pa'i gzugs kyi sku mngon par sgrib pa dang ldan te/
274a3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu gal te/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyis 'dul bar gyur na/ de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa skad cig thang cig yud tsam
274a4(mdo sde): cig la/ seMs can re re'i mdun du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs nye bar ston to// gal te gzugs gzhan dang gzhan la mos par gyur na/ de la yang de bzhin
274a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig gis/ sems can re re'i mdun du/ gzugs gzhan dang / gzhan du nye bar ston to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs
274a6(mdo sde): pa'i lha'i spyan gyi yul tshad med de/ rigs kyi bu lha'i sman gis gzigs gyi/ mi'i mig gis ma yin pa'i sems can yod pa gal te/ rigs kyi bu grangs dang bsam pa
274a7(mdo sde): las 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ma lus pa kun de 'dra bar gyur kyang / de bzhin gshegs pas/ phyag gi mthil na kU ru ri'i 'bras bu ltar yang
274a8(mdo sde): dag par lci ba bzhin du gzigs so// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i snyan gyi yul tshad med de/ rigs kyi bu gal te/ de lta bu nyid kyi sems can gyis mtha
274b1(mdo sde): las mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su gang bar gyur la/ de dag thams cad kyis skad cig zang cig yud tsam cig la sgra dbyangs brjod pa'i lhan cig du byung ste/
274b2(mdo sde): brjod kyang de bzhin gshegs pas/ de dag bdag gi sgra rnams kyang so sor gsan to// so sor rab tu mkhyen to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ ye shes tshad med pa
274b3(mdo sde): ba mi zad pa mu med pa nam mkha' dang 'dra ba dang / ldan te rigs kyi bu gal te sems can ni khams ma lus pa so sor rnam par rtog pa/ rjes su rnam par rtog cing / bsam pa
274b4(mdo sde): rnam pa sna tshogs rjes su sems la so so na las sna tshogs byed la/ de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la/ sems can 'di ni 'di la
274b5(mdo sde): rnam par rtog go// sems can 'di ni 'di sems so// sems can 'di ni las 'di byed do/ de'i 'bras bu ni 'dir 'gyur ro// zhes rab tu mkhyen te/ de yang de
274b6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pas/ dus gsum car la yang thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyis/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la rab tu mkhyen to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gsheg
274b7(mdo sde): ba ni rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa'o// rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bsrel ngas pa med/ dbang ngo bslad pa med/ sems 'khrig pa med do//
274b8(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni nyon mongs pa'i bag chags dang / bcas pa thams cad spangs te/ zhi ba rab du zhi ba nye bar zhi ba'o// rigs kyi bu gang la nyon
275a1(mdo sde): mongs pa yod pa de'i sems ni bslad par 'gyur te/ sems braslad pas mnyam par 'jog par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa ni nyon mongs
275a2(mdo sde): pa med pa/ rdul med pa zag pa med pa nyon mongs pa'i bag chags thams cad spang pa/ chos thams cad la dbang ba/ mnyam pa nyid thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms
275a3(mdo sde): par 'jug pa'i spyod yul thams cad las byung ba yin te/ gal te rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa spyod lam re re la yang ting nge 'dzin re res spyod pa nas/ de bzhin
275a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa de bzhin du spyod cing mya ngan las 'das pa'i lus kyi tshe'i bar du spyod na/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu mnyam pa bzhag pa lta ci smos/ rigs kyi bu
275a5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa ni bskal pa grangs med pa du mas yang dag par bgru ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni dpag pa dang / bsam pa dang brtag par mi nuso// /
275a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gsum gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yin
275a7(mdo sde): dag par 'grub pa ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ma yin no/ rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin
275a8(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i yul sgrub par bya ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ de ni bskal ba grangs med pa gsum gyis yang dag par sgrub par mi nus kyi/ nam byang chub sems dpa' chos
275b1(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid du zhugs par gyur pa de'i tshe nas brtsams te bskal pa bgrang bar bya'i thog ma'i sems nas brtsams te ni ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad
275b2(mdo sde): rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sus de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba 'di thos nas dga' ba dang dad pa dang / rangs pa rnyed pa'i sems can de dag ni/ srid pa
275b3(mdo sde): legs par gyi las bgyid pa/ las kyi sgrib pa spang ba/ dad pa dang smos pa mang zhing byang chub sems dpa' nye ba lags na/ su dang thos nas 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang / klog
275b4(mdo sde): ba dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan la yang rgya cher ston pa rnams lta ci smos te/ bcom ldan 'das sems de dag ring por mi thogs par de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba
275b5(mdo sde): 'di 'dra ba dag nyid gi snod du gyur pa 'chi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu su de bzhin gshegs pa'i
275b6(mdo sde): tshe ba 'di thos par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag sangs rgyas kyis yongs su bzung ba yin no// dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po bsnyen bkur byas pa
275b7(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag the tsom dang / yid gnyis dang nem nur mi skyed par bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ nub bdun du
275b8(mdo sde): yid la bya ba gzhan med cing / sems 'khrugs par bsam pa drag pos zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba 'di rjes su sems la zhag bdun 'das pa dang nges
276a1(mdo sde): mchod pa'i cho ga nye bar bzhag nas/ gtsang bas gos tsang ma dgos te/ dad pa mngon du byas la 'dug par byas te/ des de'i nub mo de bzhin gshegs
276a2(mdo sde): pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// de ste mi byed dam/ cho ga ma tshang bar byed na/ de sems tso cig par 'gyur zhing 'chi ba'i tshe yang de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mdun na bzhugs par
276a3(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba 'di bshad na/ sems can gang
276a4(mdo sde): la la mi dad par 'gyur bar mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba 'di bshad na sems can gang mi bzad
276a5(mdo sde): pa rtsub pa tsha ba'i bsam pas gnod sems kyi sems can bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / chos smra ba de la yang dgrar 'du shes par 'gyur ba dag yod de/ de dag de'i phyir
276a6(mdo sde): lus zhig nas sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// yang rigs kyi bu sems can gang rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba bshad pa 'di la dad pa rnyed
276a7(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba dang / chos smra ba de la yang dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes pa dang / ston par 'du shes skyed na/ rigs kyi bu sngon yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i
276a8(mdo sde): che ba 'di/ tshe rabs de dang de dag gzhan la yang rigs kyi bu de dag gis thos par nges par rig par bya'o/ de nas 'khor des 'das pa'i sems can kha cig 'di snyam du
276a9(mdo sde): sems te/ kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das ji skad du bshad pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sngon bdag cag gis kyang thos pa lta zhig snyam mo/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis//
276b1(mdo sde): de'i tshe ljags kyi dbang po byung te/ ljags kyi dbang pos zhal gyi dkyil 'khor mngon par dkab bo// zhal gi dkyil 'khor mngon par ka' nas/ dbu mngon par ka' bo//
276b2(mdo sde): dbu mngon par ka' nas/ skra mngon par ka' bo/ sku mngon par dkab nas/ seng ge'i khri mngon par bkab bo// seng ga'i khri mngon par bkab nas/ byang chub
276b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'khor mngon par bkab po// de nas nyan thos kyi 'khor/ de nas brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba'i 'khor/ de nas thams cad dang ldan
276b4(mdo sde): pa'i 'khor mngon par bka' bo/ de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par bkab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ljags kyi dbang po
276b5(mdo sde): phyir bsdus te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di 'dra ba'i ljags kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams brdzun gsung bar mi 'gyur gyis
276b6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu khyed rnams dad par gyi shig/ rigs kyi bu khyed rnams dad par gyis shig/ de ni khyed kyi yun rung po'i don dang phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ro// de nas
276b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong gyis mi skyed pa'i chos rnams la bzod pa 'thob po// srog chags brgyad
276b8(mdo sde): stong du ma ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med pa'i rnam par dag go// sngon sems ma bskyed pa'i sems can du mas ni byang chub du sems bskyed do//
277a1(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/
277a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' kun rdzob la mkhas pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs su'ang 'dogs la/ don dam par na gzugs su yang mi dmigs shing //
277a3(mdo sde): mngon par yang mi chags so// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes par yang 'dogs la/ don dam par na rnam par shes pa yang mi
277a4(mdo sde): dmigs shing / mngon par mi chags so// sa'i khams su'ang 'dogs la don dam par sa'i khams su yang mi dmigs shing mngon par mi chags so// de bzhin du chu'i
277a5(mdo sde): khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams su'ang 'dogs la/ don dam par na rnam par shes pa'i khams su 'ang mi
277a6(mdo sde): dmigs shing / mngon par mi chags so// mig gi skye mched du 'ang 'dogs la/ mi dmigs shing mngon par mi chags so// de bzhin du rna ba'i skye mched dang / sna'i
277a7(mdo sde): skye mched dang / lce'i skye mched dang / lus kyi skye mched dang / yid kyi skye mched du'ang 'dogs la don dam par na yid kyi skye mched du'ang mi dmigs shing mngon par mi
277a8(mdo sde): chags so// bdag tu 'ang 'dogs la don dam par na bdag du'ang mi dmigs shing mngon par mi chags so// sems can du'ang 'dogs la don dam par na sems can du 'a
277b1(mdo sde): mi dmigs shing mngon par mi chags so// srog dang gso ba dang / skyes bu dang gang zag dang / shed las skyes las stsogs pa dang / shed bur yang 'dogs la don dam par na/
277b2(mdo sde): srog dang gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes pa dang / shed bur yang mi dmigs shing mngon par mi chags so// 'jig rten du'ang 'dogs la/
277b3(mdo sde): don dam par na 'jig rten du'ang mi dmigs shing mngon par mi chags so/ 'jig rten gyi chos rnams su yang 'dogs la/ don dam par na 'jig rten gyi chos rnams
277b4(mdo sde): su chags so// byang chub du 'ang 'dogs la don dam par na/ byang chub dang byang chub par byed par yang mi dmigs shing / de'ang mngon par mi chags so// rigs kyi bu
277b5(mdo sde): de ltar bas na gang mi dang 'dogs pa dang tha snyad de ni kun rdzob ces bya ste/ kun rdzob kyi chos rnams la ni don dam pa med mod kyi/ kun rdzob kyi chos rnams med par yang
277b6(mdo sde): don dam pa bstan par mi nus so// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang gnas 'di dag la kun rdzob du mkhas shing don par ma yin pa de ni kun rdzob la mkhas pa
277b7(mdo sde): zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' kun rdzob la mkhas pa rnams yin no// / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byad
277b8(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' don dam pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ mi skye ba'i chos nyid dang ldan pa rnams yin/ mi 'gag pa'i chos nyid dang /
278a1(mdo sde): mi 'jigs pa'i chos nyid dang / mi len mi 'dor ba'i chos nyid dang / tshig gi spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa'i chos nyid dang / sgrar med pa'i chos
278a2(mdo sde): nyid dang / spros pa med pa'i chos nyid dang / brjod du med pa'i chos nyid dang / zhi ba'i chos nyid dang 'phags pa'i chos nyid dang ldan pa rnams yin no/ rigs kyi bu chos de
278a3(mdo sde): ci'i phyir zhe na/ don dam pa ni mi skye'o// mi 'gag go/ mi 'jig go mi len to// mi 'dor ro yi ge dag gis smras par bya ba ma yin no// ye shes rnams kyis mi brjod
278a4(mdo sde): do// spros pas ma rtogs so// rigs kyi bu don dam pa ni brjod du med pa ste zhi ba'o// rigs kyi bu don dam pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams skyes kyang rung ma skyes
278a5(mdo sde): kyang rung mi 'jig pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams skra dang kha bu bregs te/ gos ngur smrig gyon la yang dag par dad pas
278a6(mdo sde): khyim nas khyim med par rab du 'byung ngo // rab du byung nas kyang chos 'di kho na thob par bya ba'i phyir/ 'go 'am gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du/ brtson 'grus
278a7(mdo sde): brtsams shing gnas so// rigs kyi bu gal te/ don dam pa med du zin na/ tshangs par spyod pa don med par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'byung
278a8(mdo sde): ba yang don med par 'gyur ro/ gang gi phyir don dam pa yod pas na de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams don dam pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu
278b1(mdo sde): chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' don dam pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no// / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rten cing
278b2(mdo sde): 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ chos rnams gsog nyid du rab du shes/ gsob nyid dang / snying po med pa nyid dang /
278b3(mdo sde): mig yor lta bu nyid dang / gzugs snyan lta bu nyid dang / brag cha lta bu nyid dang / sgyu ma lta bu nyid dang / mi gnas pa nyid dang / g.yo ba nyid dang / rten cing 'brel
278b4(mdo sde): bar 'byung ba nyid du yang rab du shes so// de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ chos 'di dag ni 'di ltar gsog 'di ltar gsob/ 'di ltar snying po med pa/ 'di ltar
278b5(mdo sde): mig g.yor lta bu/ 'di ltar gzugs brnyan lta bu/ 'di ltar brag cha lta bu/ 'di ltar sgyu ma lta bu 'di ltar mi gnas pa/ 'di ltar g.yo ba/ 'di ltar rten cing
278b6(mdo sde): 'brel bar 'byung yin yang / 'di dag skye bar yang snang ngo / gnas pa dang 'jig par yang snang snyam mo// de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ yang chos 'di rnams skye ba'i rkyen
278b7(mdo sde): ni gang rnams yin/ chos 'di rnams 'gag pa'i rkyen ni gang rnams yin snyam mo/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis chos 'di dag skye ste/ ma rig pa
278b8(mdo sde): las byung ba'o// mi rig pa sngon du 'gro ba'o// ma rig pa la rten pa'o// ma rig pa la brten nas/ 'du byed rnams 'byung ba yin/ 'du byed rnams la rten nas/ rnam
279a1(mdo sde): #par shes pa la snang bar 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa yod na ming dang gzugs su 'dogs par 'gyur ro// ming dang gzugs su brtags
279a2(mdo sde): na/ skye mched drug rnams su 'dogs par 'gyur ro// skye mched rnams yod na reg par 'gyur ro// reg pa yod na tshor ba snang bar 'gyur ro// tshor ba'i rgyus byis pa rnam
279a3(mdo sde): sred pas nyen par 'gyur ro// sred pas nyen na len pa 'dzin to// len pa bzung na srid pa'i mtshan nas sbyor bar 'gyur ro// srid pa yod na skye bar 'gyur ro// skye ba
279a4(mdo sde): yong rgyu bar 'gyur ro// skye bu gang zag rga ba'i chos can na 'chi bar 'gyur ro// 'chi ba la gnas pa'i mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / yi mug pa dang 'khrugs pa rnam
279a5(mdo sde): 'byung te/ 'di ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' shig 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ de lta bas na mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gyis ma rig pa spang bar nan tan bya'o//
279a6(mdo sde): ma rig pa gzhig pa dang ma rig pa rtsa ba nas dbyung ba dang ma rig pa dgag pa'i phyir nan tan bya'o// ma rig pa 'gags pas/ ma rig pa'i rkyen las skyes pa ma rig pa las
279a7(mdo sde): byung ba ma rig pa sngon du 'gro ba ma rig pa la rten pa'i chos 'di dag 'gag par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ srog gi dbang po 'gags nas/ dbang po lhag ma rnam
279a8(mdo sde): kyang 'gag par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du ma rig pa 'gags na/ mi shes pa la rten pa'i chos 'di dag kyang 'gags par 'gyur ro// mi shes pa spangs pas nyon mongs pa
279b1(mdo sde): rnams kyang mi 'byung ngo // 'gro ba rnams kyang mi 'byung ngo / 'khor ba'i rgyun rnams kyang 'gags par 'gyur ro// mya ngan las 'das pa dang yang nye bar 'gyur ro// rigs
279b2(mdo sde): kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sem
279b3(mdo sde): dpa' bdag shes pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar ci bdag bram ze'i rigs sam/ 'on te khre
279b4(mdo sde): rgyal rigs sam/ 'on te khyim bdag gi rigs sam/ ci mtho zhing phyug po 'am/ 'on te dma' zhing dbul ba'i rigs su skyes sam/ gang du skyes snyam du yongs su rtog
279b5(mdo sde): ste/ de gal te rigs mtho zhing / phyug par skyes na'ang de la rigs kyis dregs par mi byed do// 'on te dma' zhing dbul ba'i rigs su skyes par gyur na yang bdag 'di
279b6(mdo sde): lta bu'i rigs su skyes pa las/ bdag gis sngon las 'dren par byas so zhes de snyam du sems bskyed cing / de rgya des skyo ba mang ba yin te/ skyo ba mang bar gyur nas rab
279b7(mdo sde): du 'byung ngo // rab tu byung nas baidag ci'i phyir rab tu byung zhes rab tu rtog te/ bdag ni rang rgal nas gzhan dag kyang bsgrol bar bya/ rang dkrol nas gzhan dag kyang dgrol
279b8(mdo sde): bar bya'o zhes rab tu byung ngo snyam nas de de'i phyir/ le lo la mi rten cing snyom las mi byed de/ de bdag rab tu byung nas/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos gang dang gang nub cing yong
280a1(mdo sde): su zad de/ kun byang bar gyur ces rab du rtogs te/ de sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos zhig spangs par gyur na/ de la dga' ba dang / dad pa dang rangs/
280a2(mdo sde): pa bskyed do/ gang me spangs pa de dag ni spang ba'i rtsol zhing 'bad do// de bdag rab tu byung nas dge ba'i chos gang 'phel ba dang rgyas pa dang / rgya cher gyur ces de snyam du yod/
280a3(mdo sde): su rtog ste/ de'i dag pa'i chos gang dag 'phel ba dang rgyas pa dang / rgya cher gyur pa de la dga' ba dang / dad pa dang rangs pa bskyed do// gang de ltar ma gyur pa de dag 'phel
280a4(mdo sde): ba dang / rgyas pa dang rgya cher bya ba'i phyir rtsol zhing 'bad do// de bla ma la rten na dge ba'i chos rnams ni 'phel bar 'gyur/ sdig pa rnams ni 'grib par 'gyur ro snyam du
280a5(mdo sde): yongs su rtog ste/ de rgyu de dang rkyen de dang / zhig des mkhan po nyung du thos pa dang / mang du thos pa'am/ shes pa 'am mi shes pa 'am/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa 'am/
280a6(mdo sde): tshul khrims 'chal ba yang rung ste/ de la ston pa'i 'du shes skyed do/ de ji ltar ston pa la dga' zhing dad pa nye bar gnas pa de bzhin du mkhan po la'ang byed do// de slob
280a7(mdo sde): dpon rnams la rim 'gro yod cing rjes yod pa yin te/ de 'di ltar slob dpon rnams la brtan na bdag gi byang chub kyi phyogs yongasu ma rdzogs par 'gyur nyon mongs pa
280a8(mdo sde): ma spangs pa rnams ni/ yongs su spangs par 'gyur ro snyam du yongs su rtog ste/ de de dag la mkhan por 'du shes skyed cing / dga' ba dang dad pa dang rangs pa thob pa dag/
280b1(mdo sde): / dge ba'i chos rnams la de dag dang / 'thun par spyod pa yin/ mi dge ba'i chos rnams la mi mthun par spyod pa yin te/ de 'di snyam du bdag gi ston pa gang zhes yongs su
280b2(mdo sde): rtog cing / de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi ston pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad thugs su chud pa/ 'jig rten thams cad la thugs rtse ba thugs chen po dang ldan pa/
280b3(mdo sde): sbyin pa'i gnas chen po ste/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi ston pa'o snyam ste/ de rgyu de dang rkyen de dang gzhi des/ dga' ba dang dad pa dang / rangs
280b4(mdo sde): bskyed do// de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi ston pa bcom ldan 'das de yin pa ni bdag gis rnyed par legs par rnyed do// bcom ldan 'das des bslab pa'i lam
280b5(mdo sde): gang bcas pa de las kyang bdag gis srog gi phyir 'ang 'da' bar mi bya ste/ de ltar bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de la rim gro rjes su 'brang bar byas par 'gyur ro snyam mo// /
280b6(mdo sde): de 'di snyam du bdag su'i bsod snyoms la yongs su spyod ces sems cing de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ni bram ze dang rgyal rigs dang grong ba dang / yul mi rnams kyis
280b7(mdo sde): bsod snyoms la yongs su spyod kyis bdag gis ci nas kyang de dag gi bsod snyoms 'bras bu yod pa dang / don che ba dang mthu che ba dang / bdag gis kyang yongs su gyis bsod/
280b8(mdo sde): snyoms 'bras bu yod par yongs su spyod pa de ltar bya'o snyam mo// de 'di snyam du bram ze dang rgyal rigs dang grong ba dang / yul gyi mi 'di dag 'du shes ci dang / ldan zhing /
281a1(mdo sde): bdag la bsod snyoms gtong snyam zhing de 'di ltar rjes su sems te/ bram ze dang rgyal rigs dang grong rdal gyi mi dang / yul gyi mi 'di dag ni
281a2(mdo sde): bdag la dge sbyong gi 'du shes dang ldan/ dge slong gi 'du shes dang ldan/ sbyin pa'i gnas kyi 'du shes dang ldan zhing bdag la bsod snyoms sbyin par byed kyis/ ci nas
281a3(mdo sde): kyang bdag gis dge slong gi yon tan yang dag par blangs te/ gnas par bya ba dang / dge slong gyi yon tan dang sbyin pa'i gnas kyi yon tan rnams yang bar blangs te gnas
281a4(mdo sde): par bya ba de ltar spyod do snyam mo// de 'di snyam du bdag gis thogs ma dang tha ma med pa'i skye ba'i 'khor ba las rgal bar gyur ta ma zhes ses shing / de 'di snyam du bdag
281a5(mdo sde): gis dge slong gi tshul thob pa 'di ni rgal ba dang po'o// bdag dge slong gi yon tan dang ldan pa'i rgal ba gnyis pa'o// bdag le lo med cing chos nyid thob pa'i phyir/
281a6(mdo sde): ci nas kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i skye ba'i 'khor ba las rgal bar gyur pa de ltar brtson 'grus brtsams te/ gnas par bya'o snyam du sems te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar
281a7(mdo sde): yongs su rtog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag shes pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bdag shes pa rnams yin no// /
281a8(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten shes pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ khengs pa dag la dma' ba rnams yin/
281b1(mdo sde): nga rgyal can dag la nga rgyal med pa rnams yin/ gya gyu can dag la drang po rnams yin// rdzun du smra ba dag la bden par smra ba rnams yin/ kha mi mkhas pa la
281b2(mdo sde): snyan par smra ba rnams yin/ rtsu ba pa dag la 'jam pa rnams yin khro ba dag bzod pa mang ba rnams yin/ gtum pa dag la byams pa'i bdag nyid can rnams yin/ sdug
281b3(mdo sde): bsngal ba dag la snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams yin/ ser sna can dag la bgo bsha' byed pa'i ngang tshul can rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan
281b4(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten shes pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa
281b5(mdo sde): dag du skye'o// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ skyon med pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang sra sre med pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pas/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa rnams
281b6(mdo sde): yin/ sems can thams cad la sbyor ba mnyam pas sems snyoms pa rnams yin/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mi chung bas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po dang ldan pa rnams yin/ gos
281b7(mdo sde): med pas rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang grags pa dang sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa sems yongs su spangs pa rnams yin/ nem nur med pa'i sems dang ldan pas
281b8(mdo sde): dad pa rnams yin/ sems le lo med pa dang ldan pas/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams yin/ sems mi g.yengs pa dang ldan pas/ bsam gtan phun sum tshogs
282a1(mdo sde): @#pa rnams yin/ shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can ma yin pas mang du thos pa rnams yin/ shes rab rno bas dbang po mi rdul ba rnams yin/
282a2(mdo sde): gnod sems med pa'i sems dang ldan pas/ byams pa'i bdag nyid can rnams yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/
282a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ci chos de dag tshogs pas skye bar 'gyur ram/ 'on te la la ma tshang yang skye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu chos
282a4(mdo sde): tshogs pa de dag las gang gi chos gcig cig skyon med cing ma 'dres la sra sre med de yongs su dag cing yongs su byang bar yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de la/ rigs kyi
282a5(mdo sde): bu chos de dag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bas/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir chos de dag tshogs pas skye'o// ma tshogs pas ni ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu
282a6(mdo sde): po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag du skye'o// // rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems
282a7(mdo sde): dpa' rnams mngal gyi dri mas ma gos par skye'o// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs med pa dang / mchod rten zhig pa 'chos pa dang /
282a8(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dag la spos kyi byug pa 'bul ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs dag la khrus kyi spos chu 'bul ba dang / de bzhin
282b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i mchod rten dag la phyag dar dang skyang nul bya ba 'bul ba dang / pha ma dag la lus kyi rim 'gro byed pa dang / mkhan po dang slob dpon dag la
282b2(mdo sde): lus kyi rim gro byed pa dang / tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la lus kyi rim gro byed cing de yang zang zing med pa'i sems kyis te/ zang zing dang bcas
282b3(mdo sde): pas ma yin la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad mngal gyi dri mas ma gos par skye bar gyur cig ces yongs su sngo
282b4(mdo sde): zhing / de yang bsam pa thag pa nas sems pa ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' mngal gyi dri mas ma gos par skye'o// /
282b5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byang ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ nye bar len pa med pa
282b6(mdo sde): rnams yin/ kharda 'du 'dzi med par spyod pa rnams yin/ yul la rgyab kyis phyogs pa rnams yin/ yul la sred pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ yul gyi nyes
282b7(mdo sde): bas mi gos pa rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshul khrims bcas pa la rim gro byed cing / brtson pa dang shin tu bslab pa rnams yin/ gos dang bsod
282b8(mdo sde): snyoms dang / mal cha ngan ngon dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad ngan ngon dag gis chog shes pa rnams yin/ lhung bzed dang yo byad stsogs pa dang / rtag pa
283a1(mdo sde): 'jig pa'i yid dang ldan zhing rnams las skyob rnams yin/ dben pa la dga' zhing rtag tu sgom pa la brtson pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi
283a2(mdo sde): bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byang ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'
283a3(mdo sde): 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gsags kyi rnyed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ gzhog slongs kyi rnyed pa dang bral
283a4(mdo sde): ba rnams yin/ thob kyis 'jal ba'i rnyed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ mi rigs par btsal ba'i rnyed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ chos ma yin pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba rnam
283a5(mdo sde): yin/ yongs su ma dag pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ rnyed pa la zhen pa med pa rnams yin/ rnyed pa la chags pa med pa rnams yin/ yongs su yi 'chad
283a6(mdo sde): pa'i rang bzhin med pa rnams yin/ chos kyi rnyed pas chog shes pa rnams yino// rigs kyi bu ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gsag
283a7(mdo sde): gi rnyed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnyed pa'i rgyu rnyed pa'i phyir lus kyis tshul 'chos par mi byed/ ngag gis tshul 'chos
283a8(mdo sde): bar mi byed/ sems kyi tshul 'chos par mi byed do// ci ltar na lus kyi tshul 'chos pa mi byed pa yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin pa byed pa dang /
283b1(mdo sde): sbyin pa'i bdag po mthong na spyod lam mi 'chos so// ji ltar na spyod lam mi 'chos zhe na/ gnya' shing gang tsam du lta ba dang / skyo bar lta ba dang / sgrib pa med par lta/
283b2(mdo sde): khas gom pa bags kyis ngal nas dal nas 'dor zhing 'degs pa ma yin te/ de ltar na lus kyis tshul 'chos par mi byed do/ ci ltar na ngag gis tshul 'chos
283b3(mdo sde): bar mi byed ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni rnyed pa'i rgyu rnyed pa'i phyir bcom bsnyungs shi smra ba ma yin 'jams por smra ba yin/ dga' bar smra ba ma yin//
283b4(mdo sde): rjes su 'brang ba'i tshig brjod pa ma yin/ te/ de ltar ngag gis tshul 'chos par mi byed do// ci ltar na sems kyis tshul 'chos pa mi byed ce na/ byang chub sems dang
283b5(mdo sde): ni sbyin pa 'am/ sbyin pa'i bdag pos rnyes pas bstabs pa na/ tshig gis 'dod pa chung bar ston cing / sems kyis 'dod pa skyed pa ma yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta
283b6(mdo sde): ste/ tshig gis 'dod pa chung la/ sems kyis rnyed pa 'dod pa 'di ni nang gi gdung ba yin te/ de ltar na sems kyis tshul 'chos pa mi byed/ de ltar na byang chub sems
283b7(mdo sde): dpa' tshul 'chos pa dang kha gsags kyi rnyed pa dang bral ba yin no/ ci ltar na gzhog slongs kyi rnyed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin pa byed pa 'am/
283b8(mdo sde): sbyin bdag mthong na bdag gis phongs so bdag lhung bzed gyis phongs so// bdag na ba'i gsos sman gyis phongs so zhes gzhog slongs mi byed cing / sbyin pa byed pa'i/
284a1(mdo sde): sbyin pa'i bdag po la mi slong zhing tshig du mi brjod do/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzhog slongs kyi rnyed pa dang bral ba yin no// ji ltar
284a2(mdo sde): na thob kyis 'jal ba'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin pa byed pa dang / sbyin bdag mthong na/ bdag sbyin pa'i bdag po zhig gis dngos po che
284a3(mdo sde): ge mo zhig byin te/ de bdag gos kyang phan pa che ge mo zhag byas so// des kyang bdag la 'di ni tshul khrims dang ldan par rig ste/ mang du thos pa'o// 'dod pa chung ba'o zhes
284a4(mdo sde): 'di dang 'di byin no// bdag gis kyang snying rje'i sems nye bar bzhag ste blangs so zhes de skad kyi tshig mi brjod do// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thob kyis 'jal ba'i rnyed pa
284a5(mdo sde): dang bral ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi rigs par btsal ba'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni lus la rma byang ba dang
284a6(mdo sde): sems la rma byung bar rnyed pa tshol ba ma yin no// de la lus kyi rma ni 'di lta ste/ rnyed pa'i rgyu rnyed pa'i phyir rgyug pa dang / kun tu rgyug pa dang / 'chal pa'i tshul khrims
284a7(mdo sde): la spyod pa'o// sems kyi rma ni 'di lta ste/ rnyed pa la smon pa dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa gzhan gyis rnyed pa dag la gnod sems mang ba ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems
284a8(mdo sde): dpa' mi rigs par btsal ba'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin no// ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos ma yin pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang
284b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' srang la gyu med pa dang gcal ba la rgyu med pa dang / yid brtan pa la gnod par byed pa med pa dang / g.yos rnyed pa mi sgrub pa te/ de lta na byang chub sems
284b2(mdo sde): dpa' chos ma yin pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin no/ ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yongs su ma dag pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
284b3(mdo sde): gang mchod rten gyi dang 'dres pa'am/ chos kyi gang 'dres pa'am/ dge 'dun gyi dang 'dres pa'am/ ma byin pa'am ma gnang ba de dag mi len cing bdag gir mi byed
284b4(mdo sde): chags pa'i sems mi skyed do/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yongs su ma dag pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin no// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnyed pa la zhen pa
284b5(mdo sde): med pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnyed pa rnyed kyang / bdag gir mi med nar du mi ci/ tshags su mi byed cing / dus dus su dge slong dang / bram
284b6(mdo sde): ze dang pha ma dang mdzu bo dang / blon po dang gnyen brnyas dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams dag la gtong zhing dus dus su bdag yongs su spyod pa la yongs su spyod pa'i tshe/ chag
284b7(mdo sde): pa med pa dang / zhen pa med par yongs su spyod do// rnyed pa ma rnyed na yang skyo ba'i sems mi skyed cing yongs su yi mi 'chad de/ sbyin pa byed pa dang / sbyin bdag rnam
284b8(mdo sde): la ma dad par mi 'dzin pa yin te/ de chos dang 'thun par rnyed pa dge 'dun gyir gtogs de bzhin gshegs pas bsngags pa byang chub sems dpa' sa ma smad pa/
285a1(mdo sde): lhas bstod pa tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pas mi dbye bas chog shes pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sem/
285a2(mdo sde): dpa' 'tshe ba yongs su dag pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' yid yongs su mi skyo ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di
285a3(mdo sde): lta ste/ sems can gyi rgyu sems can gyi phyir 'khor ba na gnas pas yongs su mi skyo'o// sems can gyi rgyu sems can gyi phyir/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi yongasu
285a4(mdo sde): mi skyo'o// sems can gyi don rnams la yongs su mi skyo'o// sems can gyi dgos pa rnams la yongasu mi skye'o// sems can gyi bya ba rnams la yongs su mi skyo'o//
285a5(mdo sde): gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams la lam yongs su mi skyo'o// de dag la ma dad pa yang mi byed do/ byang chub sems kyi phyogs kyi chos yongs su bsdu bas kyang
285a6(mdo sde): yongs su mi skye'o// byang chub kyi phyogs yongs su rdzogs par bya bas kyang yongs su mi skye'o// bsam pa mya ngan las 'das par gyur kyang mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon
285a7(mdo sde): du mi lta'i/ byang chub la gzhol byang chub la 'bab/ byang chub la bab pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' yid yongasu
285a8(mdo sde): mi skyo ba rnams yin no// // rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bka' bzhin du byed pa rnams yin no// bcu gang
285b1(mdo sde): zhe na 'di lta ste/ bag med pa thams cad dang bral zhing / bag yod par spyod pa rnams yin/ lus kyis shin tu bsdams shing / lus kyi ngan du spyod pa pa mi spyod pa rnams yin/
285b2(mdo sde): ngag gis shin tu bsdams shing / ngag gi ngan du spyad pa mi spyod pa rnams yin/ yid kyis shin tu bsdams shing / yid kyi ngan du spyang pa mi spyod pa rnams yin/ 'jig rten pa
285b3(mdo sde): rol gis 'jigs shing / mi dge ba'i chos thams cad rnam par spangs pa rnams yin/ rigs par smra zhing mi rigs pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ chos su smra
285b4(mdo sde): zhing chos ma yin pa la smod pa rnams yin/ smad pa'i lam rnam par spangs shing dge ba'i las kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la sun
285b5(mdo sde): 'byin cing / nyon mongs pa dri nga ba'i yul thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid yongs su skyong zhing / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams
285b6(mdo sde): las srung ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dka' bzhin du byed pa rnams
285b7(mdo sde): yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bzhin 'dzub zhim khro gnyer med pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ dang
285b8(mdo sde): kho shin tu dang ba rnams yin/ dbang po yongs su dag pa rnams yin/ dbang po gsal ba rnams yin/ dbang po dri ma med pa rnams yin/ dbang po yongs su
286a1(mdo sde): byang ba rnams yin/ gnod sems dang bral ba rnams yin/ bag la nyal ba dang bral ba rnams yin/ kun nas ldang ba dang bral ba rnams yin/
286a2(mdo sde): tha ba dang mdud par 'dzin pa dang / bral ba rnams yin/ khong khro ba dang bral ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcwo brgyad de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'
286a3(mdo sde): 'dzum zhing khro gnyer med pa rnams yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don
286a4(mdo sde): ci lta ba lags pa bdag gis 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dbang po yongs su dag pas na de bzhin 'dzum pa lags/ nyon mongs pa rnams dang bral bas/
286a5(mdo sde): na khro gnyer ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dbang
286a6(mdo sde): po yongs su dag pas na/ bzhin 'dzum pa yin/ nyon mongs pa rnams dang bral bas nas khro gnyer med pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang skem
286a7(mdo sde): dpa' mang du thos pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 'khor ba na 'dod chags kyi mes rab tu 'bar ba'o zhes yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du rab tu
286a8(mdo sde): shes so// zhe sdang gi mes rab du 'bar ba'o zhes yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// gti mug gi mes rab du dkrugs pa'o zhes yang dag pa
286b1(mdo sde): lta ba bzhin du rab du shes so// 'du byas ni mi rtag pa'o zhes yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'du byed rnams ni sdug bsngal ba'o zhes yang dag pa
286b2(mdo sde): ci lta ba bzhin du rab du shes so// 'jig rten ni stong pa'o zhes yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o zhes yang dag pa ci lta ba
286b3(mdo sde): bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'jig rten na spros pa la mngon par dga' ba'o zhes yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du rab du shes so// chos thams cad ni rkyen las byung ba'o//
286b4(mdo sde): zhes bya bar yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du rab du shes so// mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// de yang thos pa dang
286b5(mdo sde): bsam pa dang sgom pas shes kyi sgrar brjod pa tsam gyis ma yin te/ de ltar shes nas kyang snying rje ba'i sems brtan pa nye bar bzhag ste/ sems can rnams kyi/
286b6(mdo sde): don du rtsol zhing 'bad la brtson 'grus rtsom mo// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' mang du thos pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi
286b7(mdo sde): bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe/ lnga rgya ba tha
286b8(mdo sde): ma la dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig cing / brtan pa 'khrug par 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams lam ngan par zhugs pa dang / ye shes kyi sgron ma mya ngan las
287a1(mdo sde): 'das te/ ston pa med pa'i tshe/ mdo sde rgya chen po don che zhing / mthu che ba dam pa'i chos thams cad kyi ma mo dang 'dra ba dag 'dzin cing klog
287a2(mdo sde): pa/ kha ton du byed kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan la yang brjod cing kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan la yang brjod cing ston la yang dag par ston cing gsal bar
287a3(mdo sde): byed pa dang / de la zhugs pa'i gang zag rnams la dga' ba dang dad pa dang / rangs par byed cing de dag la phan 'dogs pa dang / zang zing med pa'i sems kyis dam pa'i
287a4(mdo sde): chos nyan pa dang / chos smra ba'i gang zag rnams la ston par 'du shes skyed pa dang dam pa'i chos la bdud rtsir 'du shes skyed pa dang / bcud kyis len du 'du shes skyed pa
287a5(mdo sde): dang / rtsi'i 'du shes skyed pa dang / lus dang srog la mi lta bar dam pa'i chos yongs su tshol ba dang / btsal nas kyang nan tan gyis grub pa'o// rigs kyi bu chos
287a6(mdo sde): bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa rnams yin no// // rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi
287a7(mdo sde): rgyal po'i sras rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ lus mtshan gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin/ lus dpe byad bzang po'i me tog rgyas pa rnams yin//
287a8(mdo sde): dbang po rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan zhing shin tu yongs su skyong ba rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i gnas la rjes su sten pa rnams yin/
287b1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhud pa'i lam rjes su thob par byed pa rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhud pa'i lam rjes su thob par byed pa rnams yin/ de bzhin
287b2(mdo sde): gshegs pas thugs su chud par byed pa rnams yin no// 'jig rten sdug bsngal ba yongs su skyong ba rnams yin/ 'phags pa'i tshul shin tu bslabs pa rnams yin/
287b3(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i gnas rnams la shin tu mthar phyin pa rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi pho brang na gnas pa rnams yin te/ rigs
287b4(mdo sde): kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal po'i sras rnams yin no// // rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' brgya byin
287b5(mdo sde): dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong bas bsdu ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ byang chub las mi ldog pa rnams yin/ bdud thams cad kyis mi dgul
287b6(mdo sde): ba rnams yin/ sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad las mi g.yo ba rnams yin/ chos thams cad kyi tshul la zhugs pa rnams yin/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa
287b7(mdo sde): nyid khong du chud ba rnams yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams yin shin tu rtogs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa rnams yin/ nyan thos dang rang
287b8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad dang / thun mong ma yin pa rnams yin/ 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin/ mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa thob pa/
288a1(mdo sde): rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong bas bsdu ba/
288a2(mdo sde): rnams yin no// / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba shes pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/
288a3(mdo sde): sems can 'dod chags kyi bsam pa can yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du rab du shes so// zhe sdang gi bsam pa can dang / gti mug gi bsam pa can dang / dman
288a4(mdo sde): pa'i bsam pa can dang / bar ma'i bsam pa can dang / zhen pa'i bsam pa can dang / dge ba'i bsam pa can dang / brtan pa'i bsam pa can dang / yun ring po'i
288a5(mdo sde): bsam pa can dang / sems can gtum pa'i bsam pa can kyang / yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du rab du shes shing / de yang sems cig la ci ltar shes pa bzhin
288a6(mdo sde): du/ sems can gyi khams kun yang yang dag pa lta ba bzhin du rab du shes so// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'
288a7(mdo sde): bsam pa dang brag la nyal ba shes pa rnams yin no// / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems can yongs su smin par
288a8(mdo sde): bya ba'i cho ga shes pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi gzug
288b1(mdo sde): nye bar ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems
288b2(mdo sde): can rnams la/ rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs/ nyan thos kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ nyan thos kyi gzugs/ brgya byin kyi gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i
288b3(mdo sde): sems can rnams la/ brgya byin gyi gzugs/ bdud kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la bdud kyis gzugs/ tshangs pa'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems
288b4(mdo sde): can rnams la/ tshangs pa'i gzugs/ bram zes 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ bram ze'i gzugs/ rgyal rigs kyi gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can
288b5(mdo sde): rnams la/ rgyal rigs kyi gzugs/ khyim bdag gis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ khyim bdag gis gzugs nye bar ston te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na
288b6(mdo sde): rnam pa gang dang gang gis sems can rnams 'dul bar gyur pa'i rnam pa de dang de byang chub sems dpa' rnams nye bar ston to// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang
288b7(mdo sde): ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i cho ga shes pa rnams yin no// // rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems
288b8(mdo sde): dpa' nges pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ drang ba rnams yin/ 'jam pa rnams yin/ gya gyu med pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams yin gnod sems/
289a1(mdo sde): med pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams yin/ dri ma med pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams yin/ rnam par dag ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams yin//
289a2(mdo sde): me brlang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams yin/ rtsub pa sngangs pa rnams bzod pa mang ba rnams yin/ nges pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ rigs kyi bu chos
289a3(mdo sde): bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' nges pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' 'grogs na bde ba rnams
289a4(mdo sde): yin no/ bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ lta ba yongs su dag pas lta ba yongs su phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pas tshul khrims
289a5(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ cho ga yongs su dag pa rnams yin/ tshul khrims dang mthun pa'i spyod yul du spyod pa rnams yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa
289a6(mdo sde): spyod pa rnams yin/ khong yangs pa rnams yin te/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la mchod pa rnams yin/ bskal ba mnyam pa rnams yin/ lam cig du zhugs pa
289a7(mdo sde): rnams yin/ ston pa med pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' 'grogs na bde ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang
289a8(mdo sde): ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba'i dngos po la mkhas pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ phan pa'i sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud do// bde ba'i
289b1(mdo sde): sbyin pa dang / mi zad pa'i sbyin pa dang / phan par smra ba dang / don du smra ba dang / chos su smras pa dang / rigs par smra ba dang / don bya ba dang / zang zing gyis don 'thun
289b2(mdo sde): pa dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyis don 'thun pas sems can rnams sdod do// rigs kyi bu phan pa'i sprin pa ni gang chos sbyin pa'o// bde ba'i sbyin pa ni/ gang zang
289b3(mdo sde): zing gi sbyin pa'o// mi zad pa'i sbyin pa ni gang lam gi lung sbyin po'o// phan par smra ba'i sbyin pa ni gang dge ba'i rtsa ba po stsags pa'o/ don du smra ba ni gang yang dag
289b4(mdo sde): pa'i bstan pa'o// chos su smra ba ni/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa dang / 'thun par chos bstan pa'o// rigs par smra ba ni/ gang don yang dag pa chud mi
289b5(mdo sde): smyon pa'o// don bya ba na gang mi dge ba'i gnas nas bslangs te/ dge ba'i gnas su gzhog pa'o// zang zing gis don 'thun pa na bdag bza' ba dang / bca'
289b6(mdo sde): ba dang / bldag pa dang / btung ba dang bzhi pa pa dang / gos las stsogs pa thun mong du yongs su spyod pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyis don 'thun pa ni//
289b7(mdo sde): gang gser dang nor bu dang / mu tig dang bI dAr dang dung dang man shel dang byi ra dang / sa lo sbram dang dngul dang rta dang glang po che dang / bzhon pa 'thun mong du sbed pa yin no//
289b8(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba'i dngos po la mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dang
290a1(mdo sde): tshul du shes pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ spyod lam rab du zhi ba rnams yin/ spyod lam rgyu med pa rnams yin/ spyod lam
290a2(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa rnams yin/ blta na dag pa rnams yin/ blta na 'jam pa rnams yin/ blta na chog mi shes pa rnams yin/ blta na yid du 'ong ba rnams yin/
290a3(mdo sde): blta na sems can thams cad khong khro ba med par 'gyur ba rnams yin/ blta na sems can thams cad sems tshim par 'gyur ba rnams// blta na sems can tham
290a4(mdo sde): cad kyi sems dang bar 'gyur ba rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' tshul du shis pa rnams yin no// rigs
290a5(mdo sde): kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' gnas gca' ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pa
290a6(mdo sde): dag las yongs su srung ba rnams yin/ 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa rnams yin/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las sgrol ba rnams yin/ mgon med pa rnams la gnyen du
290a7(mdo sde): gyur pa rnams yin/ nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis rnar bar gyur pa la sman par gyur pa rnams yin te/ rten med pa dag la rten rnams yin/ gnas med pa dag la gnas
290a8(mdo sde): rnams yin/ skyabs med pa dag la skyabs rnams yin/ gling med pa dag la grong rnams yin/ dpung gnyen med pa dag la dpung gnyen yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos
290b1(mdo sde): bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' gnas bca' ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rtsi'i rgyal po'i shing lta bu rnams
290b2(mdo sde): yin no// bcu gang zhe na rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rtsi'i rgyal po'i shing chen po blta na bzang ba zhes bya ba de ni/ brtsa bas kyang sems can nad pa rnams nye bar 'tsho'o// /
290b3(mdo sde): sdong po dang yul ga rnams dang / lo ma rnams dang / me tog rnams dang / 'bras bu rnams dang / mthong ba dang / bsnams pa dang / myangs pa dang / reg pas kyang nye bar 'tsho ba yin
290b4(mdo sde): te/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' yang sems dang bskyod pa nas bzung te/ nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kyi nad kyis nad par gyur pa'i sems can sbyin pas
290b5(mdo sde): kyang nye bar 'tsho ba yin/ tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang shes rab dang / mthong ba dang thos pa dang / yon tan gi ro myangs pa dang /
290b6(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur bya bas kyang nye bar 'tshe ba yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rtsi'i rgyal po'i shing chen po lta bu rnams yin no//
290b7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams bya ba la brtson pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ dkon mchog gsum la ci nas
290b8(mdo sde): su bya ba byed pa dang / sems can nad pa rnams la rtsi sbyor ba dang / sems can bkres pa dang / skom pas nyen pa rnams la zas dang skom gyi sbyin pa dang / rlung dang lhags pa
291a1(mdo sde): dang nyi mas nyen pa'i sems can rnams la dga' ba sbyin pa dang / mkhan po dang slob dpon rnams la gus pa'i rim gro byed pa dang / tshangs pa mtshungs
291a2(mdo sde): par spyod pa rnams la gus par smra phyag 'tshal ldang / thal mo sbar zhing 'dud par byed pa dang / kun dga' dang / gtsug lag khang dang / bskyed mos bya ba dang / dus dus
291a3(mdo sde): su nor dang / 'bru dang mdzod dang bang ba gtong ba dang / bran po dang bran mo dang / las mi dang zho shas 'tsho ba la bgo bshas yongs su skyong ba dang / dus dus su tshul khrim
291a4(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i dge slong dang / bram ze la snyen bkur byed pa'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams bya ba la brtson pa rnams/
291a5(mdo sde): yin no// // rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi
291a6(mdo sde): zhing gcig nas kyang ga yol/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la yongs su 'dri'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing cig nas mi g.yo la sangs rgyas
291a7(mdo sde): kyi zhing du mar yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la chos nyan to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing cig nas kyang mi g.yo la sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnam/
291a8(mdo sde): kha mchod cing bsnyen bkur byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi l+yA/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang byang chub sems dpa' yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
291b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yol/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang byang chub sems dpa' mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba rnams la rim gror byed/ bkur/
291b2(mdo sde): stir byed/ sti stang byed mchod pa byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing cig nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sas rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba ston to// sangs
291b3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing cig nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang bdag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang bar snang ngo / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi gam/
291b4(mdo sde): la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing cig nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang yongs su mya
291b5(mdo sde): ngan las 'das par snang ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang sems can 'dul ba ci rnyed kyi sprul pa 'gyed pa'i tshe//
291b6(mdo sde): rtog pa med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar gang lta bur
291b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa 'gyed na mi rtog pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir dpe nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/
291b8(mdo sde): dper na/ nyi ma dang zla ba ni gling bzhi snang bar byed cing / sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa yin kyang nyi ma dang zla ba ni bdag cag gis snang bar bya'o// bdag cag
292a1(mdo sde): ni sems can la phan 'dogs pa'o zhes mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon gis las rnam par smin par mngon par 'du byed pas/ zla ba dang nyi ma gnyis/
292a2(mdo sde): kyi bya ba de lta bu 'byung ngo // rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang / sprul pa 'gyed ni mi rtog ste/ sgom pa 'am/ mngon par 'du bye ba mi byed do// de ci'i
292a3(mdo sde): phyir zhe na/ de ni sngon gyi las par smin pas mngon par 'du bya ba rnams mngon par grub pa'i phyir te/ sngon byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i
292a4(mdo sde): tshe/ ci nas kyang rnam par rtog pa med par yang sprul pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar smon lam btab de lta de ltar mngon par 'du byas pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu chos
292a5(mdo sde): bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa la mkhas pa rnams yino// // rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' myur du bla na med pa yang dag
292a6(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa shin tu grub pas/ sbyin pa shin tu phun sum tshogs pa
292a7(mdo sde): rnams yin/ tshul khrims shin tu grub cing / tshul khrims kyi phung po skyon med pa dang ma 'dres pa dang / sa sre med pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams
292a8(mdo sde): cad las 'das pa yongs su dag pa yongs su byang ba dang ldan pas/ tshul khrims shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ bzod pa shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang /
292b1(mdo sde): brtson 'grus shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang / bsam gtan shin tu phun sum tshogs pa dang / shes rab shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang / thabs shin/
292b2(mdo sde): tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang / smon lam shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang / stobs shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang / ye shes shin tu grub cing 'thun mongs ma yin/
292b3(mdo sde): pa'i ye shes nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las 'das pa sa dang po gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yan chad sa gus pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
292b4(mdo sde): khar gyi ye shes las 'das pa dang ldan pas/ ye shes shin tu rdzogs pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' myur du bra na/
292b5(mdo sde): med pa ma yang blar rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// // bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe stong gsum gyi
292b6(mdo sde): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnams pa drug du rab du 'gul te/ rab tu g.yos par gyur to// stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na ri'i
292b7(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po ri rab dag gam/ ri btang zung chen po dag gam/ 'khor yug gi ri 'am/ 'khor yug gi ri chen po dag gam/ de ma yin pa'i rin po che'i ri da//
292b8(mdo sde): rinag po de dag thams cad kyang / yul ga ya ga la ba dang / ga pha ma mgo'i rig la ba de logs su/ bcom ldan 'das la chos kyi bgab pa bya ba'i phyir 'dun par/
293a1(mdo sde): @gyur to// gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na me tog gi shing ngam/ 'bras bu'i shing ngam/ spos kyi shing ci man
293a2(mdo sde): pa de dag thams cad kyang / bcom ldan 'das la chos kyi dga' bye ba'i phyir/ ga mA go'i rig la ba de logs su 'dud par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' bcom lda/
293a3(mdo sde): 'das la chos dgab pa 'bul ba bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong phrag du mas kyang / na bza' dang rgyan gyi bye brag rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phung po ri rab tsam byas par gyur to//
293a4(mdo sde): rgya byin dang tshangs dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rgya stong du ma yang mgo bos phyag 'tshal zhing / thal mo sbar bar byas te/ 'dud cing bcom ldan 'das la me tog man d+ha
293a5(mdo sde): ra ba chen po dag 'thod gyur to// lha'i brgya stong du ma yang na mkha'i dkyil na gnas te/ gso g.yob cing ca co dang / gzha brgya stong byed par gyur te/ lha'i me tog
293a6(mdo sde): gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor bar 'gyur cing / kye ma'o deng ni 'jig rten du sangs rgyas pa skyes par gyur te/ kye ma'o chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa
293a7(mdo sde): bskor to// sems can gang gis rna lam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grag par gyur pa de dag kyang bsod nams dang ldan zhing dge ba'i las byed pa ste/ sngon gyi de bzhin
293a8(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu bstsags pa yin na/ gang 'di la dad pa rnyed pa de dag lta smos kyang ci dgos shes de skad du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// /
